summary: The Citi Mobile® App lets you manage your accounts virtually anytime, anywhere

scraped_reviews.content: I've used several apps to manage my credit cards; this one is by far my favorite. It shows my payment dates / balance due, recent transactions, and pending transactions very efficiently. What I really like is that as soon as I make a payment, my remaining balance is immediately updated. I wish my other credit card apps did that. My only complaint about this app is if I have a slow data connection, the app will throw up a 6-digit pin request before I finish typing my password.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tony, thank you for leaving a review on the Citi Mobile App. I apologize for the difficulty have shared these details with our development teams on your behalf. We appreciate your business, and I hope that you are able to have a good rest of your evening. ^Kyle

scraped_reviews.content: Last year this app was working for the most part. There was an occasional error message, but now it's on another level. It's 12/21/2024, the app looks cool, but every touch of the screen causes the app to have a seizure. I'm either getting an arror message, it will take minutes (which is an eternity for apps these days) to load, or it just won't work. I don't understand how some billon dollar companies can't make an app work. They are always adding stuff nobody uses. I'll update review if fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Kyle, this is definitely not the experience we wanted you to have. We’d like to gather more information to try to resolve the issue. Can you email us (customer.help@citi.com) or direct message us on X (@AskCiti) with details of the issue? Make sure to reference Google Play Review. ^Jasmine

scraped_reviews.content: The app works really well. Paying my card bill & seeing my account balances is simple. Movement of money is pretty easy too. It is a bit cumbersome to navigate to viewing scheduled card payments however. They are not retrievable from the card screen. Must go through a few extra steps on the payments (not transfers) screen. 1 star off for that, but still very good.

Takes an absurdly long time to load whenever I try to make payments on my credit card, and I'm highly suspicious that it's intentional. It always takes a very very long time to load whenever I go to make a payment, so I usually have to go and do something else before it loads and forget to pay. I would not be surprised if this "long loading" is intentional so people like me forget to pay.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Charlie, we definitely want to look into this. Can you email us at customer.help@citi.com with details of the issue or send a message to @askciti on X? Include the device you're using, the OS version & your account type (No account numbers or PINs) with “Google Play Review” in the subject line or message. Have a wonderful day. ^Donnie

scraped_reviews.content: Deposits are easy. Other things are broken. Needed to send a wire transfer, to a recipient I routinely send to from my computer. When I tried from the app, it doesn't list my past recipients like the website does. No problem I will just re-enter the information. Now it says that I can't use the information because it matches an existing recipient. So it appears to be impossible to send a wire transfer to someone you've already wired before. Complete fail. Tried help line, fail again
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Peter. If you need help with the App, please don't hesitate to email us (customer.help@citi.com) or direct message us on X at @AskCiti with details about the issue and reference Google Play Review. Thanks! ^Maria

scraped_reviews.content: Buggy and unreliable. The app messed up my request for an online payment. I got stuck with a $30 fee, because they tried to pull from a secondary account that was closed. They never tried primary account, which had plenty to cover the payment . I didn't think I would have to take a screenshot to prove which account I requested they take the payment from. Apparently that's necessary. Citi won't admit their app messed up, and refuses to make it right.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: My apologies, Tina. We're unable to service your concerns through Google Play. We appreciate your feedback and would like to help. Email customer.help@citi.com, send a Facebook message or an X message to @AskCiti. Be sure to refer to your Google Play review and include the account type you have, but do not send any account numbers or PINs. ^Cynthia

scraped_reviews.content: For months now the app is basically useless. I can almost never navigate from more than the main login view. As soon as I click on anything the app just shows the circle of death and never navigates to what I've clicked on. Very inconvenient when I'm not in front of my laptop to execute the action. Please get the bugs worked out so I don't have to leave Citi.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Andria. We understand your app frustrations. We want to help, but we can only reply once to a review. Please email us, customer.help@citi.com or send us a direct message via X (@AskCiti) with details. ^Deanna

scraped_reviews.content: update: still terrible. it doesn't close close when you close the app. They also don't tell you of the monthly fees when they are applying them. The user also keeps getting deleted when you move away from it for some reason. I can't log in. It keeps taking me to the activation website. Please disallow screenshotting. There is a reason all the other banking apps don't allow it. Update: I can't log in. It keeps taking me to the activation website!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sean, thank you for reaching out to us regarding our app. We would like to try to assist. Please email us at (customer.help@citi.com) or direct message us on Twitter (@AskCiti) with details about the issue and reference Google Play Review. Sincerely ^Fred

scraped_reviews.content: The Home Depot and Best Buy! Add these to the app, so annoying that you can't fix this. my Best Buy card is a VISA too and I can't register it. it would be so much nicer to be able to have this one app (CITI mobile) to be able to manage multiple cards that are affiliated or issued by Citibank. I have multiple (other than credit card) from Chase and I can manage all of them in one app. get this fixed and you'll have more people that are willing to use this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Eric, we appreciate the feedback and will share this with the appropriate team. ^Shaun

scraped_reviews.content: Horrible experience with this company. I set up auto but they didn't actually set up the payments so I was charged late fees and interest for one month. When I spoke with customer service they just kept transferring the call and wouldn't help to fix the situation. I always pay on time and I used to have a great credit score until this company.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Kyoung Little. We're sorry to hear about your recent branch visit and call experience. We'll be glad to help, but we can only reply once to a review. Please email us, customer.help@citi.com or send us a direct message via X (@AskCiti) with details. ^Deanna

scraped_reviews.content: I made a large purchase shortly after I got card. Citibank called and said they were freezing my credit limit. That was almost 3 years ago. No late payments and no missed payments ever. Update....2 1/2 years later credit limit still frozen. Income has increased, still no late or missed payment. I also opened a checking account w Citibank a few months ago. Will see how it goes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ann! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please feel free to DM us on X at @Askciti if you would like us to review your account with you. You can also email us at customer.help@citi.com. Be sure to include Google play review in the subject line. We look forward to hearing from you. ^John

scraped_reviews.content: I have not been able to log into the app or the website all week, I keep getting an error message. Just tried reinstalling the app and now it is telling me my account information is not there. No idea where to go from here and had no luck reaching a human on the phone. update, You set up a time to call me this evening and proceeded to stand me up. I just wasted an hour waiting on you. My one star review holds! update 11/8 still no help offered and login is still not working.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jennifer. Thank you for the feedback. We'd like to help. Please send us a DM on X to @AskCiti or an email to customer.help@citi.com with Google Play Review in the subject line and give us details of your concern. No account numbers or PINs in your message. ^Gloria

scraped_reviews.content: The CITI app offers everything you'll need or want in a banking/credit card app and you earn points on and to redeem in stores and/or for travel depending on which card you have. They also offer flex pay. The 2 things that I don't like is they will automatically lower your credit spending amount if your credit score drops, which if you're using credit, it will. Your debt to income ratio will go up. Second, the interest rate can be high, but that's depending on your credit score. Good bldg credi

This was a good app until it now, it has stopped opening. I cleared the cashe, restarted, and uninstalled, cleared the data... all a number of times. nothing works. I get a opening screen for a nanosecond and then nothing. my phone says it keeps crashing and to put it 8nto deep sleep. I did call tech support but they were unable to get the app working. it's very sad, because I use this app and now it's not working at all. Still not working after talking to tech support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Emily, please send a DM via X or an email to Customer.help@citi.com and include Google Play Reviews in the subject for further assistance. Thank you for your feedback. ^Shaun

scraped_reviews.content: Really great app and bank. Only issue I've had with the app is sometimes when you sign on from snapshot you get the spinning wheel of death and it doesn't sign on. You have to close the app and do it again. Sometimes several times. With that, the app offers a ton of features at your fingertips, including balance view, multiple account access, and easy payments. Just requested a credit line increase on one of my cards through the app and it was approved and instantly increased, in 2 minutes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We’re sorry about your experience. We’d like to help. Can you email us at customer.help@citi.com with the details of the issue or DM us on X @AskCiti? Make sure to reference Google Play Review in the subject line. Please don't include account numbers or PINs in your response. ^Donnie

scraped_reviews.content: App is fine. I absolutely hate that I cannot use biometrics to sign in. I find it annoying that the 6 digit pin always pops up, because I don't have that set up. And lastly, when I type my password in, and click for my keyboard to go away so I can click the sign in button, the whole app shuts down. Like what?!? The sign in options seem like it should be pretty basic and easy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Amber. If you need help with the App, please reach out to us on X @ASKCITI or email customer.help@citi.com and reference this Google Play review. ^Ana

scraped_reviews.content: Now that the snapshot is fixed, it would be great if we could move accounts around. I recently had to go through the issue of closing accounts because they were almost hacked (which I'm grateful that they weren't), but I've had to get new accounts and they are not in the order I need them and my payment now defaults to a joint account with my daughter's name (hers is listed first). It would be great if we could prioritize them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Richard we would like to look into this. Please email us at customer.help@Citi.com or tweet @AskCiti and mention your review by name. ^Tea

scraped_reviews.content: Still like the easy access the mobile app provides and how easy it us to keep track of my purchases. I also like the way they watch for unusual purchases and check with me to be sure they're ok. I do wish they'd reduce the high interest charges. I think in the more than 10 years I've has the account I've only been late once or twice but I usually pay on time or early. I always pay more than the minimum. This should allow them to reduce my interest.

Nothing against citi as an institution, this is mostly just their app. I have been entirely unable to apply rewards points for statement credit (this wasnt always broken, but has been for 1+yr though you can direct deposit it). You can't actually pay your bills, though it gives the option (0%success rate). They also don't appear to have push notifications for purchases, which Capital One does. Overall decent, and since they have my Costco card, I'm going nowhere, but sometimes frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Courtney, we definitely want to look into this. Can you email us at customer.help@citi.com with details of the issue or send a message to @askciti on X? Include the device you're using, the OS version & your account type (No account numbers or PINs) with “Google Play Review” in the subject line or message. Have a wonderful day. ^Donnie

scraped_reviews.content: Avoid if you use biometrics. This app disables biometric login several times a month, then you have to log in with your password, re-enable it, which then sends you an email letting you know that it was enabled. I did this yesterday, and now today again I had to do it all over again. I've never had this problem with any other app. For an app that I use almost daily, this is REALLY annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd be glad to review this, Andrew. Please email us at customer.help@citi.com or feel free to send a DM on X to @AskCiti and we'll get back to you. ^Brian

scraped_reviews.content: Great IF you can login. Seems to say I need to update the app often. When you try to login, it asks for a code BUT it never sends me the text when selected. When you select "call", it gives you the code BUT the app locks up and starts over asking you to login again then asks for another code. I understand security, but you can't rely on the app to let you login to unlock the card. Wish it didn't update WHILE AT THE CHECKOUT! TIP: Check that you can open and unlock your card BEFORE leaving home.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, this is definitely not the experience we wanted you to have. We’d like to gather more information to try to resolve the issue. Can you email us (customer.help@citi.com) or direct message us on Twitter (@AskCiti) with details of the issue? Make sure to reference Google Play Review. ^Jocelyn

scraped_reviews.content: it's so easy, and offers so many benefits. I like the merchant offers, and I make sure I'm always enrolled in the places I shop at. Even has my job listed. You just have to make sure you re-enroll when it expires. And sometimes after it expires the merchant doesn't re-add themselves. Like Amazon, but I'm always checking. Great app, and a good credit card.

The customer service woman, Camille, was wonderful and helped me greatly. The app is rather difficult and if I had to prove my identity once more, I was going to scream! Changing my password was difficult as well, because you cannot see what you have entered. I am a poor typist, so it takes forever to match the 2 passwords.Then it locks me out for too many tries!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, Kim. If further assistance is needed, please reach out to us on X @ASKCITI or email customer.help@citi.com and reference this Google Play review. ^Ana

scraped_reviews.content: I wanted to rate 5 stars but couldn't. My only negative about the app is that you don't include a merchant name in the transactions. 90% of the time, I have to research to figure out who I paid the given amount. Very frustrating. If you could include the merchant name in the transaction description, the app would be perfect.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Hank, this is great feedback! We will forward this over to the appropriate team. Thanks for sharing. ^Shaun

scraped_reviews.content: Safe and Secure. Great credit monitoring built in and very easy to navigate. Lock and unlock card feature allows this function to be utilized within seconds, right at the Point-of-Sale. Custom payments ensure that I can pay off credit debt on my schedule, and the option to set future payments is a nice touch as well. Raised my credit score ~100 points in a year, with this app alone!

This app has gone from bad to worse. It is the worst app. I had to reset my password and app during travel because of login failure. No, I don't want to talk to tech support anymore than I have already, or waste time constantly uninstalling, reinstalling, setting up biometrics every other day and other such nonsense and all I do, I still get biometric login failure. Even the pin option disappears in the app. ...how is it possible for one bank to have so many login problems. can no one fix this?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Marilyn. If you need help with the App, please reach out to us on X @ASKCITI or email customer.help@citi.com and reference Google Play review. ^Ana

scraped_reviews.content: This really is one of the better apps. As it should be, banks have tons of money. To cheap out on the app would be very unwise when there is so much competition. Citi nails it. Makes paying and using rewards very easy and fast. However, I haven't been able to update my address. Also, let us cancel our accounts without talking to a person that is some bs and you know it.

Bank Closed My Rewards Account and Forefieted all my rewards points. My automatic payment balance was running low and I was unaware of the situation and they just closed my account because automatic payment did not went through. Did not even had the courtesy to put me in the late payment/defaulty. And they just forefieted all my points (~$100) and I am not able to redeem at all. Have some courtesy to your customer.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Don, we regret to hear the frustration regarding the account closure. We would like to thank you for taking the time to provided us with your feedback. Please provide us with a DM on X ( @askciti ), a PM on Facebook or an email at customer.help@citi.com with information regarding this matter. Reference Google My Business in your message. ^Fred

scraped_reviews.content: Very easy to use, get done what you need to do, quickly. 7/5/25 Here I am again. Needed to change dates for a few services, place an order, and look at the rewards offered this month. You should definitely check out their credit card offers. Their app is one of my favorites to use... simple, very responsive, can access everything I need quickly, even support. Citi never solicits me to do this. I like to give good ratings when it's warranted. The Citi Professional card deserves it. TS

There are bugs. For example, when I log in I can't use my fingerprint anymore because one time I tried to get in too many times. It never reset though. I'm still using my pin months later. Another example: I scheduled that I would be traveling, but it doesn't allow a single day of travel. I was flying to Phoenix and back in a single day. Another example: I can't view the rewards because I'm not the principal card holder.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate the feedback. If assistance is needed with the app, visit us on X and DM to @AskCiti or send an email to customer.help@citi.com. Insert Google Play Review in the subject line and give us details of your concern. No account numbers or PINs in your message. ^Gloria

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great app to manage a credit card. Cards a listed separately if you have more than one card. Payments are easy to make thru the app and if a bank is linked the payment takes affect immediately. Replacement and lost cards are easy to manage. This app also links American Airlines and trips can be reserved and points redeemed. Overall, I find this to be the best app I have used to manage a credit card.

This is the only banking app (of 6) I have that consistently gives me issues with either logging in or just using the general functions. I've never had an app take so long to load a payment screen than this app. I've never had an app that crashes as frequently as this app. I would rather go to the browser to use the features because the app doesn't work. I honestly don't know why people give it a five stars when they say in their reviews, "when it works"...cuz it frequently DOES NOT WORK.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mira, and thanks for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear that you're having difficulty with our app. We'd like to help. Feel free to email us at customer.help@citi.com, send a Facebook message or send an X message to @AskCiti. Be sure to mention your Google Play review. We appreciate your business & look forward to hearing back from you. ^Cynthia

scraped_reviews.content: The app can be buggy and goes through periods where it won't load anything I click, but it eventually gets fixed each time. I love the app when it's working though. The setup is my favorite out of all the bank apps I use. It's intuitive and so convenient when checking the balance, making payments, etc. When it's not working I use the website which is also fine, but the app is definitely more convenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We regret your experience and would like to help. Please DM us on X @AskCiti or email Customer.help@citi.com and include Google Play Reviews in the subject line. Thanks. ^Shaun

scraped_reviews.content: App is broken. Will not open. Just hangs. August 28 update, Version 9.76.1. I strongly disagree with the developer's response so far. It's letting customers spin their wheels unnecessarily, and requesting that customers send individual emails, instead of acknowledging that the developer is aware of the issue and is working on it! Citibank needs to state publicly, not just in individual emails, that it is aware of the issue and is working to resolve it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gerald, we definitely want to look into this. Can you email us at customer.help@citi.com with details of the issue or send a message to @askciti on X? Include the device you're using, the OS version & your account type (No account numbers or PINs) with “Google Play Review” in the subject line or message. Have a wonderful day. ^Donnie

scraped_reviews.content: Sept 6 - Update finally available today. No message from Citi to update Sept 4 - Still does not allow you to login. Just get a Citicard screen. Spent nearly an hour to get connected to someone from tech support. They knew of the problem and has been happening for 15 days. Not just impacting American Airline credit card customers. Could be impacting over a million customers. Use a Google Pixel 6 Pro. Sept 1 - Crashes for last several days. Will not even open. Many people having the same problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Bill. We apologize for the inconvenience. Can you email us at customer.help@citi.com or send a direct message to @AskCiti on X? Please ask that you reference Google Play Review. Thanks! ^Tania

scraped_reviews.content: I really do like this app. Super convenient. Unfortunately like some others my biometric option hasnt been working the last couple of months. Once I was able to login, I checked to see if biometrics was set up...it is. It doesn't even trigger it at login so I touch the biometrics button. It spins and does nothing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear about your biometric login stopped working. We want to help, but we can only reply once to a review. Please email us, customer.help@citi.com or send us a direct message via X (@AskCiti) with details. ^Deanna

scraped_reviews.content: The app hasn't been working well for the last year. I have a Samsung S21 and honestly all I can do is view account activity. Trying to zelle or do any type of transfer has become a nullity. Logging in is even a pain. I don't know what they did but they need to undo it. The app is either always loading or freezing. Horrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kashima we would like to look into this. Please email us at customer.help@Citi.com or on X at @AskCiti and mention your review by name. ^Tea

scraped_reviews.content: It has crash on me a few times but all in all i love the citi app far better than the capital one app. I love that my costco rewards are viewable as well. edit: 05/07/25 - app still takes absolutely forever to load. when will they give an update to fix this. its getting to the point im having trouble paying my bill.

A very clean, smooth app. It looks nice and it's super simple and easy to use. I have no issues, it seems to show me the correct numbers and it's a banking app that I genuinely enjoy. Logging in is easy, there's not usually any lag, and again, it looks well done.

Very user friendly and I like the updates they made to the app to make it practical... However there's an issue with the dispute feature. When trying to start a dispute request it just buffers ongoingly until it gives a message that there was an error. I checked for updates and relaunched app. It is definitely a glitch and not my phone...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Natalie, this is definitely not the experience we wanted you to have. We’d like to gather more information to try to resolve the issue. Can you email us (customer.help@citi.com) or direct message us on X (@AskCiti) with details of the issue? Make sure to reference Google Play Review. ^Jasmine

scraped_reviews.content: Great card....zero interest on transferred bills...awesome! And, of course, you can schedule payments or do autopay...but, my favorite payment option is the one where they let you take a single transaction (ex. $400) and make smaller fixed payments over 4 months or 6 months. It gets the balance paid quicker and doesn't let the balance to go higher.

Reliable and Easy to Use I’ve been using the Citi Mobile App for a while now, and it’s been super convenient. Everything I need — checking balances, transferring money, paying bills, and tracking credit card activity — is right there. The layout is clean, transactions update quickly, and I appreciate the security features like facial recognition and instant alerts. It makes managing my finances on the go so much easier. Highly recommend!

no verification, every single time I have to verify I have to call in even though I have two perfectly good numbers on there and it's ridiculous the amount of hoops that this Bank makes you go through just to do one little thing, we called in to get a verification code and somehow our account ended up locked, not the first time either spend hours on the phone with these people and it's just ridiculous the amount of run around you get
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Daniel. Thank you for sharing your experience. Should you wish to provide additional feedback on your experience, please DM us on X at @askciti or email us at customer.help@citi.com. Reference Google My Business Review and do not include any account numbers or PINs. ^Rita

scraped_reviews.content: The app provides a variety of information. The navigation needs to be made clearer. For example, the ability to see past payments is either unavailable or not easy to find. There are a lot of offers, yet the information on the card usage and the payment of the balance transfer needs to be better displayed, not just the balance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, Marcus. We’re continuously working to bring new features and functionality to our app. Feel free to email customer.help@citi.com or direct message us on X @AskCiti with details about the issue and reference Google Play Review if you need our help. ^Jovit

scraped_reviews.content: Fairly user friendly... my first time using the app so we shall see. Update: I've been using the app now for about a year, I believe, it is user friendly and it seems as though you can do quite a bit more than I would probably ever do. You have access to your bank accounts, loans, statements and investing opportunities as well. Good deal.

Update Oct 2025 - The problem has been corrected & has been for a few weeks, but it took a few months. The app was great up until a few weeks ago. It currently only allows me to make a payment from 2 of the 4 payment accounts I have on file even after deleting and reinstalling the app. I can make a payment from any account I have on file via their website on a personal computer. Very frustrating when one is traveling and doesn't have Internet service. June 2025
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Carolyn, thank you for reaching out to us today. We are sorry to hear about your app experience, and would like to review this issue further with you. Email customer.help@citi.com, PM us on Facebook or send us a direct message via X (@AskCiti) with details including Google Play Review in the subject line. Sincerely ^Fred

scraped_reviews.content: Bit slow. But once in...works perfectly. Edit 3/14/25 : Changing from four to ONE star. The response on this app has become RIDICULOUSLY slow. Surprising coming from such a HUGE company. If CITI can't manage a simple app, not sure how they will handle one's investments. Update 4/7/2025 : Closing my accounts(checking and 2 CCs) and going back to Chase. I travel all the time and I can't afford to have such a USELESS banking app. On the computer, everything is great.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback, MacKenzie! ^Ana

scraped_reviews.content: The app got a lot better, but now the login process needs to be improved. It used to be great but then it just went crazy. It keeps popping up all options, code, password, text, etc all at the same time and I have to keep closing down to get to the ones I use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for reaching out. We appreciate the feedback provided about the app. If you need assistance with an account please email customer.help@citi.com or send a message to @AskCiti on X. ^Elizabeth

scraped_reviews.content: I really like my cinti bank credit card. It has lots of alerts, it will flag suspicious things and send you a text seeing if it's really you. It's easily locked and unlocked. You can add a user if you so, choose has lots of benefits and I feel safe using it.

I was a very big fan of Citi until recently they charged me a fee on one of my transactions. I spoke with with them and unfortunately after being a customer for over 10 years they were not able to waive it. Regretfully I will begin looking at other options for my credit cards both personally and the company I do the books for. I've been a satisfied customer up to this point.

title: Qdcursos
description: With the Qdcursos app you will be able to discover non-regulated education courses, you will be able to manage your day-to-day life thanks to the possibility of seeing your timetable, receiving circulars and chatting with your classmates and teachers. In addition, you can also check all your registrations and see their status, as well as save all the certificates of the courses you are completing.
descriptionHTML: With the Qdcursos app you will be able to discover non-regulated education courses, you will be able to manage your day-to-day life thanks to the possibility of seeing your timetable, receiving circulars and chatting with your classmates and teachers. In addition, you can also check all your registrations and see their status, as well as save all the certificates of the courses you are completing.
summary: Thousands of courses at your fingertips, sign up with Qdcourses.

title: Bonelli Digital Classic
description:
Bonelli Digital Classic – Bonelli comics in digital edition.

Subscribe and immediately read more than HALF A MILLION comic pages published in over 80 years of the publishing house's history, via the app or from a web browser.

Bonelli comics in digital edition: more than 5000 books with the adventures of Tex, Zagor, Nathan Never, Julia, Mister No, Martin Mystère, Legs Weaver, Dampyr, Nick Raider and many other classic Bonelli Heroes.

Enjoy a digital reading experience never seen before, fluid and optimized for every type of device. You decide how to read, try the 3 different modes: "full table" - now also without visible interface, for total immersion! -, “panel by panel” and the innovative and exclusive “strip by strip” reading mode.

Don't know where to start your journey with the Bonelli Heroes? Enjoy the selection of thematic collections curated by experts to guide you through more than 80 years of Sergio Bonelli Editore's history.

Bonelli Digital Classic lets you read up to 12 complete comics in offline mode! Bonelli Digital Classic is available on smartphones, tablets and any device with web access.

Get:
- access to over half a million pages of digital comics published by Sergio Bonelli Editore
- thematic collections with new reading itineraries
- download and read in offline mode
- 3 reading modes: "strip by strip", "panel by panel" (demo) and full panel
- manual bookmark
- new releases every month
- no commitment. Withdraw whenever you want.

Choose between two types of subscription:
- Monthly
- Annual - two months free.

Or, if you prefer:
- Purchase individually, issue by issue, the digital editions of the episodes also available in
single purchase!

Useful links:
- Bonelli Digital Classic: www.bonellidigitalclassic.com
Download the app and subscribe to start reading. Your subscription will automatically renew every month or every year, according to your choice. You can cancel at any time. The service will be automatically suspended for as long as you want. Your payment method associated with your Google Play Store account will incur a periodic charge every month or every year depending on the pricing plan you have chosen.

Terms and conditions: https://shop.sergiobonelli.it/faq/2016/10/26/news/conditioni-generali-di-
sale-1000149/

scraped_reviews.content: There is one thing that should be improved asap - when you read on mobile phones, you will usually zoom in a little, but then scrolling left or right through the page is almost impossible and you have to scroll diagonally up and down to the left or to the right to get to the desired point on the page and that is a huge nuisance. And the other thing is - where is Dylan Dog?
Update: the automatic renewal was a bit difficult, but the assistance was fast and excellent. Great way for people outside Italy to read their favorite stories
Perfect to read Bonelli Comics from abroad! The Interface can be slightly improved. Note that the comics are only available in the original language, a tablet is recommended to maintain a good scale.
Awesome experience along with samsung folds translate app I can now read all my favorite in native Italian.
Great comics and fantastic support in case you run into any issues
Great content, navigation needs to be improved
English version would be great! 🇬🇧 #EnglishPlease
Waiting for comics in english
need it in English
Do you have support any other languages?
Very good

L'applicazione é ottima, l'utilizzo é semplice e veloce e le opzioni di navigazione e modalitá visualizzazione sono piú che adeguate a mio avviso. Avete praticamente tutto il catalogo fumetti Bonelli a vostra disposizione! Grazie!

Ottima applicazione, con selezione di fumetti in costante crescita a un prezzo (abbonamento annuale) accessibilissimo. Un plauso all'assistenza clienti, sempre gentile, risolutiva e tempestiva nelle comunicazioni con i lettori. Straconsiglio!
Manca Dylan Dog, ma per il resto è perfetta!
La qualità delle immagini dei fumetti è orribile ultimamente... Esempi sono NN 392, NN special 34 e MM 405. E il servizio clienti non fa nulla al riguardo.
Fantastica app. Posso leggere Tex dalla Florida. Grazie
Ottima applicazione. Ho l'abbonamento e ne vale ogni euro. Solo forse mancano dei titoli Dylan Dog in primis. Ci vorrebbero anche dei titoli ormai chiusi come ad esempio Magico Vento e Napoleone.

Sono molto contento del servizio. Lo consiglio a chiunque ami i fumetti Bonelli, e non solo Tex. Da un punto di vista tecnico, c'è qualcosa da migliorare e per questo non ho dato 5 stelle. Continuo ad essere molto contento del servizio offerto. Lo uso ormai dal primo giorno, 1o dicembre 2022, e lo uso tutti i giorni.

Ci sono sostanzialmente quattro testate, alcuni albi richiedono abbonamento e non possono essere acquistati singolarmente, politica orrenda e predatoria. Le tavole non sono in alta definizione, scandaloso. Le testate che ci sono non sono aggiornate: gli albi della serie regolare sono indietro di mesi. Ma perché? Si prende due stelle e non una soltanto perché almeno gli albi singoli costano poco (2.50€).

Correggo la recensione portando a cinque stelle visto che le problematiche che avevo segnalato sono state risolte. Enorme selezione in costante crescita, buona app che viene aggiornata costantemente. Ottimo supporto. Li ho contattati diverse volte e mi han risposto sempre in giornata.

Sinceramente deluso...... In teoria l'app funzionerebbe, ma non capisco come sono salvati gli albi e cosa succede dato che se ne possono vedere solo 12 off line... Cosa succede a tutti gli altri?? Ho provato a contattare per sapere se gli albi aquistati sono salvati sul telefono o nel cloud. Sempre solita risposta automatica. Che delusione!! Per fortuna ho pagato solo per un albo.....
Servizio fantastico, soprattutto per chi non risiede in Italia. Ma manca Dylan Dog!!! Abbonamento cancellato, tornerò quando sarà disponibile Dylan Dog

Grazie Bonelli! Soprattutto per aver portato Nathan Never su BDC. Abitando all'estero da quasi 20 anni ho sofferto dell'impossibilità di poter seguire alcune delle mie serie preferite. Next: Nick Raider 😉
Buona app, unica funzionalità che aggiungerei, sarebbe la possibilità di zoomare la pagina intera a tutto schermo.

Buona applicazione ma potrebbe essere migliore. Il pinch to zoom non registra lo stato attuale, quindi devo zoomare su ogni pagina che leggo. Inoltre sarebbe bello sapere quali fumetti ho letto fino ad ora o anche segnare alcuni fumetti come letti. I contenuti sono fantastici e in futuro vorrei che fossero disponibili altri eroi come Magico Vento o Dampyr.

title: Moises: The Musician's AI App
description:
World's #1 vocal remover for musicians. Use AI to extract or remove vocals & instruments from any song and play your favorite music in any key and speed. The best stem player for creating guitar, drums, piano, vocals and bass backing tracks.

Master your audio’s chords and stems with pitch-perfect guitar tabs, smart metronome, and AI mixer. Get the best AI music tools for stem and vocal remover and join the band today.

Moises is your free vocal remover app with pro features for music makers, guitar players, audio editors, and covers the everyday musician:

- AI Audio Separation of Stems: Easily separate vocals, drums, guitar, bass, piano, strings, and other instruments in any song. Moises is a vocal remover, voice splitter, and backing track maker app. 

- Smart Metronome: Our tool instantly generates click tracks that are in sync to the beat of any song.

- AI Lyric Transcription: Convert music into text with our AI lyric generator. Supports audio in English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, and Italian. Transcribe lyrics worry free for the best karaoke track maker & editor.

- AI Chord Detection: Follow along to the beats of the song with instantly synced guitar tabs and chords. Featuring beginner, intermediate and advanced chord detection and chord finder.

- Audio Speed Changer: Make hard sections easy with 1-click slow down or speed up. Moises BPM finder detects, records and displays the BPM.

- Pitch Changer & Finder: Easily control and change the audio key with our pitch finder. Shift the pitch to your vocal range or instrument tuning, great for practicing karaoke.

- AI Key Detection: Detect and change the song key and instantly transpose chords to all 12 keys.

- Backing Tracks: Make acapella, drums, bass, guitar, karaoke, and piano backing tracks.

- Trim and loop music parts: Our AI detects and records song parts so you can loop specific ones. Save time using our audio editor - editing & recording is a snap! 

- AI Voice Studio: Access high-quality voices from real artists to cover your editing needs.

- Export: Extract and share high-quality audio mixes and separated stems, including the metronome click-track. Easily extract audio stems in our AI music generator to be used in any other track maker or within our voice remover.

Moises makes fine-tuning music stress free in 3 simple steps:
1. Upload any audio or video file in the app; AI magically separates voices and instruments into multiple stem tracks, while detecting a songs beat and chords, making it easy to extract audio from video
2. Modify stem tracks, separate vocals from music and easily mute tracks
3. Download separated stems or a custom remix

Import: Google Drive, Dropbox, iCloud, public URL
Add songs: iTunes, audio files from apps like WhatsApp, to Moises App
Extract audio in MP3, or M4A, and WAV (Desktop only)

Moises, the ultimate music maker & song generator is the perfect AI tool for:
- Music lovers, students, & teachers
- Musicians who play the drums, bass, guitar, or piano
- Singers, acapella groups, pianists, karaoke enthusiasts
- Amateur & Pro editors 

Join the Moises band and make unparalleled music! 

Free plan covers:
Vocals, drums, & bass stem separation
Chord finder & detection, and metronome click-track
Pitch shifting, BPM finder & detection and setlists

Premium Plan:
Unlimited AI audio separation & stem extract
Advanced instrument separation - including Lead & Rhythm Guitar, Acoustic & Electric Guitar and Main & Background Vocals
Fully unlocked practicing tools, like Chord Detection & Metronome
Advanced features available on the web

Pro Plan:
All the Premium benefits
Hi-Fi audio separation models
Professional stem modules: drum parts & multimedia audio stems
Up to 180 minutes of audio separation per upload
Fully unlocked Voice Studio
VST Plugins

Download the best audio separation tool for free now!

For Terms & Conditions, Privacy Terms, and FAQ, please visit:
https://moises.ai/terms
https://moises.ai/privacy
https://help.moises.ai

scraped_reviews.content: This app is perfect for school music programs. Teaching kids the right notes and testing how they really sound by removing the vocals works so well. It is also good for playing by ear practice. You can pay for a month or when you will be using more than the FREE monthly allowance. Super easy to pause subscription when your not going to be using it a lot. I love this app!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying the app for school music programs and playing by ear practice. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Wow! I went to the app, store, looking for a looper app. What I found in this app was way more than that. Not only could I loop, but I can remove the vocals or any other part of the track that I need to remove. Also, the looper has a function to where all you have to do is hit intro, and it will loop the intro or verse or whatever part of the song you need looped seamlessly. unlike the other apps where you have to painstakingly, find the correct time, and loop it yourself.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're thrilled to hear you're enjoying the various features our app offers for looping and track editing! Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will be shared with our team.

scraped_reviews.content: no more searching for karaoke tracks, or backing tracks, or drumless tracks. I wish the mobile app had all the features as the desktop app. should definetly have an offline mode, but i guess you can save the stems you want so no big deal. the only issue I found was separating lead guitars. It only separates into one stem. Which is not ideal for some songs that have alternating lead parts (i.e. Hotel California). So hopefully the add automation features soon. overall, Solid app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback, Richard! We'll pass this along to our team for review. Glad to hear you find the app solid overall!

scraped_reviews.content: does what it says, but maybe 2 or 3 times now i've opened the app and all of my saved tracks were just gone. recently i got a new phone and i didn't have all my files backed up, sure, but most account based services don't delete everything from the account between devices. the other time(s), i've opened the app and all of my files were just gone with zero explanation. the five tracks a month, five minute max limit is also egregious, in my opinion.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear about your experience. Your feedback is valuable and will be shared with the team to make improvements. Thank you for sharing your thoughts. Visit our Help Center at https://help.moises.ai or email us at contact@moises.ai for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: This works exactly as they show in the ads. In the typical ads I get for this app, they claim that the app can separate different tracks like vocals, bass, melody, etc. When seeing these ads, I thought it was fake or hidden behind a pay wall. I was absolutely wrong and this app exceeded my expectations! It was clean when it came to separating and you don't have to pay to get what it says it does. I will probably be featuring this in a video on my channel sometime and use it for covers. Thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your positive review! We're thrilled to hear that our app exceeded your expectations and that you found it easy to use for separating tracks. We can't wait to see your video featuring our app on your channel!

scraped_reviews.content: 10/10 app, the only reason I give it 4 stars is because you are limited to 5 monthly file uploads. I understand why that is a necessary feature, but it could at least be a few more or something. Otherwise, I absolutely love this app, it is a lifesaver for transposing, learning by ear, and making cover videos.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! I will pass along your suggestion for increasing the monthly file upload limit to the team for review. We're glad to hear you're enjoying the app otherwise! Visit our Help Center at https://help.moises.ai or email us at contact@moises.ai for assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Does exactly what it says on the box believe it or not. It's really insanely impressive! as someone who likes learning the songs I like on my instruments but struggles to find sheet music cuz my music is really niche it fits the bill! They have a little ways to come making everything sound clear and sometimes some tracks won't separate how you'd expect them to but I'm sure they just need time to keep working on it. 10/10
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you find our app helpful in learning your favorite songs on your instruments. We appreciate your suggestions and are constantly working to improve the clarity of sounds and track separation.

scraped_reviews.content: Unbelievable. Never thought it possible. Truly amazing. Separating lead and rhythm so beautifully. Worth every penny. Need a lifetime license option. Using on extended Grateful Dead and Allman Brothers songs and jams. You just made learning any song by ear SO MUCH EASIER/FASTER. Nuances, arpeggios, remove competing keys/organ, it's all there. AI is apparently very cool. Thank you for creating this app. I'll be very busy for the next few months playing the tunes playing in my mind.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your positive review, Jerry! We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying the app and finding it helpful for playing along with your favorite songs. We'll definitely take your suggestion for a lifetime license option into consideration. Keep rockin' those tunes!

scraped_reviews.content: I had some concerns with the pricing model early on, but it looks like they've recently updated it to be much more reasonable (unless I just accidentally selected the Pro tier and missed a lower-priced option). I just subscribed for the year, and it's been worth it so far. I mainly use it for chord detection and transcribing lyrics — and the lyric detection is miles ahead of the native Android voice recorder, which I’ve relied on for songwriting. Super useful tool for musicians and writers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Alex! We're glad to hear that you've found the pricing update to be more reasonable and that you're enjoying the features for chord detection and lyric transcribing. We appreciate your support and hope our app continues to be a valuable tool for your songwriting.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is amazing, even with the free version. Tracks are easy to upload, and the vocal, bass, drums, and guitars are separated very well. Makes it incredibly easy to learn guitar and bass parts in songs. I've probably learned more guitar and bass parts to songs recently through this app then in the last month or two than I have previously in the last 3 years! 😅. Very fun, very intuitive and very practical. (Note, songs have to be songs that are public domain,or you bought. No YouTube stuff.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It sounds like you're having a great time using Moises.ai, Nathan! We're thrilled that our app has been so helpful in your musical journey. Keep rocking those guitar and bass parts! If there's ever anything we can help with, don't hesitate to reach out. 🎶🎸✨

scraped_reviews.content: after trying it out, I decided to subscribe. I would much prefer to own a program outright as opposed to paying a subscription. however this program works so well that I subscribed anyway. I love how it isolates tracks and allows you to remix them as needed. the chord finder is helpful, as is key changer, tempo control, and looping. there are cheaper options for some of these features, but I haven't found another program that does them all like Moises.

This app is amazing. I was searching for apps that could separate the music and vocals. All of the apps and websites I have used before always muffled the audio. This separated the vocals from the music perfectly! The sound quality of both tracks (vocals and music) are clear and high quality. I would highly recommend this app for anyone interested in music making and audio editing. 👍

The quality of the separation is insane. This is by far the best song separation application I've ever used. This is crazy, it got the low growls in metal screaming to the intense tempos with perfect accuracy to some of the songs I made specific to test these apps. Immaculate, it hardly ever missed a beat, and when it did it was for a single beat or two. Never lasted and would rarely lower the volume due to so much going on. It separates great. 10/10 app

Never received the "Confirm Your Email" email, so the app won't let me upload any songs. And no option to resend email. And yes, it's the correct email. However, no problems receiving all the popups to hurry and subscribe for a premium account. Also, data mining and sharing with 3rd parties. That's double-dipping when you're charging an annual subscription fee. Uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Check this article we have on the options for verification link errors as the one you mentioned: http://moises.cc/emailverificationerror. Thank you for contacting us.

scraped_reviews.content: Was planning on buying the full version but there is only the option to pay for a subscription. At the annual discounted rate ($40!), this would end up costing hundreds or thousands of dollars if I kept it for more than a couple years. What a ripoff! Full version should be a one-time purchase. Beware, unpaid version limits the app in the following very restrictive ways: No metronome 5 minute song limit Monthly song limit Also, processed audio file quality just "ok"
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. Unfortunately, we cannot accept one-time payments since we release new features every month, and the App gets automatic updates. Also, many of our features rely on state-of-the-art AI which requires significant computing power from Moises servers to make the experience as smooth as possible. Thanks for the feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: I have looked at the reviews and seen many people complaining about not being able to upload from youtube, spotify, ect and I think that's really unfair for the people who can't download videos and upload them to this app, just the edit the sound. Though the functions are cool, and useful, so I rate this 2 stars. Maybe in the future, if you change from only being able to upload downloads to also using links, it would definitley be 5 stars.

I tried this app and already love it. As for me, being an musician, this app suits well for me I guess. I already have some songs remixed here, and playing a little bit with the musical tools like the instrumental and the bass (I can't unlock more tools unless I pay for premium) however, the only problem is that we have to pay for premium, and also you are forced to pay. after uploading 3 tracks on your list, your forced to pay, even though you delete something. you would still pay for it too...

This app is incredible. I use it to isolate instruments in songs. The quality of the track isn't perfect when youre isolating but its good. Since I've started using it; I have learned so many guitar tracks that were impossible to hear in the mix. Using this; you can control the volume of these four tracks: Vocals; Drums; Bass and Other. The track labeled " Other " is commonly a guitar track or string/brass/winds sections. Best app for dissecting music. You can even save the isolated tracks.

I've looked for so many solutions to isolating song parts so I can hear them clearly as I continue on my guitar learning journey. I tried this one figuring it would work as well as any other...which would be to say not so great. I uploaded one song and was blown away. I am now a paid subscriber. I uploaded "Iron Man" and it pulled the guitar out almost perfectly. Sure, there are still a few weird artifacts left over like vocals, but you can barely hear them. I am stoked about this one.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thank you so much for the lovely review! Our mission is to empower creative potential, offering a tool that's affordable and efficient to music lovers worldwide. We appreciate your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: OMG THIS IS AMAZING!!!!!!!! I can hardly wait to upgrade to a subscription, as it is going to help me to learn to play so many songs that I love, on guitar...so much more effectively, and so much faster. YAY!.... I guess my only grievance would be that, on the limited version, it cuts off completely, like, 75% through the song. I kind of do, find that a bit mean and unfair, considering that not everyone cannot afford full subscription. I HOPE that the subscription version plays it in full :)

The app is pretty cool. I paid, but I'm a bit disappointed that hi-fi referred to algorithm separation and not the export quality/format which I wish I had control over. Also, why are all the chords one block back from when they actually go into effect? As a musician, that makes it confusing if you're trying to watch it and play along with piano or guitar, because you actually have to play the note the next beat or beat and a half after it shows. It's this way on pretty much every song tried.

this app is awesome and I wish I'd have known about it sooner. worth every penny as a DJ, I now have EXCLUSIVE digital instrumentals and acapellas that nobody else has...not even the labels sometimes! as a producer, I've got drums, basslines and melodies, harmonics, even background vocals separated and tracked out as if I were in the studio in the 70's and had the foresight to be collecting stems. I've probably given away too much game in this review. thank you Moises!🙏💯 can I beta test 4 u?

It used to be a good app, until the producers got greedy. Before, you could select from different mix split settings, but now you're limited to 6 voices, but before you had more options. I've noticed also it's done a poor job distinguishing between main voice and background, I don't know what happened, but that didn't used to be an issue. Such a bummer, it used to be a good app.

Very good, but it was better before. Now every time I want to separate the voice from the track it sounds in poor quality like any other generic app of this type. Before this app did it better, A very clean job that seemed like you literally had the vocal of the song.. or even the instrumental track. But that's not the case anymore, that disappointed me a lot.

I have no words. Where have you been all my life? I can't say enough things about this app. I'm a music performance and recording hobbyist, so this tool is very useful when i wanna play along with the band or sing with the track, muting or regulating volume for various parts as my mood dictates... & i can change the key! I'd still like to see a more robust instrument and vocal isolation. Oh yeah. If it became capable of isolating clapping during live performances, that would be killer!

This app is great. Subscribe to this and you can use the better PC version for free. PC version captures lyrics. But whatever it captures, you are stuck with. As the edit features don't work. I'd love to see audio to midi and audio to notation functionality as well. This app works by singling out frequency ranges, then separating. So sometimes it can't separate similar sounding instruments. I can't wait for the day AI can flawlessly recreate the original tones of each part on a separate track.

The app is a dream. Find a way to copy your link to the app and, whatever your musicianship is, subtract it with the app and play, sing, or practice to your song. The only problem is the smart metronome. Feels like if the song is in anything but 4\4 the click doesn't either click on the right count or subdivide correctly. If we could control the metronome completely the app would literally be perfect. But still one of the best practicing tools!

This app is pretty awesome. The split always seem to have some bleed-over (like the guitar track will have some vocals or something) so they aren't always usable on their own. However it is great for taking out parts of a mix, like removing vocals for karaoke or removing instruments to make practice tracks. The paid version is definitely worth it for the extra features. Obviously unlimited uploads is a plus, but changing the key, and the chord identifier features work GREAT and are worth the $$

This is absolutely amazing. I always knew some day in my lifetime we'd be able to do these science fiction-like separations. Make an instrumental of any song. Sample clean vocals from every song. It's not "perfect" but it's dang close. I'm totally astounded. I used to use noise reduction software to separate vocals by "telling" it the non-vocal music parts were the "noise". It worked a lot of the time but this is way better. I've never reviewed ANY app before.

This is a good app, and I really love how you can drag audio from YouTube, but there is 2 issues I have with this. It has a tendency to almost crash my device when I use it. The screen turns dark, as if the battery ran out, and then comes back up a few seconds later. The other issue is that it does not seem to grab the whole audio. I use this app for splitting the vocals to Japanese songs that otherwise do not have vocals only. It only retrieves about 1 minute and 40 seconds of the song.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! Thank you for contacting us! We are really sorry for the trouble you are experiencing, and we appreciate you brought this issue to our attention. Please, drop us an email at help.moises.ai. We would love to help you out with this!

scraped_reviews.content: I gladly pay the monthly fee for how useful this is. So much good here, but several annoying bugs. It crashes a lot (and I have a powerful phone). You can make playlists, but you can't play them back. You have to manually exit the song and tap on the next one, and loading is slow even if you've downloaded the tracks. You can't "run through a set" by pressing play one time. Also the search function does't work at all. Requires interenet for search even if tracks are downloaded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! You can select your playlist and play songs in sequence. To do this, go to your Profile, click on Settings, and choose "Play all songs." Now, just hit play on your favorite playlist. We appreciate your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is exactly what I was looking for and failed to find elsewhere. You upload a mp3, file or simply copy and paste the URL and press submit and in about 2 or 3 minutes the song is ready. Remove vocals, bass, guitar, drums etc. individually or together. I use the app to remove vocals and practice singing or remove the guitar and play along. There is a lot more to the app that I haven't explored yet and looking forward. 5 stars for sure 👍

Honestly this is pretty fantastic. It's what I've been looking for for years. I was mainly looking for an app that is able to create instrumentals of songs I like, it does that and so much more. And while there are many apps like that on here, this has a great elegant UI and doesn't feature a bunch of intrusive ads. It also can do so much more than instrumentals like isolate the bass, vocals, drums etc and a lot more. It's great!

I adore this app, its great for finding basslines in my favorite songs which I'm v thankful for. the full membership is 100% worth it and the additional features are so awesome. two problems: 1 while all the other tracks are clear, piano usually is rough. it usually gets blended into the "other" track, or it won't recognize if a piano part has a filter. 2 there should be a separate track for guitar, electric & acoustic. love the added tracks, hope to see more (brass, woodwinds, pitch perc., etc)

This is very helpful! My band records all our rehearsals and this allows me to take any track and remix as necessary for my own practice at home. I can remove my own instrument and play over the rest of the band, or remove the vocal track to hear the keys and guitars better. This is so much easier than using a real multitrack recording (where filesize can be extreme). A simple mp3 results in the same utility.

As much as I love this app, I was just making an edit audio when it said that we had to pay to get unlimited tracts, I think that you should make them already unlimited, sense we do have to pay to get instruments, bass and other stuff we want separately. Again I love this app, but having to pay for one thing but also pay for another kinda takes away the fun.

The app is decent & does (usually) what it says it does pretty well (for the most part). I was curious about the upgraded option, saw the price & how it was subscription based, & started laughing uncontrollably 🤣😂🤣😂. If you REALLY REALLY REALLY desperately need something like this, maybe it's worth it. But for the average user of this app, it's 1,000% NOT WORTH IT AT ALL!!! If you do subscribe...make sure to use a prepaid card or something that you can cancel easily & thank me later :)

I went into this thinking it was gonna be like those videos on Youtube. You know the ones, where they try to cut out the spoken words in a song, but you can still faintly hear them. This song is not only nearly flawless at that well, but it also happens to let you remove certain instruments?? This stuff is insane. I feel like I'm using the batcomputer or something. Crazy good.

Great! The features that come without in app purchases are great! From transposing, to changing the key of what u record, to audio adjustments! I only leave 4 stars because I think MAYBE it's my mic, so I'll test it with a new one, but the audio received isnt the best. I recommend it to anyone who does anything music. Plus it's very user friendly.

The coolest app I have ever had the opportunity to enjoy! I am 52 yrs old and I frigging swear, if I had this instead of going to Sam Goody to buy sheet music books I would be as good as Steve Vai or EVH. SHEET MUSIC didn't have tablature. I had to wait once a month for Guitar Magazine that had 3 songs tabbed and a lot of times I couldn't stand the songs that were tabbed that month! Gen Z are snowflakes....TAKE ADVANTAGE OF WHAT YOU HAVE INSTEAD OF MAKING UP A NEW PRO NOUN!!!!

This is a great app for musicians in vocalist. I often use it to rehearse a song that I can't do in the original key. Fabulous fabulous tool. After the processing takes place, it's obviously not studio quality anymore, but that's not the point. It's also great for transcribing pieces that have a complex cord structure, or even a solo that you need slowed down

Just started playing with the free version- I love it! I'm in a cover band, and every time we do a song in a different key from the original I have a hard time practicing on my own- with this I can not only change the key, but also the tempo, AND strip out my own instrument so I can practice in a way that's closer to how I'll perform. That's a lot to get for free, and the paid features look even cooler.

They no longer allow URLs from YouTube, Amazon Music, Apple, Spotify (even if you are paying for the subscription). In order for me to use this, I need to pay for an additional way to get music that I'm not currently doing. I paid for another yearly subscription thinking they still allowed this but they stopped allowing those URLs earlier this year. I sent a complaint 7 days ago asking for a pro-rated refund and they have not responded.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dale! Please, check your email, even your spam box, as we did respond to your request on November 21st. We can't use the links directly due to specific corporate guidelines from those companies, which is out of our control. We have other ways for you to upload your music; we made sure to add it to the email we sent you. Thanks for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I really feel like this app is not worth the yearly subscription. It does a poor job of separating tracks, especially for guitars and strings. Whenever I use this feature, the app continues to bunch instruments into the "other" stem, when it is clearly a guitar or strings. I probably won't be renewing my subscription when it expires.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We have some tips; check these out: https://moises.cc/errordownloadingfiles and https://moises.cc/downloadfile. We hope they’re useful for you. Thanks for the feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: This is a really cool app that I use to make drum covers. My one gripe is that when I isolate the drum track it sounds weird. The only way I can describe it is that it sounds like the drums are under water. Conversely, when I mute the drums, everything else takes on that quality. I should note that the source audio has so far been from YouTube videos, so that may be a factor. I have seen several pristine sounding drum covers using Moises that don't have this issue, so am I missing something?

This app is WILD!!! I'm terrible with playing by ear so this a TON. Now I can finally learn those songs I can't find the music for so I'm really excited. The free version has a 5 song upload limit/month. For the songs you have uploaded, the app will stop showing chord guesses after about a minute or so but you can still separate the audio which is awesome!

This app is incredible! Such a cool service and so accessible! I use this app to isolate drum parts from songs so I can learn them or play with them. There is a 5 minute track length limit, which I almost never hit. It does work best with well recorded songs, if the production is muddy, it'll struggle to separate the tracks. I've tried it with some voice memos of performances with not much luck. Overall, awesome! Really cool tool!

Overall this is a good app don't get me wrong, it's pretty good for beginners, not to hard to learn. But after you made/upload 5 videos you can't make anymore. Fair enough- but I don't wanna be forced to pay for premium after I've made or "upload 5 videos" I was doing just fine with out premium. I did try deleting the ones I made so I have room for more but still wanted me to pay regardless even though I deleted all the 5 music remix videos. Still a good app if your willing to pay a fair price.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Our free account is limited - if you have processed 5 times, you will have to wait until next month, and deleting songs won't change that. With our Premium version, you'll have more monthly credits, but if you wish to remain with the Free account, that's fine too. You can access more details through your account. Thanks for your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: There is nothing to say. The authenticity and grandious of this app is nothing I have seen before. Yes, the ripping you get from certain songs are not perfect but AI is still getting its foot through the door and even besides that Moises does so much better than you would think. Being that it's free at first and still gives so much power is astonishing and only $3.99, plus tax, for just that extra breathing room is a bargain. If you have found this app and enjoy music, just download it already.

such a tease! finally downloaded a song I want to learn the chords to, uploaded it, only for the app to only analyze the chords for the intro and not the entire song unless I got the paid version. plus, the format sucks. they only show you the chords as the song plays. why not show the whole thing at once, like a tab? they probably do it just to tease people and hook them in. well, at least it works even if it is a huge tease.

title: Sydney Health
description:
Use the Sydney<sub>SM</sub> Health app to find care, share your digital ID card, and check your claims. You can understand your benefits, improve your health, and save money. Easily manage your benefits at your fingertips whenever you need them with your personalized health and wellness information all in one place. 

• Digital ID card – Your digital ID works like a paper ID, enabling you to always have access to your current ID and easily share it with your care team in person or by email. 
• Chat – Use our 24/7 chat to find what you are looking for, or find more in-depth answers by chatting with a Member Services representative. 
• Plan details – Understand your share of the costs, including your deductible and copay. Find out what’s covered and check your claims. 
• Find care – Search for care when and where you need it. Locate doctors, labs, hospitals, and other healthcare professionals in your plan’s network. See your estimated costs before you receive care. 
• View claims – Easily track your claims including the status and your costs. 
• Virtual care – Routine care, prescription refills, and urgent care right from your app, whenever it works for you. 
• Refill your prescriptions – You can set up automatic refills and reminders for your medications. 

Download Sydney Health to your device today.

In addition to using a telehealth service, you can receive in-person or virtual care from your own doctor or another healthcare professional in your plan’s network. If you receive care from a doctor or healthcare professional not in your plan’s network, your share of the costs may be higher. You may also receive a bill for any charges not covered by your health plan. Sydney Health is not a medical device and is not intended to diagnose, treat, or cure any medical condition. Sydney Health is Sydney Health is offered through an arrangement with Carelon Digital Platforms, Inc., a separate company offering mobile application services on behalf of your health plan. Other virtual care services are offered through an arrangement with LiveHealth Online. Sydney Health is a service mark of Carelon Digital Platforms, Inc., © 2025. Sydney Health options are based on each member’s plan, so some features may not be available to all members.

summary: Anthem/Wellpoint and other health insurance plans

scraped_reviews.content: The app isnt as user friendly as I would like (need). Hard to navigate and impossible to find items or links ...it keeps circling you around and landing the same exact, non-helpful places. Resulting in a lot of wasted time and frustration with the system. It gets a 4* right now because the insurance itself is great but this system is a nuisance.

Impossible to login without a 25 minute phone call to their company, which my insurance company told me would happen. They know thier app fails at login, yet they do NOTHING to fix it and instead waste your time. Trash app, with lots of issues, don't fall for the scam of it will make your life easier, it won't. The website does the same exact thing, without wasting your time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. If you have any questions or want to share additional feedback with us or need support, please email us at Sydney@anthem.com. Thank you. ~ Sydney ~

scraped_reviews.content: login issue was fixed . This is still the worst most confusing health insurance app I've ever used. Says my deductible is paid in full , yet I still receive bills from my provider . I am absolutely not paying any of those then hope to be reimbursed. Pharmacy is like a whole other company you have to sign up for, any questions you get the run around . really sucks . 👎👎
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We would like to look into this. If you could, please email us details to Sydney@anthem.com. Thank you. ~Sydney~

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely hate this app. Used to work, but about the past 1.5 years it won't load at all. The screen just stays blue. When I try to log on online, same thing, doesn't load. I'm sure it's because I'm using a Samsung, which shouldn't be an issue. So many tasks that I WOULD do but can't because the app won't work. I'd love to be able to use the features the app offers, or be able to complete tasks without having to go on my desktop or laptop. I would actualy give 0 stars if I could. Ridiculous.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. If you have any questions or want to share additional feedback with us or need support, please email us at Sydney@anthem.com. Thank you. ~ Sydney ~

scraped_reviews.content: It's terrible honestly. The simplest thing is a challenge for this dev team. Biometrics are supposed to be a viable option but it doesn't make much of a point when you still have to put your password in. The UI is also just awful. Navigating through the menu to find what you need is a nightmare, especially looking for in network doctors. Sucks really because the easy things are more you absolutely need an app to do anything and you have companies like this pushing out "lowest bidder" software.

Trouble loading the app, then find the pages on this app are just the regular website pages, but inside the app frame. On the find-a-doctor page, you cannot see the top of the page or scroll all the way to the left of the page. Most of the options are cut off, I can't see the filters, cannot do a search because I can't even see the full text entry box. I was hopeful that this tool could help me manage my disability and connect with my healthcare team, but at this point it's pretty much useless.

Virtual visits from a cellphone (android) don't work because the video or microphone don't connect. There's no way to message or call the provider directly, and then the system cancels the call automatically because it couldn't connect. I wish I could just do a regular phone call instead of through the app or Chrome browser, and without video being a requirement. Garbage app design (and I'm a software engineer).

This is the worst app I've ever had the experience to use. They've managed to screw up automated payment for 3 months in a row. There is no way to chat inside the app although it shows you can. Nor can you send a message to the customer service team within the app. My career was 30 years in global software and I have to say, my experience shows they have an inept development team with seemingly non-existent user testing. I have resorted to using the postal service f/payments.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. If you have any questions or want to share additional feedback with us please email us at Sydney@anthem.com. Thank you. ~Sydney ~

scraped_reviews.content: this used to be my absolute favorite Free streaming app. best selection of content, the live TV feature, the movies. All good. but lately it is very buggy, the screen freezes while still playing the audio and the only way to fix it is to change the channel and then change it back. then the title will play a few more seconds and freeze again. I wish we could go back to the good old days of Pluto!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues streaming. To help, please email us at support@pluto.tv with case# 23193632 in the subject line. Be sure to include your device information and what you were watching when this happened to help us investigate.

scraped_reviews.content: You would receive 5 stars if it weren't for one thing that's so significant, it drops the score to one star. Ads that freeze. I don't mind the ads. They keep it free. What I do mind are ads that freeze and never unfreeze. I exit out, go to something else and when I come back the same ad freezes. This is a constant problem and makes the whole app unwatchable. It got so bad, I just went ahead and bought the TV series I was attempting to watch. I'd rather pay than deal with this. Fix your issues.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our customer support team can assist you. Please email support@pluto.tv with details on whether the freezing happens on VOD or Live TV, and the content you are streaming to investigate. Be sure to include case number 22551721 in the body of the message.

Please fix this or I will be removing the app from all of my devices.

scraped_reviews.content: Wow what a garbage streaming service. They embid ads into videos in a way that it extends the run time of a film beyond the runtime shown so once you're past the listed run time, you can't fast forward or rewind without getting kicked out of the movie. Then of course you have the excessive ad breaks every 10 minutes carelessly inserted midscene. Once I switched apps and got back to my scene, I sat through 7 ads only to get smacked with another 4 ads 90 second laters. Hardest of passes on this.

If you would like to watch ads upon ads and more ads then feel free to download Pluto. I'm guessing that there are at LEAST a couple dozen of them in just one movie. In all truth, you will be watching more ads than the entire length of a movie. Oh wait! I forgot to mention the best feature of all. The ads freeze and you have to watch the ads all over again! ENJOY!
