Also, considering half your viewing time is spent on commercials, you're spending half of all the data used on adds. There are times when there's 3 or 4 minutes of commercials then 30 seconds of actual show then another 3 or 4 minutes of commercials again. That's 8 minutes of adds for 30 seconds of viewing actual shows.

I may just uninstall 😤👎

Terrible app on every platform I try to get it working on. Casting is unfortunately nearly impossible as you cannot get through 10 minutes of playback without the player deciding to, seemingly at random, fast-forwarding to a point I had not arrived at, where it alao decides to rewind to every few minutes. When operating with some competency, the ads come on every 10 minutes for an eye-watering 3 minutes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this problem with the app. In order to help, we need some more information. Please send us an email at: support@pluto.tv. Be sure to include your device information and what you were watching when this happened, so we can investigate further.

scraped_reviews.content: I have lots of apps installed on my Sony TV, but not this one until last night. Pluto had a free movie everyone else was charging $3.99 to watch. So happy to find it free! Except I have only watched less than half and am quitting. WAY too many commercials. It wrecks the movie. Plus, at one point instead of returing to the movie after commercials, it returned to the install Pluto app screen. I have never had that happen with any other app. Navigation of movies and shows also too jumpy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. In order to provide Pluto TV's content completely free, we rely on advertising from our partners to support our service. However, we understand your perspective and will pass along your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: User beware! I have a hard time believing it is the "leading streaming television app". Any of the other free services have all the common features...pause, don't automatically play the next 'recommended' movie, and worst of all app opens instantly to 'playing' live tv show. No way to pause, stop, only mute while you browse to find something you actually want to watch. The solution? Send us an email! How about 'fix the app'!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Our viewers are important to us, and we care about what you have to say. We have forwarded your comments to the appropriate team.

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded this app to watch the old Top Gear episodes. That's it. I'm glad that it has most of them for free, spare the best ones. I have a few problems, however. First, you cannot close the small window that plays a random show when you open the app. Second, you cannot skip or go back an episode, you have to manually find the episode. And third, I try to watch a specific episode, it will load, but then it will suddenly skip it when I dont want it to. I'm not sure how to stop that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We can't remove the Live TV screen as we drop in on whichever channel is airing. If the series is On Demand you can select which episode you want to play. To investigate the issue about skipping episodes, please send an email to support@pluto.tv with your device details & what you were watching when it happened.

scraped_reviews.content: I updated my review from 3 to 1 star. The app continues to show the same syncing error "we're having some trouble... we are currently working on this issue. Please reload the pluto TV app." It doesn't matter what channel you watch or what time of day. It used to sync fine with my TV and now it shows this at least 95% of the time. When watching shows on the original device (phone, laptop) it's fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for reaching out! We're sorry to hear you're getting an error when you are trying to stream. Please email us at support@pluto.tv. Be sure to include your device information so we can investigate further.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for a while now and I used to live it! Now, I rarely open it. So, today, I decided to give it one last shot. I thought it was my phone or my connection, but after reading another review, I see I am not the problem. Lately, the app has been freezing or replaying like 10 seconds of audio again and freezing. It's really weird. Idk what happened but when this issue is fixed, I'll redownload it. Until then, I gotta delete and that makes me so sad!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi! We're sorry to hear you're experiencing freezing and audio issues. Please email us at support@pluto.tv with your device details and what you were watching when this happened, to help us investigate.

thread::AvP0Aea7eWmpjqZsWSbSES0::

scraped_reviews.content: Literally can't write a review. It's interesting that after pluto responded, all of sudden, I'm able to write more than one sentence. It lags horrifically. I've been watching Hell's Kitchen, and in most of the episodes, the dialogue doesn't match what's onscreen. Also, if you're watching one season of a show, you can't start watching another season without major glitches. The glitches include just not letting you watch your chosen episodes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear you're experiencing audio and video out of sync, and unable to watch your chosen episode. Please email us at support@pluto.tv with your device details and if the issue occurs on Live TV or On Demand, to help us investigate.

scraped_reviews.content: After Pluto TV stopped working on my old phone, I eventually bought a new phone. It seems like every time I try to use this app, it wants to update, which takes so long I usually go somewhere else like YouTube or Tubi rather than wait for it. When I do watch a movie, they really load up the ads in the last 30 minutes. Three blocks of ads (5 or 6 or more at a time) in 30 minutes. I guess they figure that if you made it that far, you weren't going to quit watching So they really load up the ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for reaching out. We're sorry to hear that you are having an issue after updating the app. Please send us an email at support@pluto.tv. Be sure to include your device information and what you were watching, so we can investigate further.

thread::vfhACcA_crKXcHPa9q0b2i0::

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love this app!! I think it's by far the best one available!! Yeah, sometimes the ads do get really repetitive and bothersome at times. But I figure hey I can't complain if it's free! Plus I can even binge watch shows by the seasons! So the ads and sometimes glitchy viewing isn't bad at all considering how wonderful the app is with everything else! It definitely has so many different things to choose from, so I can literally watch all day and night if I wanted to and never get bored
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your feedback leaves us starry-eyed! We hope you continue enjoying!

scraped_reviews.content: It is OK if you are jobless and just want to spend hours on the app trying to locate something interesting to watch. There is no search or any other convenience to filter out all the trash. It is just a long list of "channels" and what is playing on them right now. No way to find out what is going to be playing on what channel, set reminders based on that to let you catch the program, etc., etc.

The app NEVER works properly. It's a shame, because Pluto has a really great selection of on-demand movies, but they are next to impossible to access. It doesn't matter if I'm trying to stream them from my phone, or if I'm simply trying to watch them via the app on my Smart TV, it just never works. What makes it even more irritating is the fact that it not only refuses to stream the on-demand movies, it also gets stuck on random stations and doesn't allow me to change the channel, as well!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with our On Demand. To help, please update your app to v5.40. If the issue persists, email us at support@pluto.tv. Include your device information and what you were watching when this happened to help us investigate.

scraped_reviews.content: Has potential and solid content. I'm ok with ads but they are a little too frequent honestly. The absolute killer is the fact that it often loses my place in the movie I'm watching. Ok so not a HUGE deal right? I'll just move back to where I was, watch a couple ads and then I'm back to watching. NOPE, you can only fast forward about ten mins at a time and then you have to watch the ads, fast forward ten more mins and more ads. 20 mins of ads to get back to where I stopped. DEAL BREAKER. FIX IT.

I don't use the app enough to warrant a lower star rating but I watched a 2 hour and 12 minutes movie with 12 ad breaks. I'm not exaggerating. 12, 2-3 minute ad breaks. I mean on the low end it's 24 minutes of ads. I get the reason for ads, it's a free to watch app but almost 3 hours later and I finished the movie. Is it too hard to put an ad at the end of a scene too? Instead ads are put in the worst places I've ever seen.(This app isn't the only streaming service that does it either)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. In order to provide Pluto TV's content completely free, we rely on advertising from our partners to support our service. However, we understand your perspective and will pass along your feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app. I love that it is FREE. TV should always be FREE especially if it's going to have commercials. Hope to continue seeing more improvements: more channels, more shows, less repeated commercials, and no inappropriate commercials on the kids channels. Did I mention that I love that it is FREE. If this app ever goes to a paid subcribtion I will change my review and give it one star. I will continue to support you as long as you stay FREE.

summary: Virtual makeup, hair filters & body tuner—edit from face to full body!

scraped_reviews.content: earlier version had many more free features (unlimited hair styles, for example). Being a long time user with both free and subscription versions, I'm a little disappointed. Also virtually all AI features, and body modification features, are unusable in the free version. This is overall a brilliant and powerful app so it's a shame the creators got a little greedy in selling out -- but I guess you get what you pay for (and get screwed out of what you don't pay for). 😏

It's been a little while since I last used this app and I've noticed that many of the makeup features that used to be free, like lashes, eyeliners, and eye shadows are now locked behind a paywall. I'm honestly quite disappointed about it. You also won't know which features require a subscription plan until you try to save your photo, which is more annoying. Please consider reversing this change so users can enjoy the app again.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re truly sorry for the trouble you’ve experienced. We aim to bring more creative AI photo/video features—some of which may require a subscription or credits, and we value your feedback and have shared it with our product team to help improve the app. If you need further support, please send details via "Settings > Send Feedback". Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: When something is FREE, you don't charge for it. At the very least, make it more clear before download that it's a FREE TRIAL. The balogne that you gave another reviewer about some aspects being free to all users was disingenuous. At some point, they'd have to start paying for something they mistakenly thought was free, in order to keep using it. I didn' t find that out until after I downloaded it, and I didn't bother to try it even once. I uninstalled immediately.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Holly, according to Google Play's policy, the trial subscription supposedly will not auto-renew if users have canceled it in time: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481
YouCam Makeup has free and paid content, while some premium features are provided with free times per day for everyone to try.🙋‍♂️

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app. But suddenly I have to pay for things that were originally free? I think I've had this app for a year or two now, and I think it's time to uninstall. There were features I had used before (certain lashes) and even though I ended up not picking them at times, when I would change to the next item it NEVER prompted me to pay for it. They suddenly became "premium."
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there🙋 Thank you for your review and using YouCam Makeup for years. We offer free tries to different premium tools from time to time, so some premium content is free to use for number of times a day😀 The subscription offers full and unlimited makeup/retouch and is also the great support to keep optimizing YouCam Makeup.🙏

scraped_reviews.content: My experience was not the best if im being honest. The features of the app themselves are not bad, but most of the options are locked unless you try the "free trial" This is where things get confusing. There is no cancel subscription anywhere on the app you must go to Google play to do it. Also, once you confirm your cancelation, it says it will be canceled on the day that the yearly subscription will automatically bill. I don't know if I will be charged for 21.99/year,but it feels like a scam.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi 👋 Our app provides free & premium content.😀 Feel free to enjoy the free content without paying for it. If you want to try the unlimited premium features, welcome to start the 7-day free trial! If you don't want to continue, just cancel it before the free trial ends without any charges👉https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: edit- Jan 2019: love the realistic photo effects. I use this app all the time and it is the best that I've found for beauty editing. my problem with it is that it keeps freezing. I thought that maybe I'd accumulated too many looks in the "my looks" tab, but there's no method to remove them besides one by one. half the time, my looks wouldn't load at all and it'd be trying to load the default "look" until I forcequit. I wish it would open the photo editing function without applying a look.

Limited functionality and choices. In particular, many of the hair styles had no option to change their color, and the fun, punky colors were a completely separate tab and only work on your own hair. They need to find a way to allow all hair styles to be usable with all available hair colors. Also, there were nowhere near enough lipstick options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review. We appreciate all suggestions and are always looking for ways to improve.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is fun to use and really works! It's great to add makeup to a photo when I just didn't have the time (or energy) to do it before the photo was taken! I'm loving playing with it and want to try some more looks! I wish you could soften jaw lines and smooth vertical neck lines for those of us who are a wee bit older... Maybe next update, developers?

Since they got my last review deleted I will rewrite it in a more detailed version. You have to sign up to a free trial before you can even access the app, much less check out the "free" content. There is no way to skip the free trial sign up, so you are forced to subscribe. Some people will likely forget about the free trial period and get charged. That's how scams are run. I am not opposed to premium features but there should be a free trial without my credit card info. Other apps do it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kimberly, the user reviews are managed by Google, we don't have the authority to delete them. YouCam Makeup has free & paid content. It's optional to use the free trial if you're interested in premium features. If you don't want to activate the free trial. It is fine to use the free content on the free version without any payment.😊

scraped_reviews.content: Uses way too much battery and it's often difficult to get a really good, clear photo. The slightest shake and it turns out all blury. I checked my regular camera and took photos in other apps just to co. Pare and it's definitely this one causing the problem. Aside from that it's a pretty good app. I love the skin diary and beauty product/makeup recommendations based on my skin type. Lots of tutorials as well.

I absolutely love this app! It's very creative and fun, it's also very realistic. I mean the makeup you can add either live or on a photo is so real looking. You have to get premium though, if you want to really enjoy the app. But trust me purchasing it, is so worth it. Plus you get a whole year for a low price. Don't hesitate on downloading this app! You have to get it or you are going to be missing out! You will be missing out on transforming to the big lead! Lol, get the app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Camille🙋 Greatly appreciate your kind feeback!🤩 Our team is glad to know that YouCam Makeup meets your expectation! You must have a bunch of awesome pics with makeup and camera tools😎. Feel free to contact us via Settings⚙️ icon in the profile page >> "Send Feedback" if there are any questions/suggestion🙏 It's our pleasure to serve you😃

scraped_reviews.content: Signed up again, looks good - can't waited to try! Update: Disappointed! I haven't used this app in years and it hasn't changed much - except for the fact that almost everything you try is now a paid feature. . . I understand that we all need to earn a living but maybe balance it a bit better. Have more features that actually are free and most of all - mark the paid features clearly so you don't take them off after we put them on! Or mark the free ones! That would take less time ;)

Great for retouching photos! Works quick, and you can easily switch between the edit and original to see which is better! Also allows you to choose how much of an effect is applied, which is nice. Only thing I would change would be the image quality output, its good quality, however it would be nice if it could handle even larger/ higher quality detail saves. But for a free app, it cant be beat!

I like this app very much, and even more so with my new device that has more RAM and a faster processor. It is also easier to use with a larger display. That being said there are options now that have to be downloaded now that we're already available in the past. Very limited on hair styles and colors, though the hair part of the app seems to be more realistic. Good app but not the One Stop App I'm searching for.

I had this a long time ago and i loved it. But now you have to sine up with a lot of personal information. And you have to pay 18.99 a month. It " says " you can have a free trial. But you can't even get into the app with out credit card info. I don't mind paying for a good app. But forcing me to sine up before i even have a chance to see the product. NOT INTRESTED!

This app is fun to use. The only thing I wish could be improved on is adding more features to manipulate the eyebrows. Many of the makeup looks totally change my eyebrows into something else and that's not what I'm looking for. I might want to tweak the shape a bit and clean them up in some cases but I don't want an entirely different look. I just want to perfect what I actually have. I want options to change the color & improve the look without appearing like my eyebrows have been painted on.

The app creates fun photos, but nothing credible. I was using this for creating art but in a realistic way. The smoothing technique is too fake & options for foundation are slim. The hair color... let's not go there. It's a good app for kids. In addition, I had uploaded the basic version... somehow was charged for the 1 year premium version in the middle of the night while I was sleeping. That was shady...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Your opinions will be shared with the related department for further discussion. A trial subscription auto renews unless cancelling before it ends according to Google policy. The renewal date was mentioned when activating the free trial. To cancel a subscription: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app since it 1st came out. I've tried many other makeup, hair, selfie apps & none come close to this one. All the choices of makeup, hair, accessories, etc, are the best, although, a bit overwhelming if ur indecisive like me. Being able to fix the placement of makeup on ur face so it matches up exactly on point is the reason I love this app. Other apps have similar features, but they can't keep up with this one! It could take up a lot of memory if u don't cloud ur pics.

I first started using it as something fun but as I further explored all the features, I found it to be a necessity. Doing my makeup and hair, helps me to decide what styles of wigs to buy and to actually know what color(s) would look nice. It also helps me to experiment with different makeup combinations so I can also know how and which to purchase. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!!!

AMAZING AMAZING AMAZING! I love how precise this is. One thing though that would be cool is of they somehow could make the photos more clear. Because I dunno if it's the camera or an app can fix it but I'm convinced it can. But in photography, it's hard to take pics on a phone because some of us arent photogenic. And it sucks. So of this app could separate the shadows and light and the details in them altogether, this app would be truly legendary. But so far. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

Finally! More options for colored contacts! I love the more natural looking eye colors/patterns, so hurray for that! I mostly use this to give my OCs makeovers and there are probably hundreds of different looks/styles to create, so it's perfect. I do wish we could have access to false eyelashes again, I realize that lashes and certain lipstick types are for premium users but the mascara option is a little lackluster. Other than that, I love playing around with all the settings, very cool app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello😊, Glad to know that the eye color/pattern/looks on YouCam Makeup meets your expectation. The app provides free tries to different premium tools from time to time. We would like to hear more about what you felt towards mascara, feel free to contact us with some references via Settings⚙️ icon in the profile page > "Send Feedback". Thank you😃

scraped_reviews.content: I thought I could try on different hair styles before going to get my hair done. This app is STUPID. It's full of ads; you can't tell what to click to go where you want & the color change never works. It keeps trying to get you to do a 7 day trial that will ultimately cost far too much. Waste of the last 45 minutes of my life! HUGELY disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, our app has paid & free contents. If you're interested in premium features, welcome to try the free trial and cancel it before it ends if you don' t like it: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481🙏 If you have any question regarding the editing tools, welcome to contact us via "Send Feedback" in-app Settings. We're happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Previously had a positive review, but after a small break from the app, it now is awful. Want eyelashes? Gotta pay for it. Want good looking eyeshadow? Gotta pay for it. Want literally anything that looks good? Pay for it. Bye bye. Not worth it anymore. I get having to pay for some things, devs need income. But apparently now you have to pay for basically everything. What makes me want to pay for anything special, when they're asking for everything, even the basics? Greedy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello👋 Thank you for using YouCam Makeup. The app offers free tries to different premium features from time to time.😃 The subscription offers comprehensive makeup/retouch experience. Welcome to start the free trial to see if you like it. If not, kindly cancel it before the free trial ends👉https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: ABSOLUTE SCAM. Very few hairstyle try on options. Not realistic at all. It gives you 3 free options. Then, you have to subscribe to see a total of 8 styles. No color choices at all. The subscription says you can cancel through the Play Store, but it's very hard to figure out how to cancel. If you try to Uninstall it, it tells you your subscription is still active.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi,since improving and developing the features will require extra resource, your subscription will be our support.If you want to try the unlimited premium features, welcome to start the 7-day free trial! If you don't want to continue, just cancel it before the free trial ends without any charges👉https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: I'm paying for Premium, yet the beard removal tool won't allow me to save after I use it. It keeps saying "you've unlocked these features!" Great. So let me save it? There was also the option to paint on hair color with some type of brush and that has disappeared as well. These were literally the two most useful features to me. May unsubscribe.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello👋 Sorry to hear that😟 We would like to understand more about what your have encountered. Welcome to contact us with more detail and references showing the concern via Settings⚙️ in the profile page >> "Send Feedback". Our support team will check it further. Appreciate it🙏

scraped_reviews.content: I don't like the idea of saving my pic on the app. Can't seem to find a way to delete my pic because I dont want it saved after using the app. UPDATE: features that was once free is no longer free. It gives you option to try a feature but that's it. It can't be safe. This app is worst than it was. Yes I understand that the pandemic forced most businesses the raise their prices. But they forgot the customers are ALSO going thru the crisis. $29,99 just isn't worth it.Spend it on groceries or rent
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, the images/photos taken by YouCam Makeup are saved in the device but not app. You can check the save path in "Settings" Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Was great when most all of it was free now you have to pay for everything! Even the simplest of eyelashes..and most of the time it doesn't tell you it's a premium feature until you move on to try to keep editing and you lose your work. Uninstalled. Was fun and handy but I'm not paying. For the more advanced looks and features yeah ok I can see charging for that but basic stuff? Nah. Il just stick to Snow and Blemish Remover now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Tyler👋 Thank you for your review and choosing YouCam Makeup. There are free tries to different premium features from time to time.😃 The subscription offers comprehensive and unlimited makeup/retouch experience, and allows us to continuously improve & maintain functionality, as well as provide updates and support to our users.🙌

scraped_reviews.content: For tweaking photos, making corrections to color and missing spots left by other apps etc, it works well. It has many options, allows you to fine-tune hair coloring in a "draw-on-picture" fashion, but the fine tune function could use a little tweaking for precision. I even allows you to make gradual changes in color and tone to clothing skin background etc not just hair. I have no idea how it works for "makeovers" but it seems to work well for editing, blending, corrections etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for trying our app! YouCam Makeup is a virtual makeover and self retouching app providing various kinds of makeup editing tools for everyone to try and discover the looks or styles they might like, such as lipsticks, eyeliners, or hair color changer, etc.🙆‍♂️Welcome to contact us via the "Send Feedback" in-app Settings for further help!

scraped_reviews.content: This app charged my account multiple times (monthly), when I was under the impression it was annually/once a year?? It also costs way more than it should. I barely used it and its not even that great. it was a super big pain to figure out how to cancel & impossible to get a refund.. They're scamming ppl in my opinion bc they charge your account without your knowledge and its way easier 4 them to take your money than it is for you to get it back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cheyenne, We understand that you have concerns about your purchase. To proceed further checking, could you provide the email account used for the subscription & the order number via the "Send Feedback" in-app Settings or "YouCamMakeup_android@perfectcorp.com" for our support team to further check and assist you better? Thanks🙇

scraped_reviews.content: I'D GIVE 0 STARS IF I COULD. I've been trying to unsubscribe before my 7 day trial ends, but I can't. Everytime I go to my subscription list, I can't find it... I've tried every "solution" that they give in HELP, but nothing works. I'm getting annoyed, I'm gonna be charged for an app I don't want or need. So If you're thinking of installing this app just to see what it does, I suggest you don't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, According to Google Play policy, supposedly you won't be charged if the trial is canceled on the Play Store before it ends (https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481). Kindly send the email account used for the subscription & the order number to "YouCamMakeup_android@perfectcorp.com" if you have concerns about the refund🙏 Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: This app should remove "free" from their description. It was a great app before, and it is still advertised as the best "free" tool to remove eye bags, blemishes, etc, but it is a false claim. They completely removed even 1 free try per day, and now most of the good features are for paid subscription only. Which made it pretty useless for an occasional light touch-up. It was good while it lasted. It is now just a waste of a phone memory space.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tatyana👋 Thank you for using YouCam Makeup. There are free tries to different premium features from time to time. The subscription offers comprehensive makeup/retouch experience. Welcome to start the free trial to see if you like it. If not, just cancel it before the free trial ends👉https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app since late 2015 and it has been a lot of fun to play with. But putting a paywall on things that were free before feels greedy to me. I could understand adding newer paid features , but most of things I used are no longer available without a payout. I have more important things to spend or even waste my money on, so will be uninstalling. It was fun while it lasted. :)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your support all along the way. Sorry for making you feel that way. Your feedback will be forwarded to the related department for further consideration🙇

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be great i have had the app since 2018. I liked the eye bag fearure, it used to be part of the free app. Then in an update you got 2 free uses a day. Now in the latest update you can't use the feature unless you update to the paid version. I'm uninstalling the app. Edit to add 12/7/22: i had re-installed the app to give it another try only to find they added even more options from the free version to the premium version. Uninstalled and am finding a different editing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Heather🙋 Thanks for the feedback🙇. The app offers free tries to different tools from time to time.😀 The subscription provides users fully makeup experiences! Welcome to start the free trial of premium subscription to see if you like it. If not, just cancel it before the free trial ends👉https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: To be totally honest. It needs a bit of adjusting. The eyes/pupils,lashes/eyebrows,lips/mouth don't always align together.The choice of eyeshadows are horrible, sometimes you don't get a choice. The eye color part is very strange. Every color is gray. Why?? When I first started using the app it gave you more options. Now everything you really need, such as under eye bags & dark circles plus teeth whitening cost extra. So frankly it's beginning not to be worth downloading the app altogether.Tweek

I don't know why they advertise something completely different. Makeup is good. But, the hair styles and colors are horrible. Stamp on hair, and color doesn't completely cover the whole head. Some color's makes it look like you have gray hair. Need a better way to apply hair styles, color's.( Blended in) There's other apps that will do that. Like add volume, bang's etc. Expecially if ur paying for it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, We're sorry for the unsatisfying experience. Thank you so much for your feedback and suggestion. To further check and make improvements, we'd appreciate it a lot if you could use the "Send Feedback" in-app Settings to send the reference screenshots🙇 We're happy to take your advice into consideration!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app, I love that I can put on make up AFTER I take a picture &still make it look natural (or I can have fun w/it&play more obvious "dress up") It's cool that you can basically try out (at least color wise) current available products &be linked to purchase them in real life. Plus, every photo you "doctor" has a before/ after with a full list of what cosmetics or filters you used should you want to refer back to it. There's a lot more to this app for me to still try! Try it,it's fun!

This app is ridiculous to navigate and offers no easy to find instructions on how to do so. It advertises a selfie editor, but if there is one it's not in the app itself. You have to jump through three different links and allow permissions for certain sites in order to get to a point that you can do that, and I don't know if there's more that you have to do because it was heinous. I don't usually review apps but this is definitely not as advertised.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Marin, If we understand your concerns correctly, please be advised that this is a virtual makeover app, while the "YouCam Perfect" app is for photo editing and the "YouCam Video" app is for selfies video editing! Each app is designed for a specific need and will make sure to receive users' permission before accessing certain files or functions🙇

scraped_reviews.content: Love it and there are a TON of free features! Please do NOT listen to people who didn't click 'X' or 'close' to get past the offers to pay for the full version of the app. Those reviewers are misleading just because they are not tech savvy lol! I just re-downloaded it on my new phone with more space and deleted another and I will probably just pay for the full version at this point. 🙃🥰🤷🏾‍♀️
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dannielle🥰, Thank you so much! You must have a ton of fancy photos with free features.😎😎 We appreciate your correct explanation that the app is available for every customer to use for free. See you in the premium version soon, and get ready to a better experience on our app.😀😀

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: I've had this app for a very long time and until today would never had thought to uninstall it. I went in to touch up a photo and was continually bombarded by the ads for the paid version. I get showing the ad once, but don't try and trick me to pay. It is a fun app, but I'm tired of having to click back to the original task. Uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Renee👋 You saw ads of other product with the premium version if we understand correctly. The ads are to invite users to "try" the other apps if they are interested in them. Feel free to skip the ads if you're not interested in currently.🙌 We will also take your advice to the related departments for further consideration. Thank you🙏

scraped_reviews.content: This App is awesome. I've been using it for a couple years now, and I can't get enough of it! It's really the only make-up editing app I'll use. And I love the special effects as well as the backgrounds they have to choose from. And as far as the prices go, they are beyond reasonable with what they ask for! I'd recommend thus app to anyone and everyone whose into editing pictures, especially virtual make-up effects!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nymmi, appreciate your positive feedback and recommendation🥰 We're glad to know that YouCam Makeup vitual makeup meets your expectation, especially the effect and background features. Feel free to contact us via ⚙️ icon in the profile page >> "Send Feedback" if there are any questions/suggestion in the future🙏 It's our pleasure to serve you😃

scraped_reviews.content: It used to be a great app. Now they damn near strong arm you to either accept their free trial to monthly subscription or Uninstall. If I can't enjoy the basics for free. I would rather not have it on my phone. I'm thinking about creating my own makeup editor app for people to enjoy without all the ads and protected selections that require subscription..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Tonya🙋 Thanks for your review and using YouCam Makeup. We offer free tries to different premium tools from time to time, so some premium content is free to use for number of times a day😀 The subscription offers full makeup/retouch experience and is also the great support for us to keep optimizing YouCam Makeup.🙏

scraped_reviews.content: TMake up (including items like eyelashes) did not appear at all natural The colors were to bright in an unflattering way (for example, the pink was flourecent rather than a warm coloring). Also, I noticed the lighting seemed over exposed in many of the final pics. The colors and application techniques were utilized to compliment a certain skin tone etc. and honestly they just didn't really compliment the tone or features of my face. The models are incredibly beautiful!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. Will forward it to the related department for future consideration! Also, it is suggested to try different patterns and change the shape or level by adjusting the value bar. You may find the one you like after trying more times🙋‍♂️

scraped_reviews.content: I had this app when i was younger and I remember loving it. I decided to download it again to use the hair color changer only to discover that they made everything premium. You can still do some stuff, but only a little bit. If you want free reign, you have to pay, which is so stupid. I hate that everything is Freemium, they draw you in with a free app with cool features but you can't enjoy it unless you pay them real money. Not worth it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi 👋 Our app provides free & premium content.😀 Feel free to enjoy the free content without paying for it. If you want to try the unlimited premium features, welcome to start the 7-day free trial! If you don't want to continue, just cancel it before the free trial ends without any charges👉https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

scraped_reviews.content: I really do like this app. My first of many reasons why I like this app so much is because it's easy and has many options to choose from. I'm already beautiful but this app is fun to me, because I get to easily peek into how I could look if I ever wanted to which I don't. Being a female it's simply just fun and entertaining! It's really like a coloring book for yourself and whoever that's in your gallery 😉 😉😘

I'm really pleased with this app. I was using a different one for a year but didn't renew premium on it as it missed some essential features. YouCam Makeup app has ALL the features I want and it's a bit cheaper! I can do my makeup and hair in minutes. I'm still finding new features but it's much better at lip and eye detection than others. Well worth premium in my humble opinion.

Tried AI videos by paying with my money for the credits and one didn't work, it gave an error and said to contact support if issue persisted. I contact support and they're absolutely useless. I sent screenshots to which they said they never got it at first but when I resent them, they're saying they still can't refund. A scam app if you use money, i highly recommend only using the free features. Would rate 0 if I could. 👎

I mistakenly applied for premium and it got accepted and connected it to my easy paisa, I've been trying to cancel it for a while now and since the year is almost up I don't want it to reset and automatically pay again. dear developers or team, kindly allow me to cancel my membership and allow me to be given the option to decline the renewing option without this app doing it automatically. thank you...

This app is trash! the images with different hairstyles made my head look huge and moved my hairline back a good 4 inches. I tried to cancel before the end of the 7 day trial and even though I followed the instructions I never got an email confirmation to complete the cancellation process. I wound up getting charged and cannot get my money back. I guess that's how they make their money.

I'm 58 but look like I'm 104 and been dead for a month in photos. This app erases the wrinkles, uneven skin, dark circles, and fixes my giant nose. I can add a touch of lip color and blush that I normally wear but it won't show up in photos. It looks like me but better. A bit younger and less tired. Very easy to use. I deducted one star because the hair color options and background add ins look really hokey.

The app changes are definitely noticeable and disappointing. The AI enhancements actually do the opposite with a twist of extra. I didn't recognize the person in the photo darn sure wasn't me. There aren't many options for other beautiful skin tones. Definitely disappointed. If I cancel the app thats the date should be canceled . Don't let it run the trial period so don't like that it was canceled the same day I tried it,
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We’re sorry the app didn’t meet your expectations. Your feedback is very important — please share the details via Settings > Send Feedback so our team can review and make improvements. Our team will review it promptly, and our R&D team will track the issue to ensure it is properly addressed.

title: Revolut Business App
description:
Take your finances further with the account designed for efficiency, and built for business.

Revolut Business is the all-in-one account that helps you manage your business finances — with less admin, lower costs, and maximum efficiency. Track your spend, issue corporate cards and more.

Whether you're starting out or scaling up, boost efficiency and take your finances further  — with global payments, multi-currency accounts, and smarter spending. See for yourself why 20k+ new businesses join us every month.

Features 

Get started in minutes:
Apply directly through the mobile app by filling out a short form — it only takes about 10 minutes. 

Pay suppliers and teams globally:
Manage money in 30+ currencies, across 150+ countries — and save as you exchange at the interbank rate (within plan allowance, during market hours).
 
Simplify and control team spend:
Issue physical and virtual cards to your team anywhere in the world, and stay on top of your finances with spend limits and custom approval flows.

Automate expense management:
Capture receipts and categorise transactions seamlessly. Track team spend and export data to your accounting software to reconcile instantly. 

Plan for your business’ future:
Dive into analytics to track and forecast spend with precision, control all your companies, branches, and business entities from one app and much more to support your businesses growth. 

Download Revolut Business and simplify how your company manages its money.

Feature availability depends on plan selection. Subscription fees and T&Cs apply.

Revolut Business is the all-in-one account that helps you manage your business finances — with less admin, lower costs, and maximum efficiency. Track your spend, issue corporate cards and more.

Feature availability depends on plan selection. Subscription fees and T&Cs apply.

scraped_reviews.content: Super unhappy with the services of Revolut. I cannot deposit money on this account in any way, the deposits are not accepted or fail and the option of adding using a card is not available in the app at least for mine. No easy way to get help to solve the problem. Frustrating! Open is easy, but once you have a problem is a nightmare!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! Could you please contact us via chat? You can access via app in the Profile section, or via website by clicking on your name > Get Help > scroll down until you see "New chat".

scraped_reviews.content: Decided on 25th Feb to start charging users of free accounts £10 a month. Didn't use push notifications to announce it but buried it in email. You can mitigate your loss by upgrading your account for a one month free trial, getting a pro-rata refund on your account fee, sending it elsewhere, downloadimg your statements and closing your business accounts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,
We apologize for any disappointment caused by the recent changes to our pricing structure. If you require assistance or have questions, please reach out to us via the chat feature in the “Help” section of the app. Thank you for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: Opening an account takes forever. it took one full month to verify documents. every two days I keep opening the app to see if my documents are accepted. it's extremely frustrating. Personal identity verification is a night mare. The most unpleasant experience opening a bank account - it's traumatic! And wrt REFERRAL - I don't think anyone has won referral reward before the timeline! 😄 Its definitely a joke on users. A simple bank account+ third party international transfer just works fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We are truly sorry to hear of your concerns regarding your verification and referrals. To help us look into the situation thoroughly, please contact our dedicated support team directly via the in-app chat (profile>help>chat with us). Alternatively, you can, DM us via Facebook/X/Instagram or email us at help@revolut.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Recently applied for business account. I like it due to the security checks. They appear so much more robust and well thought out. Was able to set up quickly, just waiting for seed funds to clear security and im up and running. Thank you, Revolut!

Nightmare. Their processes appear to have gaps. You can only 'chat' with people who seem to want to get rid of you and give you false information. I was promised a problem involving several £thousands would be resolved within 6 hours. that was about a week ago. These FinTrch apps are OK until there's an issue you need resolving. then it seems to be painful, expensive and time consuming.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Sorry to see the disappointment you faced with our services. We'd like to take a closer look at this, so please feel to reach out to us via in-app chat by going to Profile > Help > Get more help and chat with us. If you're struggling to connect, or find the desired help from our in-app chat, please email us at business@revolut.com.

scraped_reviews.content: The app has a bug. If your transfer fails, there's no indication on the dash. From the main screen, if you click See all to view all transactions, you won't see it. If you click Tranfers at the bottom of the dashboard, then click Past, you see a page of transactions, if you then click See all, the page goes blank. You have to click on Upcoming or Draft and then back to Past for the full list to show up. Having done all that, it's hit and miss if it will include failed transactions. Do better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello. We apologize for the issues that you have experienced with our app.
We recommend you to kindly report this issue with our support team via the in-app chat. (Profile > Help > choose what you need help with > Chat with us) They will make sure to raise it with the technical team.
Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Despite its seemingly advanced technology, all the advantages of this app are completely overshadowed by the extremely poor customer support. It feels like the service is either run by a poorly trained AI or by very unqualified staff. As a result, issues tend to arise at the worst possible moments for business. My advice: stay away from this bank.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear about your unsatisfactory experience with our support team. We'd like to have a closer look into your case. Could you please contact us via private message on Facebook, Instagram or X with more information about the issue you're facing? You can also email us at business@revolut.com. We'll do our best to address your concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: Revolut Business, why can’t you just take my profile from regular Revolut? Why do I have to go through KYC twice in your buggy app? I tried both on the web and in the mobile app, uploaded my ID, passport, and selfie several times. And at the last step it always fails, freezes, and loops. I must have tried around 10 times and never got through to the end. Why can’t you simply save the steps that were already uploaded? Why does everything have to start from scratch every time?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We understand how frustrating this experience has been. Revolut Business is a separate product with different regulatory requirements, which means we’re legally required to run a separate identification process, even if you already use the personal app. Please DM us on Facebook, X or Instagram for further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a good bank and app. Our business uses it as a US account and it sends payments to Philippine banks instantly on the weekdays for a low price. It's not so good for sending over the weekends though. The rates are higher and it still doesn't usually arrive until after the weekend.

This app is ok until you have to deal with support. Or you discover you don't have the necessary functionality to pay your taxes because the app doesn't have the necessary field. As business, this is just not acceptable. Plus, you can't reach support to report a potential fraud if you ordered a card, that card arrived ahead of term and a fraud took place, the card was used in your neighborhood and the app sent the respective notification, but you d idn't receive that card.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We're sorry that your experience with our support team was not satisfactory due to the issues with your business account and the card. Please allow us to know more about this by reaching out to us via our social media channels (Facebook, Instagram, X), or you can also email us at help@revolut.com. And we'll do our best to assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Used this app for roughly a year and a half. All was fine until about 2 months ago. They changed the merchant tab and now you can now longer sort by date paid, only by date the invoice was sent, making it very hard to notice when new payments have come in. Seems to be a buggy mess now with UI problems all over the place. edit - still an issue 4 months later. told to email them with the email below and just get sent back here. poor support team and product development team.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there. Thanks for your feedback! We're sorry you're experiencing issues with the merchant tab. We understand the frustration with the UI. Please DM us on Facebook/Instagram/X or email help@revolut.com with a brief explanation on the issue and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: what should be a great app, I have used the personal app for years, did not translate to the business app. the KYC part is years behind other banks and apps. what can be transferred in seconds through zelle or something even same day ACH. Part 2 . it has been two full days now for a small $1500 transfer to happen between my own accounts!!! This would take seconds at any other bank. customer service claims "internal disruption". Don't think about it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We regret to hear your experience with our business app made you decide to part from us. Please reach out to our in-app chat: Profile > Help > Chat with us, or email us at business@revolut.com, so our agents can have a closer look into the issues you're facing with your verification and transfers.

scraped_reviews.content: Absolute pants. The functionality is OK- far from intuitive - but OK. However the compliance is officious (real "computer says no" stuff) and the customer service is non existent. As an example Ive had my business account restricted because it is asking me to upload documents that aren't relevant to my business (I.e. I don't have them) and trying to contact someone to get an explanation just doesn't work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear about your experience. As a regulated company, we have procedures that we can’t avoid. We uphold these to maintain the highest regulatory standards and protect the security of your account. Please contact us via chat by going to Profile > Help > Chat with us, or via email at business@revolut.com. We'll do our best to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Overall a great app with one gripe. Once you exit the app you can still see the last used screen on the task manager. Eg: if you exit the app on the balance screen you can still see the details in task manager where other bank apps show a blank screen. Otherwise a simple to use clear design.

Terrible app and customer service. I cannot find and email for them either. Message request don't show up on the app so there is no way on contacting Revolut Business when they send a message request as it doesn't show on the app
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're sorry to hear that your experience with us has resulted in such a review. Please reach out to us through our social media channels (Facebook/X/Instagram) so that we can investigate your case. Alternatively, you can email us at business@revolut.com, where our support team will be able to assist you. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Warning! Your EUR account and foreign currency accounts are the same IBAN number. I refunded a payment on September 30th because the wrong currency was deposited in my account. Update, November 1st, 2025: Revolut is incompetent. They have absolutely no means to control nor access actual information from their intermediary bank. My refused amount, superior to 5000€ is lost and unaccounted for. Horrible experience and shame on Revolut. Customer service can only apologize, but no definite action.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gaby, we're sorry to hear about the issue with the transfer. We would like to take a closer look at this. Please reach out to us via in-app chat by going to Profile > Help > Chat with us. We’ll do our best to help you. Thanks in advance.

scraped_reviews.content: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I’ve found Revolut Business to be one of the smoothest banking apps I’ve used for running my company. The app is very easy to navigate, and making or receiving payments has been completely effortless. Everything is quick, clear, and I get instant notifications so I always know what’s happening with my account. It’s made managing my business finances so much easier Highly recommend Revolut Business for anyone who wants a fast, simple, and efficient way to manage their business money

The Revolut app is so bad as to be unusable. it crashes and often it is impossible to log in because it freezes. Seriously, you need to employ a developer that knows what they are doing and redesign this piece of rubbish.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear that you’re facing issues with your log in due to the app crashing and freezing. Rest assured we will look into your case. Please, write to us at help@revolut.com. We will be able to help you as soon as we get your email. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: The camera which is used for transfers is very hard to get right I've given up on trying it spending far too long trying to do one transfer
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We are sorry to hear that you are facing difficulties making a transfer. Kindly report the problem on the chat so you can check this further - profile > help > support. We will assist as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Been using Revolut for over 3 years and love the app with no issues at all. keep up the good work team!
Just fantastic. Easy, lots of options depending on your needs and most payments are completed in seconds

Fantastic company. I especially like how they have someone call you to make sure things are going right. It's usually the same person helping with your account, great to talk to an actual person and have them follow up, instead of having to chase them, great service. 🫡👍
Impossible to contact. automated chat bot and loops that take you to multiple faqs that you have already read. Works fine as long as you don't have an issue. when you do. who do you speak to 🤷.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Riley,
Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the frustration in reaching our support team. Your comments are valued, and we strive to enhance our customer service. For assistance, please use the chat in the “Help” section of the app and type “Live agent” for human support. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Something is definitely wrong with the latest update. Says my passcode is wrong when it isn't. I even reset it and still same thing. Fantastic! Two businesses that I can't access now
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear that you’re facing issues with your login. Rest assured, we will look into your case. Please, write to us at help@revolut.com. We will be able to help you as soon as we get your email. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: STAY AWAY. In the end, accounts blocked for 11 days, at the end of which no reasons were provided. If you want your business to be paralyzed abruptly for "standard checks", use Revolut.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear that find our support poor and have faced limitations on your account without active information on the case. Rest assured we will look into your case. Please, write to us at help@revolut.com. We will be able to help you as soon as we get your email. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: Simple, fast and fair charges. Much better than regular bank. Extra annoying with review requests after I already left a review.
Simple onboarding, and a great experience so far. I've had no issues getting to know the app and the crypto element is great for overseas opportunities.

it was a bit stressful, I paid £30 a wk ago and you put it on another account, personal account which I don't even use. I didn't even know I had a personal account with you. but its useful really. I can pay my salary from my revolut business account straight into my personal account. I will need to open a savings account with you, can I open a savings account please, a savings account where I can just leave it and let it grow ?

it's Revolut... always best on every level... Best in private as well as business banking. No nonsense, no hustle, no unnecessary complications, just professional and quick banking. That's what we need, as well in private lives, like in our companies.
basic functionality is ok but if need to use Live Chat or move around the the app it is difficult. making payments is long winded. much better banking apps on the market.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi David. Sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction with our services. If you'd like to share more details about your experience, please contact us via private message on Facebook, Instagram or X. You can also email us at business@revolut.com, with a brief description of the issue you're having. We'll do our best to address your concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: rejected account creation with no elaboration, even when I contacted support, so I can't even try to fix it (and now I got a response here to contact support again, so I did, and got the same response, amazing waste of time)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We're sorry to hear that your experience with us has resulted in this review. Please email us at business@revolut.com and our support team will look into your issue and provide you with further assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic, easy to use Business Banking app. Revolut set up the business account within a day or so and it was ready to use right away. would recommend to any small businesses.
I've installed this app on three different samsung phones and none of them installed properly. you can only find and load the app via play store. not from your phone app / main screen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing issues with the app not working as expected. If you require more help, you can email us at help@revolut.com along with a brief description of the problem. Feel free to DM us via social media channels - X, Instagram, Facebook. We will assist as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Originally left a 4-star review but changed to 1-star. After using this service for 5 months without issue, Revolut arbitrarily closed my account without explanation. When I asked my rep for clarification she simply said, "Sorry, best of luck!" This company is opaque and unprofessional. Consider another solution before you build workflow around this app because they will termimate your account for no apparent reason and leave you scrambling to fix your operarions when you least expect.
Good & responsive support. Shout out to Ava in particular 👍 Also a smooth , modern app experience.
Best option if you need to regularly convert euro to gbp, and app is slick & easy to use
wow , sooooo fast in comparison to the other Dutch banks . customer support is also excellent. Can definitely recommend opening businesses account here.
Brilliant - simply brilliant! If you need a multi-currency account, Revolut is excellent. their business account is so good too!
I cant put the credit card in nfc conector. And the only way i can open the app is to go in play store, its not visible in my phone, its invisible.. 9/25 no change
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Paul. We're sorry to hear you're experiencing such issues with the card and app. Please contact us via DMs on our Facebook, Instagram or Twitter platforms. If you don't have this option, send an email to help@revolut.com together with this case ID GPS00062910 and a brief explanation of what you're experiencing. We'll be happy to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: many times i"m being asked to verify my identity with a photo and i have to take it 10 times until it recognizes me... sometimes basic aspects like downloading a statement for a payment just doesn't work - it says it will send it to email shortly but it never arrives.. Real support is almost never there, and when it is, it's not helpful at all..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there. We're sorry that your experience with us has led to this. Please report this situation to our agents from the in-app chat by going to Profile > Help > Chat with us, so we can assist you further with this statement and with your identity verification. Thank you for allowing us to improve your experience.

scraped_reviews.content: The Merchant integration declines 70% of Hungarian cards! The customer service assured me that they will solve it, then two weeks later that they cannot actually do anything. I talked with them multiple times. On every occasion the conclusion was: we will look into it, but no action or follow-up was made. 70% of our customers are calling us frustrated that they can't pay. I registered to RB as soon as it was made available in HU, but now we are going back to our previous online pos provider.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear you’re dissatisfied with the support you received regarding your issue, with card payments. We're always striving to improve, and would like to check this further. In case you’re not able to get help via the chat, please get in touch with us via our social media (Facebook. Instagram, X) or e-mail us at business@revolut.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Love Revolut, we set a company and had access to funds and transfers within a couple of days. We are still waiting for AIB business banking to be set up 3 months later... of it wasn't for revolut we would have had huge delays opening the new business....

Setting up a business account is so easy and straightforward. It was a very smooth and stress free experience and I loved that all three companies were opened without much problem or hindrances. As long as you have all the documents you need to open them account then it's so straightforward. I love it!!

A transfer to the US failed, support is waiting for experts for 48+ hrs to get to know the reason, and it is time sensitive transfer. Just go to a proper bank with your company instead, much better service. (support says it will take 14 days to fix, which is ridiculous, it is a simple wire transfer).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're sorry to see that you're having concerns regarding transfers. We'd like to check this further, please reach out to our in-app chat team for assistance (profile>help>chat with us). Alternatively you can, DM us via Facebook/X/Instagram or email us at help@revolut.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Really good user experience to set up the, the traditional banks could certainly learn a thing or two!
If I choose "not now" for enabling push notifications, then there is no need to ask it each time I log in.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello.
To disable notifications from Revolut, go to your profile in the Revolut app and go to ‘Notification Settings’.
Switch the notifications off by tapping the toggle (should now appear grey in-app).
This should ensure the notifications are off, and pop-up should not appear.
Should you have any issues, reach out to us via in-app chat.

scraped_reviews.content: onboarding is mostly easy but even when submitting the required documents and all is correct they do not seem to get validated
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, we're really sorry to hear you feel this way. We care deeply about our customers and are committed to providing the best support possible. Please reach out to us via the in-app chat (Profile > Help > Chat with us) or DM us on our social media platform (Facebook, X or Instagram). We’d love the chance to make things right.

scraped_reviews.content: Really easy to use and reliable. Also a real professional approach towards clients compared to other banks

Business app sends you into log in loop once you enter your details. Keeps asking for business name and then tells you the business is already registered. Tried all alternative methods to log in.. all of them redirect you to the app... have uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times, still didn't work. I have important transactions to make and now have been held up for hours. Chat support is only through the app, which can't be logged into because it's in a loop. No telephone number to call!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. Sorry to hear you're struggling to log in to your Revolut Business account. We'd like to have a closer look into your case. Could you please contact us via private message on Facebook, Instagram or X? You can also email us at business@revolut.com, with a brief description of the issue you're having. We'll do our best to address your concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: good app, good bank for businesses, but I can't give more stars. if you want to manage things on your laptop, the login process is horrendous and driving me absolutely crazy. Can't I log in once with my 2nd device and then just log in for the rest of the day?! the previous login process was bad, but it's getting worse and worse.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We're sorry to hear about your experience with Web App login. We understand how frustrating it is. Our login process is designed with security in mind. We're committed to improving user experience while maintaining security. If you need help with your login, please contact our business support team (Profile > Help > Chat with us).

title: Paramount+
description:
Stream exclusive originals, hit movies, live sports like NFL on CBS and UEFA Champions League, all of SHOWTIME® (Premium plan only), and favorites from CBS, Nickelodeon, Comedy Central, BET, MTV, VH1 and more.

- Watch full episodes on demand from hit series like Survivor, NCIS, SpongeBob SquarePants, Big Brother and more!
- Obsess over originals. Watch subscriber-only originals such as 1923, Landman and Star Trek: Strange New Worlds.
- Make every night a movie night with blockbuster hits and fan-favorite films from Paramount Pictures, MGM and more.
- Access live streams with around-the-clock news coverage on CBS News 24/7, scores + highlights on CBS Sports HQ and entertainment news on Mixible, plus 20 live channels of curated favorites.
- Create up to 6 individual profiles for each member of your household. Have kids? Use our Kids Mode profile feature. 
- Save your faves with our watchlist feature, My List. 

Get even MORE on the Premium plan:
- Watch ad-free* shows and movies.
- Stream your local CBS station live.
- Catch the best in live events including March Madness®, The Masters Tournament, The GRAMMYs and more.
- Stream all of SHOWTIME, including SHOWTIME East and West live.
- Download and watch offline*.

Try Paramount+ now. See prmntpl.us/SubscriptionPlans for more details on plans and pricing. Download the app to get started.

*Live TV includes commercials. Downloaded content is accessible for earlier of 30 days from date of download or 48 hours from start of playback. Content availability subject to change. Please note use of the Paramount+ app is limited to the United States. Paramount+ promotional offers for new subscribers only. Live TV subject to availability. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

Your subscription will automatically renew after any applicable promotional period and your Apple ID account will be charged the subscription price on a recurring basis until you cancel.  You can cancel your subscription at any time through your Apple ID account settings.  If you cancel your subscription, the cancellation will go into effect at the end of your current subscription period, as applicable. You will have continued access to the Paramount+ Service for the remainder of your paid subscription period.

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Paramount+ Terms of Use:
https://pplus.legal/terms

Paramount Privacy Policy:
https://privacy.paramount.com/policy

Children’s Privacy Policy:
https://privacy.paramount.com/childrens

Additional Privacy Rights:
https://privacy.paramount.com/en/policy#additional-information-us-states

Do Not Sell My Personal Information:
https://privacy.paramount.com/app-donotsell
