summary: Stream exclusive originals, hit movies, live sports and so much more.

scraped_reviews.content: Just started using this last month it's literally the worst streaming service I've ever interacted with. It's bugged so even as soon as the day you pay you fee, it'll give you constant pop ups about updating your payment method. Even though there's nothing to update and you paid 12 hours ago. It's also impossible to get an agent to talk to in the app support. Said "1 minute wait time" and 15 minutes later still nothing. what a joke. Canceling for how annoying it is
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear you’re having issues with the Paramount+ app. Our customer service team is happy to help. Chat with us at help.paramountplus.com by clicking the speech bubble icon. Keep us posted if things improve!

scraped_reviews.content: There's a few good shows and movies that are only available on Paramount+, but the app has more problems than any other streaming app. Even if I clear the cache or force close, I usually have to uninstall and reinstall the app to use it. Same issue on my old phone and my new. When it does work, it randomly crashes and/or fails to load the show. update 09/2025: still crashes forcing repeated ad watching over and over. support is worthless, only recommends the same stuff I already do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we understand your frustration and apologize for the streaming disruption. At help.paramountplus.com, you'll find troubleshooting guides or you can start a chat by clicking the speech bubble icon. Send us an update if this resolves your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: Another $8 spent on in-flight wifi to watch content I paid for and downloaded. I have never used a streaming app with more bugs. It freezes on the opening screen constantly, not even the home screen. It crashes regularly, and no, force stop/clear cache/reopen/restart phone doesn't always work. Even if you download videos, it won't open the app offline so good luck on flights. The Roku app crashes too. They pay for people to reply to reviews but not to fix the app, apparently.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we understand your frustration and apologize for the streaming disruption. At help.paramountplus.com, you'll find troubleshooting guides or you can start a chat by clicking the speech bubble icon. Send us an update if this resolves your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: It was working this morning then stopped working. I keep getting the error that the episode can't be played and to check the help page. I have done all the troubleshooting it told me to do and it still isn't working. What is happening on my phone happens on my Roku as well and at least once (if not more times) a day I have to restart my Roku. OVER IT! Get it fixed!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry you're getting error messages. You can find common fixes at prmntpl.us/ErrorMessageHelp and more tips at prmntpl.us/StreamingDeviceHelp. Need to chat? Visit help.paramountplus.com (click the speech bubble). Let us know if this works!

scraped_reviews.content: Because you keep harassing me to leave a review. Edit: The 1 star rating stands. I'm still constantly harassed about leaving a review. I'm also paying for the ad free tier but still getting ads at the beginning of every episode. Yes, Paramount/CBS, running an ad for your own content, is still running an ad. It's not surprising, though, when you consider the poor decisions all these streaming services/Hollywood have been making for years now.

Great until recently. Downloads don't play longer than 90 seconds without closing out, the app closes if an episode ends and you're using the smaller window to watch, watch history sometimes works but usually doesn't, and lately, I've been getting logged out everytime the app closes itself. Just like other streaming services, they've switched focus from users and functionality to profits and minimized costs, but have seemed to forget that the ability to watch is an integral part of the equation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Not to worry — we've got all the info you need to start streaming again at prmntpl.us/AppCrashHelp. Still need help? Contact us at help.paramountplus.com/s/contact-us. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Great content, but the app on a TCL TV is buggy as heck. Sometimes when we pick a show, instead of starting, the screen will turn black or grey and the show never starts. Once it does, when it's time for a commercial, the app hangs again and won't play the commercial. It's pretty bad, and I am not going to take time to contact customer service about this, that sounds like an absolute nightmare. I'll just cancel the service for a while.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. You can find step-by-step troubleshooting instructions at help.paramountplus.com. If you still need assistance, just visit paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: Had this app for two years or so, for free, and it was great. Last several months, it freezes on the splash screen of the Paramount mountain and that's it. Uninstalled and re-installed. Freezes. Updated. Freezes. Cleared cache. Freezes. I'm paying for it now, and we've been unable to use this, which I'm not happy about. What's the deal? You've got more aggravating bugs than Australia! How about fixing them? Isn't that what you're taking our money for?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're here to help! To improve streaming quality, you can find troubleshooting steps for your device, here: prmntpl.us/StreamingDeviceHelp. Still need help? Contact us at paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: We have this app on our TV, and the picture quality is iffy, the commercial breaks stall for several minutes before the commercials actually start. (And, can someone please explain to me why we are paying for a streaming service and STILL have to watch ads?) I also have this app on my phone, as, for a while, by casting to the TV, it was the only way to watch the shows without all the glitches. Now, the app doesn't go past the splash screen. Very frustrating!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear you’re having issues with the Paramount+ app. Our Customer Support team is happy to help at https://help.paramountplus.com/s/contact-us. Keep us posted if things improve!

scraped_reviews.content: The absolute worst streaming app on my phone and tv. I've had this on my phone for months, and I've never been able to watch anything. It always stays on the start-up logo page. On the tv, the movie will play but not without constant freezing. I thought that it was possibly my internet connection, but I have no problem with any other streaming services. If all of us users are complaining about the same thing, you all are clearly the problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're here to help! To improve streaming quality, you can find troubleshooting steps for your device, here: prmntpl.us/StreamingDeviceHelp. Still need help? Contact us at paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: Refuses to load for the past two weeks. I've restarted, Uninstalled/reinstalled and every other recommendation. Galaxy S24 Ultra with great internet yet they still suggest it's an issue on my end. It's already one of the poorest streaming interfaces, couple that with not working most of the time and it's no wonder most people only use it when it's free with something else. Do NOT pay for this; if you don't get it included with something else like Walmart+ it's not even remotely worth it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. You can find step-by-step troubleshooting instructions at help.paramountplus.com. If you still need assistance, just visit paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: I can't watch paramount on anything else but my phone. Lags so bad it'll just close the show/movie out and say, "Can't play this at this time." Even the ads lag and video is grainy to the point that I can't recognize the actors. After an hour, I get a blue screen.... app crashes then I move on to another streaming service because I'm not in the mood to reset my app every hour.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're here to help! To improve streaming quality, you can find troubleshooting steps for your device, here: prmntpl.us/StreamingDeviceHelp. Still need help? Contact us at paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: It's great when it works. App crashes/stops working MULTIPLE TIMES A WEEK. I have to uninstall and reinstall it at least 2 to 3 times a week at minimum. It's pretty ridiculous, and idk how this isn't fixed yet after a few YEARS of it happening. I always make sure to update it. It will open and just freeze on the blue screen that says paramount. That's when I know I have to uninstall and reinstall because it will not work until I do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry you're having difficulties with the Paramount+ app right now. Our Help Center has step-by-step troubleshooting instructions at help.paramountplus.com. If you need more assistance, we're here to help. Just visit paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE 1/30/25: Newest version of app doesn't even work now. No access through the mobile app, just the loading screen. Complete garbage, don't waste your money. Will be canceling service. Despite paying for ad-free, there are still commercials for paramount shows. Constant stream interruptions whether on wi-fi or 5g, the app randomly closes whenever it wants, and the user interface is spotty at best on most platforms. All in all, not a great user experience, and the performance is shoddy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear you’re having issues with the Paramount+ app. Our Customer Support team is happy to help at https://help.paramountplus.com/s/contact-us. Keep us posted if things improve!

scraped_reviews.content: In addition to not being able fully access all the promised features of the premium subscription, you can't even get all the shows. Now, you pay for Paramount+, which used to be CBS All Access (and the app worked when it still was). Now, Paramount+, even the top tier, does not include Paramount content... 🤦‍♀️ Going back to cable is starting to look like a better idea than streaming.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear about your experience and we'd like to make this right. Please contact our Customer Support team at https://help.paramountplus.com/s/contact-us or visit help.paramountplus.com. Hope to hear from you soon!

scraped_reviews.content: The commercials are excessive and are not timed very well - most TV shows have a natural commercial break built in, but those don't get used. The player doesn't work very well, sometimes several minutes get cut off after an ad break. and the main page of a show always defaults to the first season, not the season currently being watched. Downgraded to one star because the response to my review was to suggest I spend more money, not be concerned that the service being sold is terrible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for your feedback about the issues you're experiencing. Your insights are valuable, and we're dedicated to enhancing the app's performance. Our Help Center has step-by-step troubleshooting instructions at help.paramountplus.com. If you need more assistance, just visit paramountplus.com/contactus. We appreciate you reaching out!

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty disappointed that I choose to pay for a year subscription. While there is good content, it's a coin toss if the app will crash and freeze up or if you'll be allowed to view the selected show. The app glitches constantly on the TV and mobile apps. The only consistency is that the app is not going to work at some point. Is it asking too much to watch without having to troubleshoot, restart, clear cashe, uninstall/reinstall or any other IT step by step.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we're sorry you're having difficulties with the Paramount+ app right now. Our Help Center has step-by-step troubleshooting instructions at help.paramountplus.com. If you need more assistance, we're here to help. Just visit paramountplus.com/contactus. Let us know if this fixes your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: Though this app has improved from when I first started using it, it's still annoyingly buggy. On the TV, it occasionally hangs and fails to load, requiring a force quit to get it to work again. It also often "forgets" that I have the highest tier subscription and disables fast-forward and rewind, even when watching subsequent episodes of a show. Streaming quality has improved but still hangs or studders occasionally when I don't have this problem w other services. Should be better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We’re sorry to hear you’re having issues with the Paramount+ app. Our Customer Support team is happy to help at https://help.paramountplus.com/s/contact-us. Keep us posted if things improve!

scraped_reviews.content: EDIT: Glad I got a free trial to come back. This is THE WORST streaming app. Bad controls. Bad at tracking your place if you leave. Just, bad. It's quite frustrating that every single time I start up the app, I have to click to continue watching my show, then click again to actually resume, then click AGAIN because it goes back to the home page. But only once - it's not random...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we understand your frustration and apologize for the disruption to your streaming. You’ll find easy troubleshooting guides here: help.paramountplus.com. For further assistance, reach out at paramountplus.com/contactus. Send us an update if this resolves your issue!

scraped_reviews.content: Great movie and series selections, but, absolutely horrible with the amount of commercials. I've never in my life seen so many commercials on a paid app!! I'm not even kidding when I say there must be up to 20 or more commercials per movie or episode!!! and you want money for that???? It is absolutely ludicrous! unbearable I want to literally remove my eyes or rather not watch anything they offer!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your feedback. Paramount+ offers a Paramount+ with SHOWTIME plan, which gives you access to on-demand content free of ads (Live TV has commercials and few select shows have promotional interruptions). You'll also enjoy access to your local live CBS station, the ability to download shows and movies, plus so much more.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: keep getting a "payment method needs updated" screen even though i already went in my account and put in a different card with plenty of funds. App works great, has movies and shows I've wanted to see but couldn't find (or had forgotten about). Downloaded this for the 1883 series and planned to cancel when done but I've kept it around because of finding more and more to watch.

title: Stumble Guys
description:
Grab your friends and play Stumble Guys, the fun free-to-play multiplayer party royale game!

Compete in fast-paced knockout games with up to 32 players and race through cool obstacle courses and chaotic elimination full of action. Play now and become the last player standing in Stumble Guys, the ultimate online multiplayer party game experience!

💥 JOIN THE 32-PLAYER ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MADNESS
Call your friends to battle and race in fun knockout games full of action! Dodge giant snowballs, jump over lasers, and make sure to dash through all games — but don’t fall or clash!

🌍 EXPLORE 60+ EPIC MAPS FOR ENDLESS FUN
Dash through obstacle courses, jump over crazy traps, and play against your friends and other players - every map brings a new set of thrilling action games and surprises!

🏁 PLAY TOURNAMENTS & CLIMB THE RANKED LEADERBOARD
Run, clash, kick, and fall to survive in competitive battle games, collect points to climb the Ranked leaderboard, and unlock cool rewards!

🎨 CUSTOMIZE YOUR STUMBLER
Unlock and collect thousands of skins, emotes, and more for free! Become a ninja, superhero, or even a chicken - you craft your very own look to win these cool multiplayer games in style!

🔥 LIMITED-TIME EVENTS & EPIC CROSSOVER COLLABS!
Jump into special events featuring the best game modes like Floor is Lava and Banana Bonanza, or expand your collection with legendary stumblers from SpongeBob, My Hero Academia, and more.

📱 CROSS-PLAY ON STEAM & MOBILE!
Play Stumble Guys with your friends on mobile and Steam for free! Join battles anytime, anywhere, in this fun, cross-platform online action multiplayer party game.

Ready to stumble and brawl with your friends? Download Stumble Guys now on mobile and play the fun multiplayer knockout game for free!

summary: Fun knockout battle royale, play with your friends!

scraped_reviews.content: This game is so fun, with so many events, little side games, and just the normal games. There are tons of skins, abilities, emotes, to use. There's just a few things keeping this a 4 and not 5 star game. #1 Its so laggy. Idk if its just my device but I get kicked out of like a quarter of games. It also randomly freezes and I comes back, and I am dead. It makes it hard to progress. #2 It is SO hard to get the final tier in ranked. It's last one standing and my lag doesnt help. Not too many ads :D
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joshua Canfield! Thank you for sharing your feedback about the fun elements and your concerns with lag and ranked challenges. We aim to improve the game experience based on player input, and your insights are invaluable. Remember, ads help keep Stumble Guys free-to-play. Greetings from the Stumble Guys Team!

scraped_reviews.content: This game certainly has an interesting history. From 2021 through 2022, when the game was widely enjoyed, it seemed to offer a more balanced and accessible experience. However, with the addition of new abilities and advantages, the gameplay has evolved. For instance, the "hug/push" ability appears to be excessively powerful. I kindly request that you consider re-evaluating this ability, along with others, to ensure a more balanced gameplay experience. I'll also slip in the missing 2. 🌟
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Anis BAKIRI! It's wonderful to hear your thoughts on the game's evolution! We truly appreciate your insight regarding the "hug/push" ability and its impact on balance. Your feedback is invaluable as we work to enhance the experience for everyone. Thank you for sharing your perspective! Best, Stumble Guys Team

scraped_reviews.content: Stumble Guys is one of the most addicting, detailed and thrilling game that I have ever played, to be honest. The different game modes and ways you can play are endless, making it a fun game to continue playing over and over again. I especially love the Ranked section, where you earn rewards as well as climbing to the top of the leaderboard. Another plus is that you can make custom games, and play with your friends. You can "design" your own character and it's abilities. Overall, worth 5+ stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your amazing feedback, Braelyn Oberbroeckling! It's fantastic to hear how much you enjoy the gameplay modes, custom options, and the excitement of the Ranked section. Your thoughts are invaluable in helping us improve the game experience! Cheers! Best, Stumble Guys Team

scraped_reviews.content: Stumble Guys is an absolute blast! It’s super easy to jump right in, and the wild, wacky obstacle courses always make me smile. The bright, colorful graphics and goofy characters add so much charm to every game. Whether I’m playing with friends or just goofing around solo, it’s always a good time. It’s the perfect game to lift your mood and have some carefree fun whenever you need a break. Totally one of my favorite games to unwind with!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi TrixFordYT! It’s wonderful to see your enthusiasm for Stumble Guys! The vibrant characters and graphics really do make the experience special. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us enhance the game. Here’s to many more fun-filled moments with friends! Best, Stumble Guys Team

scraped_reviews.content: I really love this game. It's great fun and I could play it all day.You can really tell how much effort was put into making the maps. However, there is quite a lot of lag for me in the first and last round in particular. Also, an idea I have is adding a practice mode as one of the rounds I really need to perfect as I've never qualified in that map. Otherwise I live this game so so much 😁
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Scarlott Tomalin! We’re delighted to hear you love the fun and effort behind the maps! We appreciate your feedback about lag and the idea for a practice mode—it's incredibly valuable to us for enhancing the game experience. Enjoy your gaming! Best, Stumble Guys Team

scraped_reviews.content: The game is well made, the model design is high quality. Its colorful, playful and engaging on a high level and very competitive. The main issue however is how demanding the game is in terms of performance. It is a laggy game and will sometimes crash during a game. My device is powerful enough to handle some CPU intensive games but this one is quite a challenge.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Maynard! We are sorry to hear that you are having issues playing the game. Please contact us through our support guide https://stumbleguys.helpshift.com/hc/faq/14-how-can-i-contact-support-team/ to assist you further. Thanks for your time!

scraped_reviews.content: i don't understand some things; the Daily wheel, it's a scam, when it's about to stop and reaching a good skin or whatsoever, goes too fast or too slow. in conclusion, it's a flippin' scam. Also, why did the number of trophies needed increased so much? So unacceptable! And the prices for the skins and emotes, etc? Gone right up! And now sometimes it jumps when I don't want and doesn't jump when I want! And the parties always lag! no offence, but you don't deserve 4 stars, Scopely! you deserve 2!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Asher Chua! We're so glad to hear you're enjoying Stumble Guys more! Your feedback about lag is important to us, and we truly appreciate you sharing your thoughts. Thank you for being a valued part of our community! Best wishes, Stumble Guys Team

scraped_reviews.content: I am rating this game low not because it sucked, it's actually fun but the purchases in this game are unreliable and honestly scammy, I purchased this skin called the metalwing for like 250 INR, it's not much and that's why I opted for it. However, after the purchase the item never showed up in my inventory or in the customize option. I tried contacting their support team about it with valid screenshots of the recent event but they were of no help at all, trully disappointing. Instant uninstall
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Arnav Mukherjee! Thank you for sharing your experience with us. title: Kick: Live Streaming
description:
Kick’s a live streaming platform where creators kick it with their communities. (Yeah, we said the thing…)

Our creators march to the beat of their own drum, as do we, disrupting our opps with a 95-5 subscription split, our creator incentive program, and the freedom to multistream.

That’s why the likes of xQc, Amouranth, and MaxHolloway all pick Kick.

For viewers, it’s the fear of missing out that compels them to tune in, the chance to be part of internet culture, all in real-time and ad-free.

but lets be real, no one reads these, so if youve made it this far, at least give the app 5 stars. it will good for my performance review. thanks <3

P.S. Peep the boring stuff at kick.com/terms-of-service

summary: Kick is the fastest growing application for live streaming.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible App in the past month. No amount of uninstalling and reinstalling this App makes it work anymore. It will stay on for about two to five minutes then crash. Restarting it gets another five minutes then another crash. So many people on Discord are complaining about the same issues but resetting the App isn't working anymore. Just use the website. This App has constantly been a pain, in one way or the other, ever since it was first made.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback and please ensure you are on the latest release version. We're continuously working to make the best streaming app out there. If you have any additional feedback or suggestions, we’d love to hear from you to further improve our application— please join our community on Discord: https://discord.gg/6VzymFdyfd

scraped_reviews.content: Everytime I close the app and open it back up, it makes me re-sign in, which means I have to get a code from my email. Doesn't matter if it's 2 minutes or a day. Chat constantly freezes. Streams freeze often. The picture quality is nice. There is no place in the app I see to report technical bugs, which is dumb. On top of that, it eats battery like crazy. Makes the phone hot, worse than if I were playing a graphics intensive game. Switching from portrait to landscape is a total mess

Doesn't work. 3 devices, 2 of which are brand new, same issue. Fresh install. Physically incapable of clicking log in and sign up, nothing happens when clicked. If you click it as many times as you can as fast as you can, it might pop up- and fail to log you in when typed out. Close out the login menu. It pops up again. Why? Because you had to click it as many times as you can to get it to pop up, so good luck closing out the 5000 login pop-ups one after another. Just close the whole app.

The app had problems before. I was hopeful the latest update would fix it, but it's gotten worse. The video auto-switches between portrait and landscape if I turn my phone, even when I have autorotate turned off. My place in a VOD is no longer saved, so every time I go back to a long video, I have to find where I left off. Also, a few times, it's made me sign in again even though I never signed out.

It was working great, but they broke it with a recent update. The picture-in-picture feature is gone, it takes forever to load, and the back button doesn't work. When I go to Followed streams, it only shows the ones that are currently live. The ones not currently streaming don't show up anywhere. I can't imagine why they would release their program with so many things broken that had been working fine.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We've passed this to our developers. If you have any further suggestions or feedback, please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: Straight up garbage. Recently did an update and it's worse than before. Doesn't hold your spot, closes randomly, functions work less than half the time, the entire app and website freeze mid-stream, signs me out all the time, and is a general nightmare. If it wasn't for a couple channels on here exclusively, I would've dumped this trashfire. That being said, if you would fix these basic issues, I wouldn't have a problem.

I don't have settings, so I can't change my username, bio, profile picture, banner, or update my social media links. Which really sucks because I want to follow people & possibly stream as well without having to use a different email to sign up with in order to have a different username, profile picture, etc. Also when I try to add an underscore to my name for a different account, it doesn't allow me. Those are my only issues with Kick, but it's a huge one because it makes the app uninteresting

I can't log in through the app. I tried with my email and my username. I get a message stating, "Failed to fetch". Reset Password from within the app is also broken. But I have no problem logging in through the website. Update: I uninstalled and reinstalled the app. All the same issues as previously stated. I'm guessing that the developer has dropped the ball on this endeavor and are abandoning it altogether, at this rate. Sad day. ☹️

I would rate this much higher but for now it's still kinda broke. You may know of these issues, but I don't know what you know. So, that said, here are my issues. ANDROID: 1: Auto rotate is broken. Screen flips but will not flip back without closing/reopen app. Also, lose tools/boxes. 2: Typing in chat, then not for a bit, keeps us from being able to type again. It's almost like it's loading the option to type. 3: When in a channel, the back button exits stream. Should minimize instead. 💚💚💚

The app will not allow me to register for an account nor will it let me log into an account. The website is not working at all, either -- the app and the website both show error messages, and the app shows rows of code when trying to sign in as an error message. Not sure what is going on, but this needs to be fixed a.s.a.p. Edit: Now that I am able to finally log in again, there is no way to edit or change my profile. I cannot change my photo, background, or add a bio. Settings are inaccessible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. Your profile will be available for editing in an upcoming version of the app. In the meantime, please use the browser version of Kick to update your account settings :)

scraped_reviews.content: Apps junky and really just functions at a basic level. Can't follow other users. Get an error message to wait several mins. Had trouble with signing up and registering an email, as the form wouldn't let me submit, despite being filled out. Ended up just using Google credentials to create an account (which I loath). Can't update profile or add secondary email address, etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your detailed feedback. We've passed this to our developers. If you have any further suggestions or feedback, please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: The app is garbage. It logs me completely out of my account every single time I close the app. I don't use my Google account and I'm not interested in doing that, because that's a personal account. That might have something to do with it, but there's no reason to log me out every single time I close the app. I use long complicated passwords, otherwise my accounts get compromised, so I have to write that down. Constantly looking up my password and verifying the login is too much of a pain.

Edited: Apparently the actual problem is you can't sign up with an email containing a period, which is far less stupid than what I thought the problem was, but that's still pretty bad seeing as having a period in an email isn't all that uncommon and I've never come across this issue before. Also the app wouldn't let me set my birthdate because it kept gltiching out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We'd really like to try and get this sorted. Can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com including information that will help us identify and rectify the problems you're experiencing.

scraped_reviews.content: Man this app needs a lot of work. I can log in just fine on any browser. But if you try to log in on the app, the app completely crashes. Using 2 different android devices, a tablet, and a phone. The app crashes everytime. Restarted both devices still crashes. Open up browser and log in no problem. Try again on the app, it crashes. Hard to see this as a serious streaming competitor when you cant even use the application.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We'd really like to try and get this sorted. Can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com including information that will help us identify and rectify the problems you're experiencing.

scraped_reviews.content: Watching live streams is usually OK, but the VODs are horrible. It never saves your place (in app or in browser, mobile & PC) and if you close the app to do anything, like turn off an alarm or answer a text or call, it closes the video player without saving your spot. This would be a little more bearable if VODs could be play picture in picture like streams can, but for some reason, they can't
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your detailed feedback. We've passed this to our developers to look into adding in a future version of the Kick app. If you have any further suggestions or feedback, please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: For anyone having issues during account creation on the mobile app, make sure the first letter of your email address is *NOT* capitalized, as it causes an error. I had to contact support for this info, but hopefully it's not a problem for much longer. The app is a little buggy and does not yet have full functionality, but that should be better with time.

I can't even use the app. I get a message saying: "To finish setting up your account, please choose a username and enter a birthday." I already made my account, so when I put the Info in, it knows that's already a taken name. I literally cannot use it. There's no other buttons on the screen just 2 boxes to type in and a save option. Please fix
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We'd really like to try and get this sorted. Can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com including information that will help us identify and rectify the problems you're experiencing.

scraped_reviews.content: Everytime I try to log in it tells me to finish setting up the account. I enter in my username but it says it's taken so I enter in a completely new one, that works. On the next screen I have to accept the terms of service, when you select the button it shows a loading circle and then nothing happens. Please fix your app if you really want people to move to this platform. How are people expected to check it out if they can't even get past the log in screen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate that some users experienced difficulties when trying to register for a new account. This issue has now been resolved. If you're still experiencing issues, our 24/7 support can be contacted by emailing support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: My first review was a 1 out of 5 due to the login issue when we first got the app. But now that I'm in it, I pushed it up to a 3. The app works, but the chat is buggy. The chat freezes when you type more than 5 words and crush the entire app sometimes. Also, there are no settings yet. I'll also love to see an option to stream through the app for the people who play mobile games. I feel like that would help build the user base for Kick if they can stream directly through it itself, if possible
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your comments. We just released an update, can you please let us know if this fixes the issues you've been experiencing. If not, can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: It's nice there finally is an app, but it has some problems. Once I start viewing a stream I cannot exit or go back to browse without fully exiting app. Also, chat is not available or viewable in landscape mode. (Android tablet) It would be nice if it had a chat sidebar when in landscape mode like that "other" streaming platforms application.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We've passed this to our developers to fix in a future release :)

scraped_reviews.content: The app is extremely buggy! Won't react with any of my phone navigation buttons, will freeze up when i try to back out of a video, most of the time will freeze up when i try to type anything, the chat typing bar appears cut in half underneath my screen keyboard (have to keep closing my keyboard and retap to type), sharing icon won't add the share link (only text), the whole app will freeze up for about 90% of the time, no matter what i do within the app (i have to keep restarting the app)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We've passed this to our developers. If you have any further suggestions or feedback, please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: Right out the gate I couldn't use the app, I downloaded it and tried to sign up for an account but regardless of how many times I filled out the necessary information it wouldn't let me press the button to officially sign up. After being forced to use a gmail account to sign up I tried to click on my profile to start making changes and the app refused to take me to my profile screen. So I deleted it after all that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We'd really like to try and get this sorted. Can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com including information that will help us identify and rectify the problems you're experiencing.

scraped_reviews.content: The app crashes too much which I can deal with but it doesn't give you the option to block another user. Meaning that when you're in a chat room and you want to block a user's comment it'll give you the option to block a user but it won't do anything. You'll still be able to see their comments. The twitch app doesn't do that. Also there's no back button
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We've passed this to our developers. If you have any further suggestions or feedback, please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: Logs me out. "Fails to fetch" my password. I will give up for days at a time. When I come back I have to update the app and then enter a code from my email to sign in. Get stuck on loading screens. The sound is there, it's loaded, just glitched when I actually try to watch. I force close the app, re-open and Im logged out again. Sometimes I pay cash to watch archives of streams after they happen elsewhere just to avoid having to deal with the stress of using kick for free.

Terrible. Settings don't stick, buggy performance, inputs don't do anything, and worst of all, when watching a stream, it doesn't tell my phone I'm watching something, so it'll dim and eventually lock my phone. Also, opening a stream and then going to my home page, it still plays in the background, but there's no video and no way to silence it without opening the app again and then stopping the stream, or force closing it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thank you for your comments. We just released an update, can you please let us know if this fixes the issues you've been experiencing. If not, can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: this app is just awful and they never seem to fix it. half the time I can't click anything, I can't watch vods with my phone sideways, the app won't even let me login, constant crashing, also when watching a vod if you switch out of the app it kicks you complety out of the video. I get that it's "newer" but this is ridiculous.

I had one star for not being able to log in at first, then couldn't full screen and you couldn't use other apps as you watched the livestream. They fixed all that, it's pretty much almost the same as twitch now so I don't mind it as much anymore Edit 11/1/23: They changed the way full screening streams are. They have gray bars on the side, makes the experience ammoying

Back button does not work. Mute feature doesn't work. Still see folks after I mute. No reply function in chat. At times when I load the app the chat is solid black but can see the chat a little. Clips, video, and info tab under stream isn't showing. I have to close the app out and reload it to see it. Clips don't show half the time. I've been using website on mobile more now. At times the app freezes my phone and I have to do a hard close to be able to take control back of my phone.

I struggled to make an account, but managed so it's a plus! But the issue I'm dealing with is the app is not allowing me to follow anyone or change my profile picture or any edits onto it. I'm currently just a sitting profile account. It keeps saying "please way 5 minutes" each time i try following. I've been try for over an hour. Kick please fix this
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We'd really like to try and get this sorted. Can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com including information that will help us identify and rectify the problems you're experiencing.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is honestly terrible. It's not representative of kick streaming because kick streaming so far is pretty damn solid, but this app needs some serious work. Sometimes you can't follow people you would like to follow, it just keeps popping up to try again in 5 minutes. When you are in a live stream chat and you minimize the livestream and then return to it, all hell breaks loose. Sometimes you cant type, sometimes the screen is dark, and sometimes it freezes all together. Please work on it.

I got the app to open once. Tried to set up an account. But the sign up button would never go green or turn into a button to click. When I setup an account via PC there was a verify password box that's not on the app. Now I'm unable to log in to the account I created. The app will not open anymore. Uninstaller twice already
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We'd really like to try and get this sorted. Can you please drop us an email to support@kick.com including information that will help us identify and rectify the problems you're experiencing.

scraped_reviews.content: Unfortunately signing up for an account through the app is really bad. I can't select a birthdate. It just keeps opening the window to select a date. Also it takes forever to actually get to the proper birthdate because you have to keep pushing a button to go back to the proper month. Someone really needs to fix the sign up process through the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your feedback. We are aware that some users experienced difficulties when completing their Kick account registration or signing in. This issue has now been resolved. If you're still experiencing issues, our 24/7 support can be contacted by emailing support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: It's ridiculous how slow and clunky this app is, at least when comparing it with the Twitch app. Which says a lot cause their app is pretty bad as well. Problems I'm having include: Freezing streams, being unable to back out of a stream to the main page, turning a phone sideways doesn't look right and doesn't show the chat on the side, having to click a stream multiple times for it to actually go to the stream, there seems to be a pretty noticeable delay when sending a message into chat.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your detailed feedback. We've passed this to our developers. If you have any further suggestions or feedback, please drop us an email to support@kick.com

scraped_reviews.content: This app is hot trash. Every update either doesn't fix the issues or makes them worse. I can't type in the chat. When I somehow manage to by closing a stream and reopening it, I can't toggle between my keyboard and the chat field. So I can't even edit what I type. I'm a generous reviewer but this is beyond frustrating. This is my first ever 1/5 stars.

this app really needs contestant updates and bugfixes, but there's none.predicts keep disappearing. says the streamer is offline suddenly but they aren't. closing and getting back to the app becomes another bug itself sometimes! app asks for login when I'm already in, etc. restarting the app doesn't fix anything most of the time. even clearing cache which shouldn't be the ultimate fix sometimes doesn't work. you really have a long road ahead already, don't let users down.

title: OfferUp: Buy. Sell. Simple.
description:
Buy, Sell, and Letgo. OfferUp and Letgo have come together to bring you an even better mobile marketplace. Whether you are looking for treasures to buy or used items to sell, OfferUp marketplace is your largest mobile marketplace for buying or selling items locally.

Buy, sell and shop deals on thousands of unique items near you locally! So whether you want to make some extra money by selling your used furniture and car or want to do some secondhand phone, tv, computer, clothes and shoes shopping, the choice is yours with OfferUp mobile marketplace.

OfferUp mobile marketplace makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads, garage sales and thrift stores -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your local community or neighborhood. Join the recommerce movement with a mobile marketplace you can trust for all your secondhand shopping. Find amazing deals on used cars, used clothes, secondhand shoes, vintage fashion, used electronics and more!

See how simple it is to use OfferUp

- Buy or sell anything; easily offer up your used or new items for sale in 30 seconds. Buying new items or selling your old furniture, used cars, secondhand clothing, vintage shoes and other items becomes easier with OfferUp!
- Find great local deals and discounts on secondhand clothes, shoes, used furniture, vintage fashion, thrift finds, cell phones, electronics, baby & kids items, sports equipment, used cars, home goods and more.
- Connect confidently using OfferUp's marketplace reputation features like ratings and profiles to build lasting trust.
- Shop local items for sale or swap with thousands of new postings daily.
- Message buyers and sellers securely from within the app.
- Build your reputation with your unique seller profile page.
- Browse and shop items by image and sort by category or location.
- Join millions of people using OfferUp across the country.
- Enjoy garage sale or yard sale finds without the hassle. OfferUp is the simplest way to buy and sell locally. Thrift stores are in the past now with OfferUp marketplace where you can do your shopping faster and easier.

HOW CAN IT MAKE YOUR LIFE EASIER?

1- With OfferUp you can easily sell anything locally like clothes and shoes, used cars, electronics, vintage fashion, and furniture.
2- OfferUp shows you what’s selling nearby in your local community.
3- Communication between buyers & sellers happens through the app via secure messaging.
4- OfferUp is better than a garage sale; it's a mobile marketplace and shopping store in one. You can do your shopping right on your phone or tablet.

JOIN THE COMMUNITY!
We’re making local shopping and selling an experience that everyone can try and trust. The community at the heart of our marketplace is what makes that possible. When you join OfferUp, you’re joining millions of people helping each other make money and save money around the nation -- and right in the neighborhood. This is recommerce powered by community. No more looking for garage sales or thrift stores near you. OfferUp marketplace is here for you to find your next best treasure whether it is a second hand furniture, used phone, second-hand car or vintage clothes and shoes. Or if you simply want to sell your used car, secondhand phone or old vintage clothes, get on OfferUp and start your selling journey.

From vintage sneakers and shoes to used cars, vintage fashion to used couches and furniture - unearth unique secondhand treasures and thrift store items that you can’t find for sale in any other local store or marketplace. OfferUp marketplace is not associated with Facebook Marketplace, Mercari, Poshmark, eBay or Craigslist.

The two leading mobile marketplaces in the U.S., OfferUp and Letgo, are joining forces to create a new powerhouse. OfferUp acquired Letgo on July 1, 2020.

OfferUp is not associated with Facebook Marketplace, Mercari, Poshmark, eBay or Craigslist.

Buy, sell and shop deals on thousands of unique items near you locally! So whether you want to make some extra money by selling your used furniture and car or want to do some secondhand phone, tv, computer, clothes and shoes shopping, the choice is yours with OfferUp mobile marketplace.

OfferUp mobile marketplace makes it easy to find great deals on the things you want and make money on the things you want to sell. Ditch the Classified Ads, garage sales and thrift stores -- this is the best way to buy and sell in your local community or neighborhood. Find amazing deals on used cars, used clothes, secondhand shoes, vintage fashion, used electronics and more!

scraped_reviews.content: I definitely haven't become happier with the app as time has gone on. With the recent addition of pop up adds after every action, I can say my user experience has reached an all time low. I'm sorry the garage sale community isnt profitable OfferUp, but your not gonna make it better by driving customers away with popup adds. edit: 2 years later, I return, and my opinion has not improved. as soon as my viewing of an item is slowed down by an ad popping up, I don't wait, I close the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your experience. We’d love to hear more and work towards resolving this for you. We hope to serve you better in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: An app used solely by scalpers and hustlers, as no one seems to find my listings to be fair prices when I am eating massive losses on brand new open box items. if you want to sell your items at a fair price to anyone who will actually *use* the item for their own personal use, good luck. edit: after having one prospective buyer on something they seem to not get back to me so its also has people that say they're interested in your item and they're most likely bots. Or idk. buyers but also not

We hope to serve you better in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: Formerly good, now enshittified. Full of nonskippable fullscreen commercial ads. Many, many ads from Temu, Amazon, etc. hidden among the real ads. Keeps notifying me about items I searched for months ago. No longer shows description with photo. Changes my search settings to shipping when I ask for local only. It's clear that the company's first priority is not making their app useful, but rather to extract money as quickly as possible. It's not working - I just go to eBay or Craigslist instead.

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible support and selling experience. My listed items (game consoles/accessories) would be hidden from search results with 0 views after 3 days, with no explanation. I contacted support and all they did was remove my item, saying the listing violated "something" in the posting rules or community guidelines (nothing more specific than that). I asked what rule, because I honestly had no clue, even after reading both documents thoroughly. Support did not get back to me.

scraped_reviews.content: App is buggy as hell when it works and nag you with random notifications trying get you to buy stuff. There is no way to turn off these specific notifications without turning all of them off. They refer to them as search alerts and price drop notifications. Also they block VPN connections, which makes things less secure in general. And cant verify card bc their stupid scanner reads the number but wont verify it, what a PITA. I cant buy anything shipped anymore.

There are DEFINITELY a few iratataiting and inconvenient things they could definitely improve, and I would appreciate it if they did!!!😉 They need annoying automatic deactivation for accounts with no activity or upkeep.bIt is incredibly annoying when you see something you want and you inquire but NEVER GET A RESPONSE back (for months if not longer). There are some accounts that are still active from 5 years ago and never change

scraped_reviews.content: I liked OfferUp when I found it years ago but this app sucks now. It loads so slowly, opening listings takes a minute sometimes (same result on multiple devices). After my first minute or two of scrolling a full-screen ad covers all of the listings, I wait the 30 seconds and press (x) and it jumps me out of the app to the ad's website instead of closing it. They also disguised temu ads as listings so I accidentally clicked them and got sent to temu's website. Not worth using anymore.

They allow businesses to spam postings so other individual postings get buried and their ads are intrusive and deceiving. They make the ads look just like postings so you don't know if you're clicking an ad or an actual posting. Just use FB Marketplace, Craigslist, eBay, or Mercari to shop and stay away from this one. They have too many things to fix. No wonder they laid off a portion of their employees recently.
