title: Amazon Music: Songs & Podcasts
description: We're changing the way you discover and play the music you love. Listen free to music and podcasts with ads—no credit card required. Prime members can enjoy all the music + top podcasts ad-free. Want more benefits? Get 100 million songs on-demand, ad-free top podcasts, and audiobooks with Amazon Music Unlimited. Included with your Prime membership at no additional cost: • All the music ad-free • The largest catalog of ad-free top podcasts • Discover new music and podcasts based on your likes • Shuffle play any artist, album, or playlist Amazon Music Unlimited: • Unlimited access to 100 million songs • Pick and play any song, ad-free • The most ad-free top podcasts • Access the largest catalog of audiobooks • Listen to one audiobook each month • Listen offline • Unlimited skips • Experience our fast-growing collection of spatial audio Or listen to free streaming music, no credit card required: • Thousands of stations and top playlists • Millions of podcast episodes • Discover new music and podcasts based on your likes • No credit card required Import your playlists: • Move existing playlists from other music platforms to Amazon Music in a few quick steps. Learn more at http://www.amazon.com/playlistimport My Music: • Listen to music you’ve purchased from Amazon – MP3s or AutoRip CDs/Vinyl. Your Amazon purchases are stored for free in the Amazon cloud Wear OS features • Access your favorite music, right from your wrist • Play top recommendations, songs from your library, or search for your favorite artists, albums, playlists, and more • Use your watch to cast to and control playback on compatible Android devices • Download your Playlists and Albums onto your watch and listen to them in Offline Mode when you're on the go Visit us at: www.amazon.com/music/unlimited www.amazon.com/music/prime www.facebook.com/amazonmusic www.twitter.com/amazonmusic www.instagram.com/amazonmusic
descriptionHTML:
We're changing the way you discover and play the music you love. Listen free to music and podcasts with ads—no credit card required. Prime members can enjoy all the music + top podcasts ad-free. Want more benefits? Get 100 million songs on-demand, ad-free top podcasts, and audiobooks with Amazon Music Unlimited.


Included with your Prime membership at no additional cost:
• All the music ad-free
• The largest catalog of ad-free top podcasts
• Discover new music and podcasts based on your likes
• Shuffle play any artist, album, or playlist

Amazon Music Unlimited:
• Unlimited access to 100 million songs
• Pick and play any song, ad-free
• The most ad-free top podcasts
• Access the largest catalog of audiobooks
• Listen to one audiobook each month
• Listen offline
• Unlimited skips
• Experience our fast-growing collection of spatial audio

Or listen to free streaming music, no credit card required:
• Thousands of stations and top playlists
• Millions of podcast episodes
• Discover new music and podcasts based on your likes
• No credit card required

Import your playlists:
• Move existing playlists from other music platforms to Amazon Music in a few quick steps. Learn more at http://www.amazon.com/playlistimport

My Music:
• Listen to music you’ve purchased from Amazon – MP3s or AutoRip CDs/Vinyl. Your Amazon purchases are stored for free in the Amazon cloud

Wear OS features
• Access your favorite music, right from your wrist
• Play top recommendations, songs from your library, or search for your favorite artists, albums, playlists, and more
• Use your watch to cast to and control playback on compatible Android devices
• Download your Playlists and Albums onto your watch and listen to them in Offline Mode when you're on the go


Visit us at:
www.amazon.com/music/unlimited
www.amazon.com/music/prime
www.facebook.com/amazonmusic
www.twitter.com/amazonmusic
www.instagram.com/amazonmusic
summary: Listen to podcasts, trending playlists, hit music and your favorite songs

scraped_reviews.content: I have Amazon Music Unlimited and it does not shuffle the songs. I have over 400 songs on just one playlist, and have never heard half of them. I use the app a lot, on my echo, phone, and in the car. I always use shuffle mode, but it doesn't work, it plays the same group of songs over and over. My 1st playlist doesn't show up for me to add songs to it anymore. These problems needs to be fixed or I'll have to think about changing to a different app.

This app is really great if you have the Premium subscription but then once my free trial of that ran out, the quality of the app decreased dramatically. Like, technically - it doesn't even work right. It will play two songs and then just stop and say "restarting station" and then I have to close out of the app entirely to get it to restart and then it plays the same song I just listened to. It did this to me three times in a row the other day and I got so frustrated, I switched to another app.

The app itself functions well. If you cancel your service, make sure you do it at the end of the subscription period. Otherwise, Amazon will cut it off and keep your payment. This is the only subscription service I've had that still does this. Hadn't had this occur in quite some time. Not surprised though, Amazon is not an ethical company.

There are probably worse music apps out there but this is the worst I've ever had to use. Navigation is awful, every screen interacts differently, sometimes it won't let you play a SPECIFIC song you have purchased and downloaded - I have to start the whole album at a different track and skip forward until it gets to the one I want. If I sold music this is the last platform I'd want it on, it's a small step up from just "doesn't work"

App closes or crashes regularly. This used to happen occasionally but has become a common occurrence lately. Subscription is great, and the library is huge, but not being able to listen to music without needing to restart the app is horrible. Please fix this problem! Update as of 2025, app crashes continue to be a problem. it is unclear why the app will suddenly stop working, but relaunch and can listen until next crash. minutes to hours. The behavior seems like a way to force me to see ad's

I've been a satisfied Amazon music user for 7+ years and this new update is going to make me switch to some other app. Absolutely terrible, no more option to add a song to your library, only an option to add to a certain playlist. I don't use playlists, I prefer to just put my whole library on shuffle, if I can't just add songs to my library without adding it to a playlist, then I'll be finding a new streaming service to use.

EDIT: this app absolutely is horrendous and has been going into a steep decline for at least a year now. Offline music? Nope. They claim its there but a simple Google search is going to show you thousands of complaints otherwise. Traveling? the music you purchased back home is no longer available. Use a different service. great. reinstalling it twice a week. four times today alone. reporting the app. if you wont fix it get rid of it.

I switched to Spotify. I was listening to my podcasts on here to keep my music and podcasts separate. Amazon would skip around on episodes, so if I was listening to a multiple part episode, it might not go in order. Then, it would frequently freeze on a screen where I couldn't go to the specific podcast to find the episode I wanted. It would just repeatedly start the wrong episode.

This has been busted for years. Crashes randomly. You're prompted to upgrade evey time you open it, even with an existing, paid unlimited subscription. If you follow an artist, you still won't get notified when they release new music. Randomly have songs become "unavailable", so you have to search and re-add them to your playlists. I could go on... there's so much. -100 stars for the entire Amazon Music service.

Used to be my favorite music streaming app. Now it just constantly plays songs we've "thumbs downed" or disliked instead of playing different songs. Does this even when you create a new channel with a different artist or song. Also plays the same songs over and over and over again. It never used to do this until somewhat recently. If I could cancel the subscription I've had for over a decade and get a refund I would, but unfortunately I paid for the whole year up front like usual.

Update: negative 10 stars. I can't use the "artists" tab. It gives an error and is just a neverending blue circle. I hate this app with a burning passion. It has logged me out and deleted all my downloads, and that's just the start of the problems I've had with this app over the years. It's the only way I can play MP3s I bought from Amazon, so it's my only choice to listen to music I PAID FOR. I'll never purchase another album from Amazon. This app is as useless as you know whats on a boar.

The music selection is great. Everything else not so. The app crashes at random times. When choosing a song, you have to click the song two or three times for it to register. Shuffling a Playlist with a bunch of songs is pointless because it plays the same songs everytime. It also takes a long time to load regardless if on wifi or 5g when starting up.

The music selection is good, but the UI is really frustrating. I don't find it intuitive at all, buttons often don't do what I would expect, and it takes too much effort to just get to things like a specific album you want to listen to. Examples: listening to an album and click "Add to my music" should favorite that ALBUM, right? No. It will add each song individually to your My Music page. I listen to lots of different types of music, and I do not want them all blended into one giant playlist.

Weird app. I tried it as a free trial from prime, but it messes up A LOT of the small stuff. I don't have issues with music quality that others have noted, but it's definitely an app that just "doesn't work" more than any other I've seen. Some standouts: sorting is not available aside from some prebuilt options, which is wild. It also will randomly CHANGE the order. If a song plays in a new playlist, it will split it out of the album, breaking the order. It sometimes just has to be reset too

App library is excellent, but accessing the right music is a pain. First, finding a specific album is a long convoluted process. Second, suggestions don't let me tailor my likes by saying "don't suggest this artist", so this feature is more annoying and spammy than useful. Third app has to be in airplane mode for downloaded titles to be visible or work without major delays. Finally, and somewhat off topic, there's always a "skip" at the beginning of the first song played, in any device.

App stops while I'm driving after it's already connected to my car radio, you MUST ONLY shuffle albums and can't select a single song to listen to without paying for it, and it forces me to listen to podcasts when I open the app, and don't listen to anything but music! -100/10 Go to spotify or pandora, it's the same concept but for free, and they don't pretend to sell you something besides commercial free music, which is exactly what they provide, unlike Amazon!

The recommendations are usually good. I've been using the app for years now and some changes made are a pain. I have the Unlimited plan and so I have Playlists with hundreds of songs in them. They removed the quick select which makes it more time consuming to find the song I'm looking for. Also, I like to play it from my TV sometimes and the TV app is such a disappointment. I selected a song from a Playlist, but you're not able to do that and they aren't #ed which makes it hard to find the song.

Lately after playing a couple songs, the app just stops playing in the middle of a song and the only way to get it to go again is to close the app, wait a while, then open it again and pay another couple songs before it stops again. So annoying!!! And the problem is on mobile AND PC. Why do I pay for the music service when it doesn't even work? I'm ready to cancel because this is too annoying and a total pain in the rear to deal with. Who only listens to a couple songs at a time? FIX IT!!!

It used to be a good app for Prime members. Then they got greedy and started limiting functions to only Unlimited members. You can't even do certain things with music that you have purchased. They limit the number of tracks you can skip. You can't start a song over. There is no longer a repeat button. When you hit shuffle it always plays the songs in the same order. I don't see a need to pay for an Unlimited account just to have access to a bunch of music I won't listen to.

Several bad design choices ruin my fun with this app. For example, when you search a song, it automatically will autoplay other music afterward without letting you go back to the song you searched for! I can’t go back and listen to the one song I searched for for some reason, and it's the bane of my existence with this app. Even with the "previous song" button, you have to search it again. Idk why they thought not being able to go back to the song I searched for was a good idea.

It's pretty expensive for what I get. It crashes too often, putting songs into playlists is glitchy and takes a couple tries, it's slow, the lyrics are occasionally wrong, and isn't very eye appealing. Now, I use it on a daily basis and deal with it, but it begins to tick me off when I go into another app or just do nothing and it crashes, I have a LOT of patience and it's really testing me. And why get greedy and make it so we have to pay MORE for unlimited? We already pay enough for Prime. :/

it was very okay a few years ago. The most recent updates have broken some of the more conventional functions. Want to hear the top played songs of an artist? Here's are 2 and then a bunch of random autoplay of artists that are very loosely tied to the genre. Want to make a playlist? Have some of your hand-picked songs from albums with versions you wanted to avoid and then lose half of your playlist because "reasons." And there's the classic app crash. It's aight, guys. Try Spoofy instead.

The offline option has all but vanished in new versions. Several times, I've downloaded new music before heading out to no signal locations to relax, and the music is nowhere to be found, and what is found that's old won't even auto play. Just one song at a time. You also have to disable data for the app to even load if you're without a signal. This function has really gone downhill. Great app if you have access to data otherwise. App crashes a lot when used on Android Auto. Unusable some days.

I have been increasingly frustrated with Amazon Music. I used to be able to play songs on repeat and my playlists played songs in the order I set them up in but now it "shuffles" them and changes over to non-playlist songs after about 2/3 of the original playlist. I pay enough for my Prime membership as it is and I am unwilling to add a $10.99 per month Unlimited subscription to get these types of features, if it offers them at all. Streaming usually runs smoothly unless you are outside.

They're bold as hell tryna charge as much as they do for this service, it SUCKS. Adding music to a playlist is difficult and very glitchy, the algorithm is trash and either leads you to a completely different genre or only plays one artist. I'm only in it for the free trial because Alexa hates other platforms, I might pay for it if it were $4/month. Not $13. They need to get it together at that price range.

App works fine for the first 10-12 songs lately, then after that, it freezes with the loading loop spinning and spinning.... It is not my wifi as I have a 2 gig service. I am paying for a service that now only plays about a dozen songs before freezing up. Pandora is beginning to look better (and free) every day. That's where I have to go after this app. Locks up! First ad's in my prime video (or pay more) now this. My go-to's seem to be going away!!!!

Just a few things that I don't like about this streaming service. First of all, they dont properly shuffle ALL music from an artist. Every single time I use the shuffle function, it ALWAYS plays the same first 5 songs. In addition, they only play music from the top 3 or 4 most popular albums. That's not shuffling. My second complaint is when I want to "queue" a song, I expect it to play NEXT, not after the 30 pre-determined "shuffled" songs.

Horrible Interface! I searched and found a song and wanted to add it to a playlist. The options available are limited to adding to "my music,"then you have to go to my music and find it again, but you can't search for it because you get the same limited options. So I have to find it in a list of songs - hundreds of songs. Once you sort this list and manually find the song, you will have many options, including add to playlist. I added an artist to favorites, I have to select each song to delete

CRASHES CONTINUALLY! I have a subscription and yet when first launching the app it will crash 4, 5 even 6 times before it'll play even the 1st song. I've resorted to just closing the damn app and going to YouTube music of which I don't have a subscription but suffering through ads is a hell of a lot better than suffering through Amazon Music crashing multiple times just to get the app started!! PLEASE fix this so the app is actually useful!! Thank you.

I mainly use this on my Echo to listen to music at home, or Bluetooth while driving. It has become so bad the last year. Between randomly deleting my songs, price increases etc. However the last couple weeks whenever I say 'alexa shuffle my amazon music' instead of shuffling my downloaded songs it's playing random stuff I've never even heard of nor enjoy. Extremely frustrating, will be canceling. Idk how amazon can charge people so much and be this bad.

App won't load songs even with a good connection. Only plays-sometimes-music that has been downloaded. Interface is clunky and is neither straightforward nor clear in its operations. Overall, Amazon Music needs an overhaul in both design and operability. I hate to abandon Amazon music but the algorithm and interface make Apple and Spotify the clear winners in this space. Update: Amazon Music's algorithm and interface have always sucked. I even have a playlist entitled "Amazon Interface Sux A$$"

The app constantly crashes and the shuffle starts playing the same songs over again. Also, audiobooks and podcasts should not b options before songs. Hate having to scroll over to find all my songs when that is the first option u should have. The increase in annual price does not just the performance of the app. There should be a price decrease.

Recently this app has gone way down hill. It has since deleted all of my downloaded offline music with no warning. That's over 100 songs completely gone. I don't even remember what all I had. When I would use my offline playlist, it would take 20minutes just to get through one song due to buffering. I will be finding a new place to play music if these issues cannot be fixed in a timely manner.

it would be nice if the app actually saved your settings and the pin button actually worked. I found a new band yesterday that I really wanted to listen to today so I searched them up and pinned them, since the last thing that you listened to doesn't always show up the next time you open the app, but as usual it didn't work and I can't remember the name of the band. it's hard to believe that any app wants you to pay for something that they can't be bothered to make work correctly.

I have purchased hundreds of mp3 and mp4 songs over the years. It's impossible to find my music and play only that. I do not like Amazon adding similar music when I play one of my song lists. If I shuffle my song list, Amazon adds similar music that I did not select. I do not subscribe to Amazon music. The subscription is too expensive and I am cutting back on all types of subscriptions. Everything is a subscription now. Totally UNAFFORDABLE. I get tired of the constant pop-ups.

Amazon Music Unlimited is a terrible app. I use an S9 and the app is unstable. It crashes at least once or twice a day. It frequently fails to load music, just endlessly working on a song until I give up. It gets messed up when I press the back icon and will sometimes quit to the homescreen instead of going back to the Amazon Music home page. I keep meaning to quit the app and get something else. I just don't feel like going through the hassle of rebuilding a music selection. I'll do it soon.

The really frustrating thing about this app is that it will periodically erase your pre-downloaded prime play lists for apparently no reason. This always seems to happen right before I'm about to get in the car or go running (no wifi). Their suggested fix to uninstall and reinstall the app made it worse...it deleted all my saved off line songs. So frustrating. update Nov 25 things have only gotten worse. the app won't update with my most recent purchases. I really need to find an alternative.

I love the music choice and the interface, but the music will just pause all the time and you have to reopen the app and it will play again without pressing anything. I've switched phones, providers, states, cleared the cache, it is just a product of the app and it is the most frustrating thing. literally the most important thing a music app needs to do is play the music.

generally a pretty decent app, but seems to have some stability issues. it will close itself out, sometimes for no reason at all, sometimes possibly because i opened another app at the same time? and then hang when I try to reopen the app. I also despise the 60 minute "are you still listening" timer. it would be nice to have the option to turn that off. otherwise it's been better than some other ad-based music apps.

Update: after today's update, the app is now working again. I enjoy the Amazon Unlimited music service and was hoping I wouldn't have to cancel. But it would also be great if they could keep the app from breaking so often. Previous review: For about a week now, the app would open but not play music. With the latest update, it won't even load now.

This has officially become the absolute worst commercial music player app. Every time you open it with an internet connection, you get a bright subscription ad pop up across the screen. Playlists are a pain to create or access, both online and offline. You can't even manually import your separate music files to be played through it offline. That's a *basic* feature. Amazon executives, why do you bother with music distribution anymore if you're not even going to try?

Great selection, but back to being glitchy again, continuing to crash even after being uninstalled and reinstalled. Frustrating when paying for this. In fact, it just crashed again as I am writing this review. It seems like it is an afterthought for Amazon, unfortunately. And one day later, songs are disappearing from my playlists, which has never happened before.

This app is good. Finding music I like is easy, purchasing even easier. The suggestions are relevant. I would give it 5 stars if they would add a wish list or a search history. Something to make it easier to find songs I didn't have the money to buy the first time I found it. Update: Still none of that and the app likes to get stuck playing 3 songs over and over. Even when telling it to play a specific song. Edit 2: Now it likes to start out any shuffle with the same songs eveytime.

After suffering for 3 days of no music the app is finally working again! If you were affected by the 11-6-25 update like I was, try uninstalling the app, restarting your phone, and then reinstalling the app. For days I kept doing this and today it FINALLY worked and the app is functioning normally again. If you're like me and can't survive without music, I strongly suggest a backup app to use when Amazon music inevitably crashes again. I love SoundCloud for this purpose.

It used to work good. But over the last few months I rarely can get it to make it two songs without an issue. It just stops. Glitches. Freezes. Suddenly the seek arrow won't work. Or you cant pick another version of, like a live song once you've picked one. It will just stay on the first one you pick. Cant stop ot unless you back out. I dunno....sorry for the bad review it I hardly use it because I know it will just frustrate me.

This app is trash. You want to shuffle ALL your liked songs? Nope, same 20 over and over. Want to search for something new to listen to? It shows you what you want, but never loads the song. Want to manually switch the order of your songs in a playlist? Good luck, it's a frustrating mess of an interface and never saves the order. This is the app you use when you want to listen to music but really you want to put yourself in a bad mood. Amazon should have stuck to being a bookstore.

Too glitchy! So many things are wrong with this app right now. I click on an album or playlist and it doesn't load. I can't edit my playlists. It will randomly stop playing music for no reason. Years ago I loved this app, but it had gone down the drain. Crazy that a major company like Amazon can't get it right with this app. Definitely not worth paying for Unlimited. Once my promotional period ends, I'm canceling my subscription.

This app sucks as a music player. Amazon's website has an amazing selection of songs for purchase on their website. If you quickly save the downloaded mp3 file somewhere on your phone's local storage, you can actually access the music you've paid for. If you rely on this stupid app, half of your music will never show up. And they say it's "downloaded", but your music is nowhere to be found on your phone's local storage. They only care about locking you into a paid subscription forever.

I love the way this app is set up to work. Song selection, song library, playlist creation all those options are great. However this app has a new problem every day. If it would play music and work the way it is supposed to it would be a great app, but it doesn't work without freezing or constantly glitching out. I have had the app for at least 4 years and it has never worked right. I rarely manage to make it through a shower without a problem. If they could work out all the bugs it would be 100

Update: They have made the app near impossible to use for those of us who prefer to purchase music. Very disappointed. ******* I hate streaming music and find it too limiting for my needs. If you prefer searching and purchasing those hard to find songs Amazon is the only thing to use. Unlike Apple products, Amazon will not insist on taking over your devices. ***** Update 11/2025. It's worse now.

title: TREBEL: Music, MP3 & Podcasts
description:
TREBEL Music is the only free music app that let's you listen to your favorite music offline, on-demand, and anytime!

Make music better with TREBEL!

TREBEL Music is the ultimate music app for you! It's a free, offline music player that lets you discover and download unlimited music anytime, anywhere.

With TREBEL Music, you can easily find your favorite tracks, artists, and albums, or discover new ones with our curated playlists. Choose from new releases or all-time favorites, spanning genres like Hip Hop, Pop, EDM, Rap, Country, Latin, R&B, Reggaeton, and more.

 Wherever you go, music follows: Download music for offline listening and save your data for other adventures. 

Break out of your musical routine and find your new musical obsession with our immersive, smart “Discover” section. 

Shake up your soundtrack and expand your musical horizons with our instant playlist creator, powered by AI. 

Unleash your inner DJ! Enjoy on-demand playback with unlimited skips and  without limitations such as shuffle-only modes. Create and share your playlists to match your unique vibe. 

All of your songs, one place: Easily import your existing mp3 music library into TREBEL! 

TREBEL is a licensed service with the best music in the world.

HIT US UP BELOW!
www.trebel.io
descriptionHTML:
TREBEL Music is the only free music app that let's you listen to your favorite music offline, on-demand, and anytime!

Make music better with TREBEL!

TREBEL Music is the ultimate music app for you! It's a free, offline music player that lets you discover and download unlimited music anytime, anywhere.

With TREBEL Music, you can easily find your favorite tracks, artists, and albums, or discover new ones with our curated playlists. Choose from new releases or all-time favorites, spanning genres like Hip Hop, Pop, EDM, Rap, Country, Latin, R&B, Reggaeton, and more.

Wherever you go, music follows: Download music for offline listening and save your data for other adventures.

Break out of your musical routine and find your new musical obsession with our immersive, smart “Discover” section.

Shake up your soundtrack and expand your musical horizons with our instant playlist creator, powered by AI.

Unleash your inner DJ! Enjoy on-demand playback with unlimited skips and without limitations such as shuffle-only modes. Create and share your playlists to match your unique vibe.

All of your songs, one place: Easily import your existing mp3 music library into TREBEL!

TREBEL is a licensed service with the best music in the world.

HIT US UP BELOW!
www.trebel.io
summary: Play Music Offline, Download Songs, Discover Trending Playlist, Mp3 Audio Player

scraped_reviews.content: Great app to find music offline or online. I will say that they don't have all the music/songs that you might want to find there. I went looking for some specific songs on there, but they didn't have it, and I was highly disappointed. But I love how it works both online as well as offline. And I do find most of the songs I like on here, so I will give it a 4xstart rate.

I've been using this music app for three years now, and I must say it is absolutely incredible! They have countless songs and versions to choose from, all genres of artists, and you can download most of your favorite songs for free on wifi to then listen without internet. Unlike most other apps, it only gives on ad before playing and you can listen for hours or days without another ad, and plays them when downloading songs. Other than that, utterly amazing music app to use! Highly reccomend :)

I don't love it as much as I did before, when it was free but I understand. The bills have to be paid and I still love it. It's cheaper than other music apps. The only thing I wish is that, The TREBEL app could be added to "Android Auto" So I could control it and see it on my Ram 1500 screen like I Heart Radio, You Tube Music, and many other music apps. Hopefully this is in the works and will be available soon ?

It is a good music app, I use it all the time. the only thing is that you have to download your songs before you can even play them. you only get a preview of some of the song, this makes it hard to find new music. also, the lyrics search the web when you click them???? why???? it's good, but it needs a lot of changes. they also need more music because I can't download one of my favorite songs by Olivia Rodrigo because y'all don't have it. overall though, it has more goods than bads.

Better than most other MUSIC APPS I've tried...I love that I can download the songs to my phone instead of just being stored in "my library" in the app..It's not full of unwanted ads, that's not to say there aren't any ads at all but they aren't overwhelming and you get rewarded for watching them..last but not least, with other music apps I've had trouble finding at least one or two songs at some point but that's not the case with Treble....I've found every one I've searched for. THANKS!!

I've been using the app for years now and when they say free, they really mean it. the ads play every now and then but it's not that bad. the only thing that makes me mad is that sometimes I have to close the ad manually so if I'm about to drive then I have to dangerously close it while going the speed limit. please fix this treble. other than that, I love this app so much. <3 edit 10/14/25: after rating the app, I've been getting ads after every single fricking song now. :( help.

In my opinion the app works very well for its sole purpose of listening to music, you can listen if you don't have wifi– by downloading the songs. Not every song/artist is available which is a little sad to the ears😔🥲 but you can search most of the songs you'd like!! Very few ads except for those that randomly pop up when playing music every once in a while, and for things like getting tokens. The organization is neat and not very confusing to learn– do try it out though, see how you like it!!

I've had this app on multiple phones, I think it's amazing, the ability to play music while offline is a game changer for me while I kayak down the river where others signal cuts in and out, I have my spare phone already in offline mode and I don't have any issues. Would rate a solid 5 stars, but app Has a tendency to play the same songs over and over again while on shuffle mode, I probably have a couple hundred songs downloaded and it will often play the same 50 songs repetitively.

I needed an app to download songs for free, and this is pretty good! some of the songs sound a little weird, but it might just have weird settings on or something. they don't have every song ever, but u are able to request songs! plus, there's not a million ads just to listen to a single song! there's actually very few ads! I really like this app!

great app to use offline, I've been using it for about 3 years and no problems so far I only get 1 ad a day depending on the moment usually it just skips over anyway. But since I've been on so long I had collected a fair amount of gems and coins and now there's a hugeeeee amount missing, usually I wouldn't care except you need coins to do certain things.

It was great for about two months! But now, whenever I try to listen to music (offline or on) it does this weird thing where is skips every single song I've downloaded and only plays "Yeah!", which is weird because that's the one song I don't remember downloading 9/4/25 Update that whole skip every song thing is fixed now, and the only other problem I ran into was getting logged out every time I close the app, and even then, deleting and then re downloading treble fixed it. Love it

Trebel Music Downloader is hands down my favorite music app. The fact that it’s totally free, with no hidden subscription fees, makes it unbeatable for listening wherever I go. I love being able to store songs in the cloud and also have the option to download for offline listening without paying a cent. It has tons of underground artists you really can’t find anywhere else, which keeps my playlists fresh and unique. The “download top songs” button is awesome, and making and sharing playlists wi

I downloaded this because it was highly recommended and has options for offline play. I expected ads and that is fine, but ads every 1 second is ridiculous. The app cannot even download one song completely without 5 or 6 ads interrupting it. I can only imagine how it is when you try to listen. Based on other user's reviews, you need "coins" to listen to your playlist. Also lots of crashes and loss of data in your lists. Sounds like more trouble than it's worth. I will be seeking another option..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shannon, thanks for giving TREBEL a try and for sharing your experience 🙏. We’re sorry about the excessive ads and crashes — that’s definitely not how the app should work. Please email us at hello@trebelmusic.com so we can look into what’s happening and help improve your experience 🎶.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't know what happened with the updates, but it has erased the 10,000+ songs I had downloaded over the last 4 years and at least 100+ songs that were queued for download. All I have left are songs the app is importing from my phone. The update has also taken the imports and renamed the tags for those imports. I am thoroughly upset because that was a library that had taken years to build.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Jay! We’re really sorry for the frustration this caused. The latest update should fix the login and retrieval issues, so please make sure you’re on the newest version of TREBEL. If you still notice problems, email us at hello@trebelmusic.com so we can help right away. 🎶

scraped_reviews.content: The best I have found. Not all my Favorite songs are downloadable yet but more and more are becoming available everyday. Best offline player I have found yet. Don't forget to log in to your account on wifi or using your data and make sure your most recent songs are the ones you want to hear offline line because the app only holds 20-3o songs (your most recent ) for offline play. Which is cool with me. it is a free app and I've never paid a dime and enjoy it. and to Trebel creaters, TY

I've been using this app since 2024, and all I can say is it's been absolutely amazing and only continues to get better. There are no add unlimited downloads, and you get to listen to your music offline . transferring to another device is very easy, and overall, I would highly suggest it is better than most music platforms. and what's even better is it's all free it's like premium Spotify but 10 times better.

Seriously an amazing app. the adds are few and far between, and it is so easy to download music. I also love the way the handled like, the making of the playlists (idk how to really word it) it is in my opinion better than Spotify. the only sad thing about this app is that they don't have the biggest library. but honestly I found enough of my favorites that idc. also the really big thing... GUYS THEY GIVE YOU A COUPLE DAYS OF THEIR PREMIUM FOR FREE IF YOU DOWNLOAD SONGS!!! like, what. 10/10 fr

the ads that are shown are before playing, they are relatively short. Also, while playing and listening to playlist, you will not get any ads. However, offline you can NOT make more playlists, ir download more songs, but you can listen to music offline. Overall, this is a great app and holds up to it's standers.

My favorite music player in the store. Works very well and I have to say thank you to the developers for making this music app possible. Trebel has albums that no other music app has.... and I am not kidding..... this app is superior to any other music app.... just download the album like me and continue or repeat to another or you can just play the one that you just downloaded..... Trebel is logistically the best!!!!! Thank you again to the developers for creating such an amazing music app!!!!!

I love the app and all its features. specifically how I can actually listen to music without worrying whether or not it'll take my data. but there is one down side, somehow without anything source of Internet data or wifi I still have ads I thought it maybe it was just a small mess up but I get ads every other song now. I don't mind it but I think maybe that's a problem. especially when I'm doing the rewards for no ads.

it works really well and I enjoy it. it took me awhile to find a music app that would genuinely allow me to listen to music without it blaring tons of adds like other apps such as Spotify when you can't afford premium. update from 25: it did get a bit laggy and it took me a moment to log back into my original account, but so far it has been pretty decent still

It's on my Galaxy S25 Ultra & I LOVE it!! It's WAAAY better than Spotify, which plays ads after every 3 songs +/-!! So I decided to try this app & I LOVE it!! 😍😍 However, I turn off my screen to save battery & it turns back on with EVERY song!!! I ALWAYS use shuffle each time I go on the app BUT it plays ALOT of the same previous songs & I'll have to skip songs. Is there any way to fix these issues? And also I had won 7 days of free pass & I think it ONLY gave me 4!! What gives?? 😡
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Susana, we’re so happy to hear you’re loving TREBEL! 💛 Sorry about the screen lighting up, shuffle repeats, and the free PASS issue — that’s not how it should work. 🙌 Please email us at hello@trebelmusic.com with more details so we can take a closer look and help you out! 🎵

scraped_reviews.content: LOVE this app! Has a variety of artists and genres, lyrics for most songs. Play dloaded music from library while surfing the web, checking your social media, or even from your lock screen! Great app with great perks. Earn FREE trials of Treble Pass after reaching milestones. Treble Pass, btw, is amazing!.. super fast downloads, no ads! Basic/free version DOES have ads, but they're short and exit or close on their own. Give it a TRY‼️

I enjoy the app. I really do. But there is a VERY big issue that needs to be fixed. TREBEL is deleting my music data and signing me out when I restart my phone. I am currently using the Samsung Galaxy A14, which is running Android 15 and Samsung's OneUI 7.0. I have tried to turn off all optimizations for the app, in hopes that it was automatic cache clearing or file management that was the issue. After hours of troubleshooting, I have concluded that it is likely the app itself that is the issue.

This is by far the best music app available to download! It doesn't need connection to wifi to play the songs already in your library, therefore uses none of your data. I downloaded this during the pandemic and never looked back! I sincerely thank these creators for not only making this amazing app, but stay improving it. You guys are the best ❤️

I used to be paying for Spotify, but they started to jack up their prices, so I found this one during my search and I'm really digging it. You can't go wrong with the price, I wish they had a way to automatically payment, but that's okay. I hope they keep adding music, podcasts and videos. It's worth the download, you won't be let down. Keep up the good work.

Itss got everything I need in music at the tip of my fingers. The downloads are super fast and although there are ads, Im still getting my songs downloaded as they are playing. That's the best part. You don't have to wait for ads, they work together. Any artist or song I've looked up is in here . Doesn't continue to use your data once you've got your music, you can do everything else you need to online while listening offline. Completely awesome!

I have had this app for years. It's the best option I've found for a simple way to download and store music. Listen with or without service, save data, there is rarely a time I can't find a song I'm looking for, tons of free perks, and easy to navigate. Your music is saved in your profile and you can access it from multiple devices easily. Definitely recommend.

I love this app, I've been using it for years and I can find most songs that I am looking for for free. Even if I can't find them, if you have audio files or convert videos into audio files they will be stored on Trebel. This definitely allows a lot of versatility when it comes to adding music that you can't find on the app itself. Even so, I still can only give it 4 stars because every now and then I'll have a little bit of trouble getting my songs to play. Otherwise, I totally recommend.

This is a great app. I've never had any problems with it. I just wish the song that was playing was able to go back to the place that I started on the playlist.>>>>>8/15/2025^ I have taken my five stars that I rated on it down to three because I noticed that when I want to listen to my music offline I can only listen to certain songs now. Whereas to before I could listen to any song with no problem. I find it bogus to change the app up like that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Laurie, thank you for your review! 🎵 We’re glad you’ve enjoyed TREBEL but we’re sorry about the changes that affected your offline listening. Some songs may have restrictions due to licensing. Please email us at hello@trebelmusic.com with details so we can better assist, though. Your feedback helps us improve! 💛

scraped_reviews.content: I'm really happy with this app. I've been using it for years with a very happy user experience. I love the new update where it saves the song you were listening to when the app is closed. I am experiencing interruptions in my listening, though. Sometimes the app pauses my music, sometimes it just stops my audio and I can't resume without opening the app again. (Edit): the email address they tell you to contact does not work
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi jesse, I'm sorry to hear you've been experiencing that issue. 😢 Would you mind sharing more information on what's happening through an email at hello@trebelmusic.com? We would really like to fix any problems as soon as possible, so you continue to enjoy the app! 🎵

scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP! I love that I can listen offline, can store in the cloud , & that the selection of songs has gotten much better (but can still use a lil work). I was devoted to YT Music & paid to download & ad free but I like Trebel so much that it's now my #1! IDC about music videos, I care about music! I get the paid version (there's a free version too!) but you can EARN a TrebelPass by downloading!!! And it's much cheaper (than other 🎵apps) if you do want to pay instead.

I enjoy it. Currently very few ads, one when I start the app, and I can go about an hour before hearing the next ad. There's a 30 second or so ad when you download songs, not a big deal. The songs are off YouTube so sometimes the quality isnt the best, but it's free music and I can just skip it so I'm not complaining.

First off, I don't give 5 stars. So 4 is really good along with some praise. Only problem I have is that sometimes it starts shuffling on its own and every now then, it starts playing audio from an ad, while I'm trying to preview a song before downloading it. But that's not often and it's easily fixable on my end. But I emailed the tech group a few months ago and I never got a reply back. But I highly recommend it. If possible, start it before losing data or it'll take time to get started. 🤨

It is easy to learn how to use and navigate throughout the app. Downloading is not as fast as I would prefer. However, I am able to download a handful of songs within a five minute period... also, they do make you watch an ad in-between almost every single song or every other your downloading.

The concept of this app is really cool. Being able to "download" songs to the app for offline listening is an awesome feature. However, I believe there are more cons than pros at this point. First, now you have to make an account which is annoying. Second, the ads are getting ridiculous. Third, not all songs are available to download unless you buy the premium version of the app. Lastly, is it really offline listening when you need service to load the ad before the song plays? I'd say no ..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey GTU, thanks for sharing your thoughts! We’ve always required an account so your music stays safe even if you switch devices. 🎵 Ads are how we support artists and keep TREBEL free. Paying for PASS doesn’t unlock songs, they're for everyone to enjoy. Also, once your songs are downloaded, you can listen offline without service! 🙌

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome app... fast, easy to use.. i show everyone how it works, downloading and listening to any song is super easy. Try it, n you will not be dissapointed. UPDATE--- WOW ! It's been almost a year since I wrote this review! STILL LOVE TREBEL! Hasn't disappointed me yet! I told dozens of people about it. They can't believe how easy, and fast it finds and plays, and even downloads the songs you want to hear. The BEST PART ITS FREE!!

LOVE this app!!!! It truly IS free!!!!! You have to watch a few ads like any other music downloading app, but these aren't ANYWHERE NEAR as annoying, OR as long as the others apps. Try it out!!!! You won't be disappointed!!! I promise!!! They even give you "reward" days of Treble Max, where it's completely ad free for a certain day, a couple days, or whatever. You NEVER have to provide a credit card, bc they NEVER charge you for ANYTHING!!!

Best free streaming service. They don't have some but do have a lot. Don't like the auto cloud storage feature, and it has some bugs, especially regarding downloads where it might miss some songs in list on first run. There are other bugs too but not a dealbreaker. Infreuquently my phone has started spazzing out while using the app, bad ads? But it's very infrequent and my phone is fine... Still I would investigate what's causing this.

I didn't have service for a long time for financial reasons ...during this tough time I still got to use this app through wifi and even in the car and being off line!!! the ads are minimal and honestly couldn't say that it really ever disrupts you listening to music but only when you download songs. Thank you for allowing me to enjoy music during such a tough time for me!!

I've used this for 3-4 mayb 5 years now. Whatever has happened within the last few months isn't good. More ads, no more unlimited listening as it asks you to "Take a break" and "watch an ad to continue" This isn't the best app out there. Its free factor is literally why people use it. They already got greedy when they introduced the membership plan, which wasn't there from the start. Now, they are basically forcing it. I downloaded a song, constant ads, which is new, and I don't like this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joel, thanks for being a longtime user and sharing your thoughts. 💛 We understand the recent changes can be frustrating. Ads help us keep TREBEL free, but we’re working to balance things better for all users. Please feel free to email hello@trebelmusic.com with more details—we’d love to hear from you! 🎵

scraped_reviews.content: truly an amazing music app, it's perfect in every way, I can't think of anything negative to say about this GEM OF A MUSIC! UNLIKE YouTube if u exit off of TREBLE for wat ever reason. it doesn't close the TREBLE APP! U can continue to listen to the music you've downloaded and retrieved from the cloud on ur phone, and it's FREE! Unless u want other perks like free boosts, ur no adds. But honestly watching adds has its benefits on THE TREBLE APP. Cuz u earn coins and gems to watch adds, TY TREBLE.

Great music app for the most part! However, I find it annoying that music will be moved into the cloud when I don't ask it to. I believe this feature should be able to be turned off entirely. Furthermore, it's absolutely ridiculous that music either already on the device (or music that has been downloaded through the app) skips and cuts out if you don't have a decent internet connection. Especially since playing that same music offline is so much more reliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Anorak, I'm sorry to hear you've been experiencing music playback issues. 😢 Would you mind sharing more information on what's happening through an email at hello@trebelmusic.com? We would really like to fix any problems as soon as possible, so you continue to enjoy the app! 🎵

scraped_reviews.content: This app is AMAZING! I've been using it more than spotify since I got it and I can safely say it's better. I can download songs. For free. Play songs in any order. For free. Listen to songs will little ads. i also like the discovery part where u can scroll through songs to find news ones to download. There are a few bugs and some songs are unavailable bc of licensing. But other than those minor issues, this app is the best for listening to music, especially offline.

As far as a music app goes trebel is one of the best I must admit but I found a few problems with it. What's the point of a "for you" if none of them are close to my music taste? Adding songs and disliking them doesn't change anything. I get 20 songs in a row that's Mexicano or country when I've disliked every one so far and haven't added either. Yet I don't get songs of the genre I have added. Good idea, poor execution. Also, many bands I like aren't here. Very limited options.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Christian, sorry to hear you've been experiencing that issue. 😢 I have contacted our tech team, so they can work as quickly as possible to resolve it! If you have any other problems or questions, don't hesitate to email us at hello@trebelmusic.com. 🎵

scraped_reviews.content: Got sick of Amazon's limitations, searched high and low for an alternative. Treble fits the bill. 100% free, ads are relatively minimal, plenty of titles new and old, app even found all of my purchased music on my phone and imported, allows me to listen to what I want, when I want, in the order I want. As Amazon should without buying premium. Thanks to the developers.

Don't get me wrong, I love the concept of this app and everything, but there's a glitch were the ad won't load, on OR offline. I have to keep closing and opening the app until I get lucky and it works. Also, it's inconsistent with how it presents the audio info on my car's Bluetooth. Sometimes it will say not provided or something, and other times it will say the name of the song and artists which is perfect. Please fix these promptly.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ashley, sorry to hear you've been experiencing that issue. 😢 I have contacted our tech team, so they can work as quickly as possible to resolve it! If you have any other problems or questions, don't hesitate to email us at hello@trebelmusic.com. 🎵

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty amazing free music app!!!! However, I keep getting an error where I can't listen to any music and it keeps saying that I have to listen to the next track even though I've downloaded everything and done all the stuff. But every time I go to use it now lately it's been saying sorry that check cannot be used. Please listen to the next track and then the next track will say the same thing

This is a very useful app and I like it's style and insights. But if I have to watch yet another 30 second Temu ad every single time I make an action I will start screaming! Fr. Already have that app but their theme song is the most annoying thing ever! Stop it, please!!! Once your songs are downloaded though it's great and easy to use.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi D M! I'm sorry for any inconvenience, but to continue working on this legal app and have free music for everyone, we need the revenue from ads to pay artists. 🎵 Thanks for your understanding! If you have any other suggestions or problems, email hello@trebelmusic.com. 🙌

scraped_reviews.content: I've been trying the free version of TREBEL for a few weeks after using either Spotify, Tidal or Amazon Music for extended periods of time. The sound quality of TREBEL is decent/good listening in a car or headphones. Doesn't sound great on a more revealing higher end system, quite compressed. Cannot listen/sample a song unless you download it which kinda sucks but not a deal breaker. Like that you can skip as many songs as you wish without maxing out. Overall a good free streaming music app.

title: Vidio: Sports, Movies, Series
description:
Vidio – All Your Favorite Shows in One Place

The most complete watching app is only on Vidio! From live sports and highlights, Vidio Original Series, to your favorite movies, dramas, and anime, everything is in one app. Enjoy exciting streaming anytime, anywhere!

· Live Sports & Leagues – Watch thrilling matches like the Premier League, BRI Liga 1, UCL, Serie A, NBA, MotoGP, F1, and many more.
· Vidio Originals – Enjoy exclusive shows of various genres like Bad Guys, Santri Pilihan Bunda 2, True Stalker, and Scandal 3: The Final & Sexiest.
· Korean Drama – Watch popular K-dramas like Love Scout, Motel California, The Queen Who Crowns, and Study Group.
· Top Movies & Drama – Watch the best movies and dramas, from Azzamine (Indonesian film), Flourished Peony (Mandarin drama), to Escape (Korean action film).
· Latest and Popular Anime – Watch your favorite anime like Solo Leveling Season 2: Arise from the Shadow and Naruto: Shippuden.
· TV Channels – Watch live national and international TV, starting from SCTV, Indosiar, tvN, Arirang, to Aljazeera.
· Sports Channels – Access various top sports channels like BeIN Sports, SPOTV, and Champions TV.
· Explore also Thai dramas, Japanese dramas, music, online radio, and much more!

Enjoy seamless HD streaming, subtitles in various languages, and ad-free viewing now!
Entertainment your way, stream anytime and anywhere with Vidio!

scraped_reviews.content: SCAM. Subscribed to watch live sport during travel in Indonesia. The package I subscribed to had a tick next to the sport I was interested in. The first weekend all was fine, the next weekend it said I had to upgrade the subscription to watch.... The worst streaming service. I'm done with trying to pay for things legally. Piracy is the only way.

title: Blockudoku®: Block Puzzle Game
description:
Blockudoku® is an original combination of sudoku and block puzzle games. It is a simple yet challenging and addictive free block puzzle you won’t be able to put down.

Match blocks to remove them by completing lines and cubes. Keep the board clean and beat your high score in this block puzzle! Watch blocks blast away as you play! Challenge your IQ and win the block puzzle game!

Block puzzle game features:

✔ 9x9 block puzzle board. Merge blocks on the 9x9 grid, which should be familiar to all sudoku fans, to build lines and squares.
✔ Blocks of various shapes. Strategically stack blocks on the sudoku board to destroy them and keep the board clean.
✔ Complete Daily Challenges to get unique trophies while playing block puzzles.
✔ Join Seasonal Events and uncover unique animated postcards.
✔ Compete against other players in Tournaments, beat your high score, and climb to the top of the leaderboard.
✔ Challenging goals. Never stop challenging your IQ in this block puzzle game. Try to beat your high score or compete with friends.
✔ Combos. Master the block puzzle game by destroying multiple tiles with just one move.
✔ Streak. Score more points by eliminating blocks with several successful moves in a row. Go full blast and destroy as many blocks as you can! 
✔ Unique addicting mechanics. Blockudoku® has been created as a highly playable mixture of sudoku and a block puzzle game.
✔ Addictive gameplay. Play block games when you are bored or eager to train your brain whenever and wherever you want!

How to become a Blockudoku® master?

There is no time limit in this block game, so no rush. Think one step ahead when you face a difficult move. It might become your last one!

Try to build blocks on the puzzle board to destroy lines or 3x3 squares with every move in order not to fill up the board.

Find your zen in this addicting game by balancing between blasting blocks as quickly as possible and getting as many combos and streaks as you can to score higher.

Why play this block puzzle game?

Blockudoku® block puzzle has been designed for people who want to unwind and train their brain at the same time. This block puzzle game includes combinations of various scales and complexity together with simple addictive gameplay which is similar to block puzzle and sudoku games. Whether you are tired or in low spirits, a few rounds of playing Blockudoku® block puzzle will cheer you up and let your mind relax.

If you like challenging yourself with block games, Blockudoku® is the perfect option for you. Take a break from the daily grind and get rid of negative thoughts by immersing yourself in this brain teaser. Enjoy the satisfying feeling of making streaks and combos, and watch every block blast away while exploring the captivating world of Blockudoku® addicting games! You definitely won't be bored playing block puzzle games! Relieve stress or train your brain with a relaxing yet challenging block puzzle game of Blockudoku® with block blast excitement anywhere, anytime!

Terms of Use:
https://easybrain.com/terms

Privacy Policy:
https://easybrain.com/privacy

scraped_reviews.content: The ad for this game is completely misleading. The ad says and shows that it's a block puzzle game to test if you have a good IQ to figure where you'll be able to place the blocks, but it's nothing like that. And y'all must be stupid and greedy to charge $15 to get rid of ads. Most games only charge 3 or 4 dollars to get rid of ads. This game has it at $15 like if it's fast food.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your download and feedback. Some content can be not yet available as specified in the disclaimer, but we are working towards adding it. We'll take into account your comments about the price for removing ads. Thank you for sharing your opinion.

scraped_reviews.content: I appreciate how challenging it can get after a while. the problem I have is that as soon as you get to 2500-3000 points, the game purposely starts stacking you with pieces you can't possibly use to clear blocks. seriously, man. screw this game. I've been trying for so long to beat my high score, and the game algorithm won't allow it. they'll give you the same shapes constantly once you reach a certain point, basically ensuring you can't improve your score. uninstalling. waste of time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear about your recent experiences and understand how frustrating it can be when it feels like progress is halted. Our team is constantly working on balancing the game to ensure it remains enjoyable for all players. We take your observations seriously and are committed to continuous improvement.

scraped_reviews.content: TOO MANY ADS!! Its all the fake ads, too, that lie about what their game is. I just wanted a peaceful puzzle game. easy to pick up and put down and challenging. This fit the bill until I started playing more and was shoved an ad down my throat every 5 moves, when you open the app, start a level, finish a level. Ridiculous
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing too many ads in our app. We understand that ads can be frustrating, but they help us keep the app free for everyone to use. However, we'll take your feedback into consideration and try to improve the ad experience in future updates. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Ads, ads, ads! Gameplay is interrupted repeatedly by ads! Usually I don't care, they need to make $$, this is the first game I've encountered that actually interrupts the game play with ads. Then to top it off they live up to the meme of the hardest to press "x", so it's damn near impossible to get the multi-layers of ads to go away without opening more! I really like the game, trying to decide if the hassle of ads is worth it, or if the $10 "ad free" is worth it, or if I just want to delete it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry to hear about your experience with the ads. After a few seconds from the beginning of a video ad, an option to skip the ad must appear: a fast forward or a cross-shaped button. If there're any problems with closing the ads, please contact us via the "Help" in the app. We'll be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I demoted my review from 5 stars. Granted, I know this is a puzzle game. However, after a certain point, the game only gives you options that make you lose the game. It took me so long to get past 4000, then when I finally passed that threshold, I could never seem to pass that record. The highest I've ever gotten was 9000, but that was 2 years ago. I initially started to play game to relax, instead, I'm finding myself getting more upset and frustrated. I'm very close to uninstalling this game.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear about your recent experiences and understand how frustrating it can be when it feels like progress is halted. Our team is constantly working on balancing the game to ensure it remains enjoyable for all players. We take your observations seriously and are committed to continuous improvement.

scraped_reviews.content: Great game. I'd give it 5 stars except the ads are excessive. I'll update to 5 if it changes. I like the game enough to even leave a review. I don't bother with others, I just delete them. I play sudoku with the same brand and love that. I had to recently reinstall sudoku on a new device and now it has more ads when it had so little I didn't even notice, so that's a bummer, but I still really enjoy that game, and will give this game a chance because of it.

We appreciate your feedback and we'll definitely take it into consideration for future app updates. In the meantime, you can remove ads by purchasing the ad-free version of the app. Thank you for playing our game!

scraped_reviews.content: the game itself is fun. I found it lit relaxing and helped me de-stress. but the adds are insufferable. there's are so many adds, no way to skip them and are constantly popping up new windows. I triedcairplane mode and still got them. ultimately Uninstalled the app after having and playing for over a year. edit: thank you to the developer for reaching out. to clarify, an "x" or the arrows to skip do appear in the corner, however everytime i click on them it takes me to the download page.

After a few seconds from the beginning of a video ad, an option to skip the ad must appear: a fast-forward or cross-shaped button. If the ads redirect you to other pages, please contact us via the "Help" in the app. We'll be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Recently had to uninstall as the ads were just getting out of hand. Two ads immediately upon opening the app, two more before I started my first game. Halfway through that game-two more ads. Immediately upon completing the first game, two more ads, and finally, two more ads before i could start another game. Look, I'm okay with in-app ads-to a point. But 10 ads in one play? Heinous. It's too bad, because this used to be one of my favorites. For years. Not anymore.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear that you're experiencing too many ads in our app. We understand that ads can be frustrating, but they help us keep the app free for everyone to use. However, we'll take your feedback into consideration and try to improve the ad experience in future updates. Thank you for your feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't buy the Ad Free version, as the game becomes extremely hard after that. When I complained about the sudden change in the difficulty level, they replied saying that the ad free version has nothing to do with the level of difficulty. I assure you this is a mere lie. I was able to hit 2600 before I purchased their paid version, now I can hardly hit 990 no matter what I do. in one of the games they gave me 3 un-usable pieces which is something I never seen before in my life in any game!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The “Remove Ads” purchase only disables ads; it does not interact with the game logic or scoring. Figures algorithms work regardless of purchases, and no difficulty adjustment is triggered by buying the ad-free version. We're reviewing the game's balance, especially around the scoring progression you mentioned. Stay tuned for our updates

scraped_reviews.content: Updated review - the gem/flower collecting thing is ridiculous. The simplicity of this game was what kept me interested. No need for fancy animations, colors, gems, flowers, etc. Please stop trying to change things to attract children or make it more addictive in some way. I paid for this game and would like to play the original format. The new design feels too flashy and crowded while the old design was simple and clear.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're truly sorry to hear that the recent update has impacted your enjoyment of the game. We understand how disappointing changes can be. While we're not planning to revert the update, please know that your feedback is crucial in guiding our future improvements. We appreciate the time you've spent with our game and thank you for your honesty.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't know if the game has always been this way, but they have now built logic into the game that only allows you to beat previous scores by a small amount. Basically, as soon as you beat your previous high score, it sabotages you and ends your game within 3-4 rounds. There is nothing random about the pieces you get. This is intentional, and I have verified this behavior in the game with other people as well. Small-minded logic to keep you coming back, I suppose.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear about your recent experiences and understand how frustrating it can be when it feels like progress is halted. Our team is constantly working on balancing the game to ensure it remains enjoyable for all players. We take your observations seriously and are committed to continuous improvement.

scraped_reviews.content: I paid for this app, and have been playing it for the past 3 years! I love it so much and it's very relaxing for me. However, I and clearly many other people used the wooden theme when we played. It was easier on the eyes and the darker colors would save battery life. I'm very disappointed they would remove it, as the white and blue are extremely bright. We don't need the wood back, just at least add a dark mode. Please listen to your users and take action, it makes the game so hard to play.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts. We recognize the wooden theme was a favorite for many, and we're sorry to see it go. Currently, we don't have plans to bring it back, but your feedback is crucial and will be considered as we continue to develop new updates. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I loved this game. I have been a daily player for many years. The recent updates are terrible, clearly I'm not alone based on other reviews. First the graphics changed to a more 3d image and it causes strain on the eyes, now they changed the format of the game to bubbles, flowers, etc, and it completely ruins it for me. There is nothing engaging or relaxing about it anymore. I wish there was an option to revert to standard, but it seems the makers have no interest in what people truly wanted.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're truly sorry to hear that the recent update has impacted your enjoyment of the game. We understand how disappointing changes can be. While we're not planning to revert the update, please know that your feedback is crucial in guiding our future improvements. We appreciate your honesty.

scraped_reviews.content: I really do love this game, but the newest update is driving me bonkers. I understand wanting to add new gameplay and a variety of options but not being able to turn off the new game mode is infuriating. The goals have shifted drastically on how to gain a score — they have removed the base of their gameplay from events and daily puzzles. The flowers and bubbles are cute, but there should really be a way to turn it off. Not the same game I paid to remove ads on.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Greetings! We're grateful you took the time to express your thoughts on the recent changes to the game mechanics. While reverting to the previous mechanics isn't currently an option, please rest assured that your feedback is a crucial part of our development process. Thanks again for your input!

scraped_reviews.content: Love this game. Money well spent on the full version. Update: while I enjoyed this originally and glad I paid for it at the time, too much has changed including the coloring (I prefer darker themes) and now the introduction to remove numbers of times to "clear" a block, this game just isn't the same. Keep the money, I was happy to support the game originally, this just isn't the same as when I reviewed it 3 years ago.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been playing Blockudoku's daily challenges for nearly two years, enjoying its simple block-elimination gameplay. Sadly, I'm considering deleting the game as it's no longer the same experience I loved. I wpuld have have given it 5 stars two months ago, but now it's only getting 1 star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We're thankful you've shared your perspective on the new game mechanics with us. Although we don't currently have the plans to switch back to the previous mechanics, your feedback is not taken lightly. It's an important factor in our ongoing efforts to improve the game and ensure it remains enjoyable for our players.

scraped_reviews.content: There are many games like this one, and I usually enjoy them. I have decided that this one isn't worth my time or the frustrations anymore. There are ads that will sometimes play during a level, disrupting gameplay. The deciding factor for my uninstalling the game was when it ended a board by not providing any pieces that would allow the board to continue. By that I mean that it came up with 3 new pieces, none of which could be used. The game would also benefit from a dark mode for nighttime.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Apologies for interrupting your game with ads. We'll work towards making your experience more enjoyable. We understand your concern about the blocks you get. The shapes are generated to provide a challenging and unpredictable experience, but we acknowledge that it can be frustrating. We will consider your comments for future improvements.

scraped_reviews.content: Like many others since the gem and flower update, I have completely lost interest in this game. I just spent the last hour going through one level, but because the shapes of the given blocks didn't match up, the game kept going and going and going. I ended up losing because I couldn't get one stupid flower!!! I must have watched at least 5 videos because the game was so long.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thank you for reaching out with your concerns about the recent game update. We understand it can be frustrating when changes affect your enjoyment of the game. While the current update will remain, we want you to know that we're here to listen and learn from your feedback. Thanks again for your input, and stay tuned for our future updates!

scraped_reviews.content: Good for a bit of fun, until you realize it's algorithm driven to keep you playing by advancing the game in increments. You literally cannot fail intentionally in the early points once you've progressed as it will give you exactly what you need to clear stuff. Try it. Once you've passed your previous record, it does the opposite and tanks you. All to string you along and keep you coming back for more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Thanks for your feedback. We're sorry to hear about your recent experiences and understand how frustrating it can be when it feels like progress is halted. Our team is constantly working on balancing the game to ensure it remains enjoyable for all players. We take your observations seriously and are committed to continuous improvement.

scraped_reviews.content: Way too many adds. You get an ad before your game, you get an ad After your game, and you'll get Several ads in the Middle of your game. My last game, I Barely broke 1300, so a short game overall. During that, i don't know, 3-5 minutes? I got 4 unskippable ads. This game use to be so Great, it's fun in arcade mode and the challenges are also unique and fun to play through. But the devs have gotten so greedy that they've replaced the actual game with ad after ad after ad. Don't install, it sucks
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We're sorry to hear about your experience with the ads. We'll work towards making your experience more enjoyable. scraped_reviews.content: Cool game idea. I wish there were more game modes within this same concept. Maybe time trials, a mode with an undo/back button. For a game that borrows a lot from Tetris it misses some of the things that make Tetris so great. The inability to rotate pieces, being unable to see the next piece (or pieces) coming up and/or storing a single piece for later use makes this "strategy" game rely too much on luck. The core gameplay loops is fun enough, but the game misses out on a lot of potential by forcing the player to rely more on RNG than strategy. Fun for a few minutes though.
